@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ku ru kul+le sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs/ lha mo ku ru kul+le la phyag 'tshal lo/ /cho ga sngar bshad pa dang mthun pa las gzhan du na sa bon taM dmar po las byung ba/ sku mdog dmar po/ pad+ma dmar po dang / zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis

brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas mi 'jigs pa/ g.yon ut+pa la dmar po bsnams pa/ yang phyag gnyis kyis ut+pa la dmar po kha bye ba lta bu'i mda' dang / gzhu rna ba'i mthar thug par bkang ste/ bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bsams la snying gar bsnun te/ sngar bshad pa'i ut+pa la'i

phyag rgyas snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor gtugs par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas brjod bya ste/ oM ku ru kul+le che ge mo ba sha mA na ya swA hA/ dbang du bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //bzlas pa'i dus su khyad par du 'od zer gyis sdig sgrib sbyangs shing gzhan dbang du byas par yang mos

pas so/ /don yod grub pas rgyas gdab bo//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ dzaM b+ha la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gnod gnas kyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gnod gnas la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /nor 'dod pa dag gis bsgom par 'dod na/ cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du byas la/ gzhan du na sa bon gsum pa'i gsum pa mdog ser po/ thig les mnan pa zla ba phyed pas brgyan pa/ de nyid las byung ba'i mgon po gnod gnas zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na bI dza pU ri

bsnams pa/ g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal pa rin po che'i char 'bebs pa bsnams pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ zhabs gnyis kyis dung gi mgo can dang pad+ma'i mgo can gyi gter chen po mnan pa/ rin po che la sogs pa'i char 'bebs pa/ rang gi khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu bsam

par bya'o/ /ut+pa la sngon po'i phreng ba kha thur du bltas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gnod gnas su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya ni lag pa thal mo khong stong du byas la/ gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag pa'i phyag rgyas snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi

bor gtugs te bzlas brjod bya'o/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya swA hA/ 'di nyid kyi chu sbyin blugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /mchod pa yang byas la bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur bar the tshom med do/ /mgon po gnod gnas kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+h+r-i ku Ti sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das yum khro gnyer can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngar bshad pa'i cho ga las sa bon lnga pa'i gsum pa/ dang po'i brgyad pas rdzogs par byas pa stong pas mnan par bsams la/ de

nyid las byung ba'i lha mo khro gnyer can ma/ ral pa dang thor tshugs 'chang ba/ zhi ba/ phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas na mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng / g.yon na dbyig pa dang spyi blugs bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo brkyang ba sbyar la/

mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan te/ so sor phye la lhag ma rnams rdo rjer bya ba 'di ni lha mo khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags la oM b+h+r-I swA hA/ khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ mA rI ts+yai de wI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ lha mo 'od

zer can gyi sgrub thabs/ lha mo 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por re zhig nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de'i steng du sa bon lnga pa'i lnga pa la/ dang po'i gnyis pa rdzogs par byas la/ zla ba phyed pa dang thig les brgyan pa bsams la/ de las byung ba'i lha mo 'od zer

can sku mdog dmar ba/ zhal drug pa zhal dang po dmar po/ gnyis pa nag po/ gsum pa ljang gu/ bzhi pa ser po/ lnga pa dkar po/ steng gi dbu phag gdong nag po/ a shwa ka dang mchod rten gyis brgyan pa/ gsus khyim che ba thod pa'i phreng ba can dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ sbrul

gyi zhags pa stag lpags kyi sham thabs bsnams pa/ bgegs rnams ltung bar mdzad pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i phag gi shing rta la g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang / rdo rje dang gtun shing dang mda' dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang dgra sta bsnams pa/ g.yon na sdigs

mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa dang / thod pa dang a shwa ka'i zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / gzhu dang tri shU la bsnams pa/ spyan gsum par bsam mo/ /mdun du shing zlum po'i dbus su lag pa gnyis pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng bar bsams la/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das yum

'od zer can yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo kha sbyar la gung mo gnyis gshibs la myu gur bya ste mthe bo gnyis skyil krung du bsnol la/ mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo dgug par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa'i sngags ni oM mA rI ts+yai mAM hUM hUM phaT phaT

swA hA/ lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /slob dpon chen po phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa dri ma med pa'i lhas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs bcu gcig rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ mA rI ts+yai de bI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs/

lha mo 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de'i steng du sa bon lnga pa'i lnga pa la/ dang po'i gnyis pa rdzogs par byas la/ zla ba phyed pa dang thig les brgyan par bsam/ de las byung ba'i lha mo 'od zer can sku mdog dmar ba/ zhal drug pa/ zhal

dang po dmar ba/ gnyis pa nag pa/ gsum pa ljang gu/ bzhi pa ser ba/ lnga pa dkar ba/ steng gi dbu phag gdong nag po/ a shwa ka dang / mchod rten gyis brgyan pa/ gsus khyim che ba/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dang stag lpags kyi

sham thabs can/ bgegs rnams ltung bar mdzad pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i shing rta la g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / gtun shing dang / mda' dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / dgra sta bsnams pa/ g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang

bcas pa dang / thod pa dang a shwa ka'i yal ga dang / tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / gzhu dang / tri shU la bsnams pa'o/ /spyan gsum par bsam zhing / mdun du shing zlum po'i dbus su lag pa gnyis sdigs mdzub bsgreng bar bsams la/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma yum 'od

zer can yin no zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje thal mo kha sbyar la/ gung mo gnyis gshibs la myu gur byas te/ mthe bong gnyis skyil mo krung du bsnol mdzub mo gnyis rtse mor dgug par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM mA rI ts+yai mAM hUM hUM phaT

phaT swA hA/ lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //[{Da}]yang na sgrub thabs ras ris kyi cho ga las bsgom par 'dod na/ sngar bshad pa'i cho ga dang / de bzhin du rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yi ge maM zhes bya ba/ yi ge a dang thig le dang ldan pa'i snying po'i mchog bsams

la/ de nas 'od zer sna tshogs pa spros pa las byung ba des/ bla ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar bsams la/ mchod pa lnga la sogs pa byas nas/ chos bdag med par bsgom par bya ste/ oM swa b+ha wa shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA wa shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis de ltar

lhag par mos par byas pas/ khams gsum pa 'di dag mig yor tsam du shes par byas la/ de'i sa bon las byung ba'i a shwa ka'i yal ga /de'i steng du yi ge maM de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun lha mo de'i skur bdag nyid bsam pa ni/ yum lha mo 'od zer can sku

mdog 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar shin tu ser ba/ sku'i 'od zer nyi ma ltar 'bar ba/ spyi bor mchod rten gyis brgyan pa/ na bza' dmar po dang / sku stod tshi gu can gyi zhing chung du bsnams pa/ gdu bu sna tshogs dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sor gdub dang / rna rgyan dang / 'og pag dang /

g.yer kha dang / zhabs gdub kyi sgra 'khrol ba/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'bar ba/ me tog ban+d+hu ka dang / rgya skyegs kyi mdog 'dra ba 'phro ba/ spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis mnan pa/ a shwa ka'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'od 'phro ba

dang / khab dang / lcags kyu dang / mda' gsor ba la dgyes pa/ phyag g.yon zhags pa dang / gzhu dang a shwa ka'i yal ga dang / skud pa bsnams pa/ zhal dang po zhi ba/ zhal ras rgyas pa/ gser sbyangs pa ltar shin tu ser ba/ spyan shin tu rgyas pa/ zhal gyi sgros li khri'i rdul gyis btsos pa

'dra ba/ sgeg pa'i nyams kyis gnas par gyur pa/ zhal g.yas pa pad+ma rA ga ltar shin tu dmar ba/ 'od zer bzang po 'bar ba 'phro ba/ zhal g.yon pa phag gi gdong 'phro ba dang bcas shing mi sdug pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung ba/ in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ nyi ma bcu gnyis dang

'od mnyam pa/ smin ma bsdus shing khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jigs par mdzad pa'o/ /dbu la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog gser sbyangs pa ltar shin tu dag pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can/ ral pa dang thor tshugs mnga' bar

bzhugs pa/ gzhal yas khang mchod rten gyi dbyibs la shing a shwa ka'i me tog gis khyab pa'i nang na/ phag gi steng na g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/ gzhon nu ma dar la bab pa'i tshul can/ shing rta'i 'og na ha las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/ gza' chen po sgra

gcan 'dzin nyin mo nyi ma 'dzin pa mtshan mo zla ba 'dzin gnas pa/ lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor bar bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i mdun du/ oM mA rI ts+yai bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ bA rA hA mu khi/ A kaR+Sha ya dzaHswA hA/ zhes bya bas lha mo sku mdog dmar ba zhal gcig pa/ phag

gi gdong pa can spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas na khab dang rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon na gzhu dang a shwa ka'i yal ga bsnams pa/ zhing chung du stod g.yogs dmar po bsnams pa/ rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho ga yid la gang zhig sgrub par 'dod pa'i bud med 'gugs par

mdzad pa'o/ /de bzhin du g.yas su/ oM mA rI ts+yai bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ bA rA hA mu khi/ sarba duSh+TA naM/ pra duSh+TA naM/ mu khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM swA hA/ lha mo sngar bshad pa'i na bza' dang rgyan dang gzugs dang ldan mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'di ni sku mdog ser ba/ g.yas na a shwa ka'i yal ga dang khab

bsnams pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang rdo rje bsnams pa/ gdug pa rnams kyi kha dang mig 'tshem par mdzad pa'o/ /de bzhin du rgyab tu/ oM mA rI ts+yai bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ bA rA hA mu khi/ sarba duSh+Ta naM/ staM b+ha ya baM swA hA/ zhes bya bas lha mo 'di yang na bza' dang rgyan la sogs pa

sngar dang 'dra mod kyi/ 'on kyang phyag g.yas na rdo rje dang khab g.yon na gzhu dang a shwa ka'i yal ga bsnams pa/ sku mdog in+d+ra nI la lta bu gdug pa can thams cad rengs par mdzad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /g.yon du/ oM mA rI ts+yai/ bat+tA li/ ba dA li/ ba rA li/ bA rA hA mu khi/ sarba

satwa na me pa sha ma nA ya hoHswA hA/ zhes bya bas lha mo 'di yang na bza' dang rgyan la sogs pa snga ma dang mthun mod kyi 'on kyang sku mdog nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba/ phyag g.yas na mda' dang rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon na gzhu dang a shwa ka'i yal ga bsnams pa/ sems can thams cad la rjes su

chags par mdzad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa la sogs pa byas la/ ye shes sems dpa' dang dam tshig gi lha gcig tu bya'o/ /de nas bzlas brjod bya ba'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM mA rI ts+yai oM mAM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes ci nus

bzlas la sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gnas par bya'o/ /'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs byas pa las/ /bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags des/ /sems can thams cad 'od zer can gyi ni/ /ye shes dri med gnas thob shog /lha mo 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs slob

dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mA rI ts+yai sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags ma

'od zer can nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo ldan sems dpa'i skyil krung gis/ /snying rje chen po rab dmigs la/ /snga bar snying gar zla ba la/ /oM yig dkar po bsgom par bya/ /rnam snang zhes pa'i bdag nyid can/ /ti yi 'od zer kun du dkar/ /ra ba zlum po mchod rten te/ /

'bar ba'i 'od kyis kun du brgyan/ /bsrung ba'i don du mdun dang rgyab/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang gzhan yang steng / /rim bzhin ma sogs bran la sogs/ /bu mo la sogs bum sogs dang / /lugs ma thang sku bshes gnyen dang / /po ti la sogs ji snyed pa'o/ /ti nas snying ga'i zla

bar maM/ /mya ngan med kyi yal gar skyes/ /'phags ma 'od zer can ma bsam/ /skud pa khab rnams bsnams pa mo/ /ldang ba'i tshul gyis g.yas pa yi/ /sna bug nas byung bdun nyer gnas/ /gdug can kha dang mig drubs nas/ /ra ba'i phyi rol dag tu byas/ /gzhan yang rig sngags

bzlas pa bya/ /sna bug g.yon 'ongs snying ga ru/ /bzhugs nas mya ngan med par 'gyur/ /mtshams bcing ba ni rab tu bya/ /'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra shr-I khaM le sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje lu

gu rgyud kyi sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngar bstan pa'i cho gas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM gi yi ge ljang gu las grub pa'i rdo rje lu gu rgyud zhal gsum phyag drug ma/ zhal g.yas pa dang cig shos sngo ba dang dkar ba/ zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum

mnga' ba/ phyag g.yas gsum na rdo rje dang lcags sgrog dang mda'/ phyag g.yon gsum na sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang / gzhu'o/ /sku mdog sngo bsangs su ljang ba/ zhal cung zad bzhad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sems can sdang ba rnams 'joms par byed par bdag nyid bsgoms la phyag rgya

bcing bar bya'o/ /de la lag pa gnyis khu tshur so sor bcings la mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo lcags sgrog gi rnam par bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa ni/ oM badzra shr-I kham le hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa'o/ /'di ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dzai ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad

pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ kha di ra ba na tA rA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ seng

ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig sngags pas sa gzhi legs shing mnyam la gtsang zhing yid dga' ba'i me tog sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dben pa'i sa phyogs su stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang gi snying gar zla ba la tAM yig dUr ba'i mdog lta bur 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phro bar

bsam mo/ /de las 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdig sgrib sbyangs te slar de nyid la bsdu'o/ /de nas yang rang gi snying ga'i tAM las 'od spros pas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas jo mo sgrol ma mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la gsal bar bltas te/ bla na med pa'i mchod pa

bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lam bsten pa dang / bdag nyid kyi lus dbul ba la sogs pa byas la/ byams pa

dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lan gsum brjod par bya ste/ oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAH swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho\u0f85 haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ zhes brjod pas bdag dang gzhan

gyi dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas nam mkha'i khams su paM yongs su gyur pa la sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar oM las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dUr ba'i mdog lta bu'i tAM yig 'od zer sna tshogs pa can

bsgoms la/ de la 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams bkug nas de nyid la zhugs par bsgom ste/ de rnams yongs su gyur pa las lha mo sgrol mar bsgom par bya ste/ sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ yid dga' ba'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/

phyag g.yon pas ut+pal bsnams pa/ g.yas pas bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i mchog sbyin pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng gi zla ba la zhabs g.yas brkyang ba'i skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o/ /de'i g.yas phyogs su mya ngan med pa'i 'od zer can sku mdog ser mo rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dbu rgyan can/

rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon pas mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga bsnams pa nye bar bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ral gcig ma mi'u thung gi gzugs can sku mdog nag mo/ stag gi pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa/ spyan gsum pa

mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal skra ser po 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang gri gug bsnams pa nye bar bzhugs pa'o/ /yang g.yas phyogs su rma bya chen mo/ sku mdog ser mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pas rnga yab bsnams pa/ g.yon pas rma bya'i mdongs

bsnams pa/ nye bar bzhugs pa'o/ /yang g.yon phyogs su dug sel ma sku mdog ljang gu/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ g.yon pas sbrul bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nye bar bzhugs pa'o/ /gzhan yang lha dang lha ma yin gyis bskor bar bsgom par bya'o/ /don

yod grub pas dbu la rgyas gdab bo/ /de nas rang gi snying ga las sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi sprin spro bar bsam mo/ /de ltar bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa skyon/ rang gi snying gar ut+pala'isteng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags mu tig gi phreng ba ltar dkar ba bltas la/ oM tA re tut+tA re swA hA/ zhes

so/ /de nas ldang bar 'dod na sngon bzhin du mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos la/ oM a mi tA b+ha zhes brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi don dang dngos grub thob par bsams la/ muHzhes brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par bsam zhing slar yang sems

can gyi don du byon par gsol ba btab la de nas jo mo sgrol ma'i gzugs kyis ci bde bar spyod lam bya'o/ /mchod pa'i sngags ni/ oM AHhUM tAM tA re ye/ oM AH badzra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ de bzhin du bdug spos dang / mar me dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / zhal zas dbul bar bya'o/ /

seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal rnam par snang mdzad rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sha taM aSh+Ta sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sgrub thabs

brgya dang brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i drin thob brtul zhugs ldan/ /bla med ye shes sgrub pa pos/ /ri bo dben zhing yid 'ong bar/ /rin chen sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing / /ljon shing mang pos rab tu gang / /skad snyan bya rnams sgra 'byin cing / /chu gtsang

yan lag brgyad ldan 'bab/ /ri dwags 'tshe ba med pa'i gnas/ /dri zhim me tog gis bkram pa'i/ /shing tog la sogs 'bras bu mang / /lha klu la sogs glu len cing / /grub 'dzin kun gyis gnas bcas pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas der ni/ /sngags pas kun la phan brtson pas/ /

bde ba'i stan la bsdad nas ni/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /'phags ma sgrol sogs spyan drangs te/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab mchod nas/ /bdun po rnam par dag par bya/ /de nas tshad med bzhi bsgoms pas/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /'gyur med phyin ci ma log pas/ /de dag

'phags pa'i spyod yul ni/ /stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom/ /oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ pad+ma zla bar yi ge tAM/ /de la 'jig rten gsum g.yo ba'i/ /sgrol ma zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa/ /dmar ser bzang po'i zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /ser dang ljang gu dmar dang dkar/ /

rtsa zhal g.yas g.yon rgyab rim bzhin/ /mchog sbyin nyi ma gdugs dang dung / /g.yas pa'i phyag na rim bzhin bsnams/ /ut+pal zhags pa phreng ba dang / /go khrab rnams ni g.yon na bsnams/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag rdzogs/ /ye shes drangs te gzhug par bya/ /

oM AHhUM/ zhes pas sku gsung thugs byin brlab/ /dbang bskur rim gyis dbu brgyan bya/ /ye shes zla ba'i ting 'dzin sems/ /skyo bar gyur na bzlas pa bya/ /gshegs dang bsdu ba la sogs bya/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma zla ba'i gdan

la ni oM las byung ba'i sgrol ma nyi ma'i mdog can/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon ut+pal nyi mas mtshan pa rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /dge ba can zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang

zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i sgrol ma/ pad+ma dang kun da ltar dkar ba/ zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ zla ba dang sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas gnyis na 'dzin pa/ ut+pal dang me'i 'khor lo g.yon na bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan dang

ldan pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ sku thams cad las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o/ /'jig rten thams cad g.yo bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hrIHlas byung ba'i sgrol ma ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis

phreng ba dang / ut+pa la'i steng na po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /snyan pa mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du a las byung ba'i sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na pad+ma dmar po/ /g.yon na

ut+pa la sngon pos brgyan pa/ /spyan gsum pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /dbyangs can ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du ma las byung ba'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma rdo rje dang ut+pal bsnams

pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan dang ldan par bsam mo/ /shes rab ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la b+hUM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na rin po che dang me tog /g.yon na mchog sbyin

pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dpal mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la tAM las byung ba'i lha mo sngon mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ dang po gnyis na mda' gzhu/ 'og ma gnyis na ut+pal dang ral gri bsnams pa/ rol pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs

pa'o/ /blo 'phel ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ nag mo khros ma spyan gsum ma/ zhal gdangs pa khro gnyer bsnyer ba ljags 'dril ba/ stag gi pags pa'i gos 'chang ba/ gri

gug dang thod khrag bsnams pa/ mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal 'chang ba'o/ /gsod par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan stengs su dzuM las yang dag par byung ba'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyis shing thog dang mya ngan med pa'i shing lo

bzung ba'o/ /rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyas par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la oM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ mdog ljang ser du ba ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams

cad dang ldan pa/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'o/ /'dod gzugs can gyi sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo/ dkar dmar mdog can zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma g.yas kyi dang po na skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon mchog sbyin pa tha ma gnyis kyis

ut+pal dang phreng ba 'dzin pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /phan par brtson pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du i las byung ba'i lha mo mdog mthing sngon/ zhal gsum phyag drug ma g.yas dmar ba g.yon sngo ba/ phyag dang po gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ bar

ma na glang po che dang / rgyal mtshan/ tha ma na ral gri dang zhags pa bsnams shing rol pas shing rta'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du oM las lha mo dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan

thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ g.yon na ba dan lce brgyad pa bsnams shing / 'gying ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal ba mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so/ /pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhal

gcig phyag bzhi ma g.yas dang pos skyabs sbyin pa 'og mas rdo rje/ g.yon dang pos mchog sbyin pa 'og mas ut+pal dang po ti'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so/ /pad+ma dang

nyi ma'i gdan la taM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas mchog sbyin pa g.yon ut+pal dang bcas pa'i skyabs sbyin pa/ mdog ljang gu'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan steng na traM las byung ba'i lha mo

zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ mdog dkar mo g.yas klu shing gi me tog bsnams pa/ g.yon ba dan rin po ches mtshan pa 'bar ba/ na bza' dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba/ rgyal po'i rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /yid 'ong ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla

ba'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ mdog ser mo/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis rin po che dang ral gri/ 'og ma gnyis na rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /rdza rnga can gyi sgrol ma'i sgrub

thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la baM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngo ljang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ dang po gnyis na dung dang rgyal mtshan/ tha ma gnyis na ral gri dang ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dung can ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang

zla ba'i gdan la hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal bzhi pa g.yas sngo ba rgyab dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas dang po na bum pa/ gnyis pa na bgrang phreng / gsum pa na gdugs/ bzhi pa na gaN+DI/ g.yon dang po na a mra'i 'bras bu/ gnyis pa na ut+pal/ gsum pa na lhung bzed/

bzhi pa na sdigs mdzub/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhabs rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyas par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ ral gri dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/

phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'grub par byed pa'i bdag nyid can zhal nas mi 'jigs pa sbyin par mdzad pa'o/ /tshig snyan ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la oM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal lnga ma/ sku zla ba ltar dkar ba/ zhal lnga ku mu da dkar po ltar 'bar ba/ phyag bcu dang ldan pa/ phyag

dang po gnyis kyis me long dang dung 'dzin pa/ g.yas gnyis pa na rdo rje dang / gsum pa na ut+pal dkar po/ bzhi pa na mchog sbyin pa/ lnga pa na mda'o/ /g.yon gyi gnyis pa na mdung thung dang / gsum pa na 'khor lo/ bzhi pa na dril bu/ lnga pa na gzhu'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan

pa/ zhabs gnyis rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /zla ba'i mdog can zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ sku mdog dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis bum pa dang / mchog stsol ba'o/ /rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa bsnams

pa/ zhabs gnyis skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan gyi steng na so las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ser mo glang po che dang seng ge'i steng du rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /phyag gnyis na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ut+pa

la ser po bsnams nas skyabs sbyin dang / mchog sbyin stsol bar mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /mi pham ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la gaM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar zhing 'od 'phro ba/ zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma/ g.yas dkar ba g.yon ser ba

rgyab zhal nag pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas dang po na seng ge gnyis pa na rnga zlum gsum pa na dbyu gu/ bzhi pa na lcags kyu/ g.yon dang po na ut+pal/ gnyis pa na rtse gsum/ gsum pa na rgyal mtshan/ bzhi pa na ce spyang bsnams pa/ zhabs rol

pas bzhugs pa'o/ /sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la aHlas byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ mdog sngon mo spyan gsum pa/ cung zad khros pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa na pi wang bsgreng ba/ g.yon du

ut+pal sngon po'i nang du khang pa brtsegs pa 'dzin pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /stobs chen ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas

ral gri g.yon sdigs mdzub bsnams pa/ zhabs phyed krung dang bcas pa'o/ /gtum mo chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du yaM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dud kha zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas na tri shU la dang / g.yon na spu gri

bsnams pa/ zhabs skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /sdang ba thams cad rlag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa/ rgyan kun dang ldan zhing mdzes pa/ phyag

g.yas dang po skyabs sbyin/ g.yon dang po me dpung 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa zhabs skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ rma bya'i khri la mdzes pas rol par mdzad pa'o/ /rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du/ b+h+rUM las byung

ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ mdog ser mo rgyan thams cad kyis yang dag par brgyan ma/ phyag g.yas na nyi ma dang dbang po/ g.yon na zla ba dang thag bzangs ris bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi

ma'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gsum phyag bzhi ma mdog dmar ser g.yas dmar ba g.yon ljang gu/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis mchog sbyin dang ut+pal bum pas mtshan pa bsnams pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa/ sku la 'od 'phro ba/ 'og ma gnyis na rnga yab dang ting shags bsnams pa/

'bar ba'i 'od mnga' ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na mu tig gi phreng ba thugs kar 'dzin pa/ g.yon na ut+pa la'i sdong bu mchog sbyin dang bcas

pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /glog phreng ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas mchog sbyin zhing g.yon pas rgyal mtshan rdo rje phyed pas mtshan

pa bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyal mtshan can zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas ral gri g.yon 'khor lo/ /rgyan thams cad kyis

brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /ye shes can zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma rgyan thams cad kyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ g.yas dang po mchog sbyin/ g.yon dang po ut+pal 'og ma gnyis

na mda' gzhu bsnams pa/ zhabs skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /shes rab can zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la yaM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ g.yas mchog sbyin zhing

g.yon chang gis gang ba'i bum pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /myos par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la raM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis ma/ khro mo'i cha lugs sbrul gyi rgyan can/ g.yas rdo rje g.yon sdigs mdzub

kyis bsdigs pa/ zhabs rol pas rgya mtsho'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o/ /rengs par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo nag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas rdo rje gri gug g.yon thod pa khrag gis gang ba/ glang chen gyi

pags pa'o/ /phag gi zhal mnga' ba/ spyan gsum khro gnyer can sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /nag mo chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas

bskum g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ na bza' nag po gsol ba/ mdog dmar mo/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag g.yas dang po na 'khor lo/ gnyis pa na ral gri/ g.yon gyi dang po na srid pa'i 'khor lo/ gnyis pa na sdigs mdzub bo/ /mtshan mo nag mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub

thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo sgrol ma mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas na 'khor lo g.yon khu tshur sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /srung bar byed pa'i sgrol

ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo sku mdog sngo skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas pa rlung gi ba dan dang / ri dang rgya mtsho'i gling brgya dang / g.yon na myos byed kyis gang ba'i snod dang zhags pa dang / rnga bo che rnams rim bzhin du bsnams pa/ zhal g.yas dmar ba

g.yon dkar po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rmongs byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du traM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas rin po ches mtshan pa'i ut+pal ser po/ g.yon skyabs sbyin

par mdzad pa'i phyag gis ut+pal sngon po po tis mtshan pa/ mdog ser mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /zhi ba mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngo ljang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas ut+pal

rdo rjes mtshan pa/ g.yon chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /mdzes ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ut+pal sngon po nyi ma dang zla

bas mtshan pa bsnams shing / g.yas mchog sbyin stsol ba'i phyag gis rin po che bsnams pa/ g.yon thugs kar skyabs sbyin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas ngang mo'i khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i

steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma/ mdog sngon mo zhal g.yas dkar ba/ rgyab gnag pa g.yon dmar ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis ut+pal po tis mtshan pa bsnams pa/ g.yas gnyis pa na gdugs/ gsum pa na mda'/ bzhi pa na dung / g.yon

gnyis pa rgyal mtshan/ gsum pa na gzhu/ bzhi pa na ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs can/ zhabs rol pas khri snyan sa la'i pags pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /rig byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du taM las byung ba'i lha mo sku

mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas mchog sbyin g.yon pad+ma dmar po thugs kar bsnams pa'o/ /smad g.yogs ri dwags kyi pags pas byas pa/ zhabs rol pa dang brag phug tu bzhugs shing gsang ba'i drang srong dang bcas pa'o/ /gsang ba mo zhes

bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na maM las byung ba'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas dkar ba rgyab sngo ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /phyag g.yas dang pos nor bus mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/ gnyis pa na 'khor lo/

gsum pa na pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa yu ba dang bcas pa/ bzhi pa na dung ngo / /g.yon dang po na bum pa/ gnyis pa na dpal gyi be'u/ gsum pa na nya/ bzhi pa na gdugs bsnams shing bkra shis par mdzad pa'o/ /rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pas bklubs pa'o/ /bkra shis don grub par

byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas thugs kar phreng ba bsnams pa/ g.yon mchog sbyin zhing pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs skyil

krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /zhi ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du swa las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar ser/ zhal bzhi phyag bcu yis g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa/ rnga yab dang / dgra sta dang / me long dang / rdo rje'o/ /g.yon gyi rim pa bzhin du dril bu dang /

ut+pa la dang / gtun shing dang / bum pa dang / 'khor lo'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rig byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas

g.yon thugs kar bkan te/ byang chub mchog dang ldan pa la rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing / zhabs skyil krung gis bum pa'i khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /yid mgyogs ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar

mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas gri gug /g.yon ban+d+ha bsnams pas zhag dang khrag la dgyes pa/ stag gi g.yang gzhi gsol ba/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad cing rkan sgra 'byin pa/ 'jig rten gsum g.yo bar mdzad pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bar mdzad pa'o/ /thod pa can zhes bya ba'i

sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du tAM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag g.yas na bum pa/ g.yon na ce spyang bsnams pa'o/ /na bza' dkar po gsol ba/ zhabs sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis

brgyan pa'o/ /shugs can ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma/ phyag g.yas dang pos phreng ba bsnams pa/ gnyis pa na bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa/ gsum pa na srid pa'i phyag shing / bzhi pa na bum pa

dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i shing / g.yon dang pos nyi zla/ gnyis pas ri rab/ gsum pas pad+ma'i nang nas byung ba'i skyes bu/ bzhi pa na chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /zhabs skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /tshangs pa mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //

pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bza' ri dwags kyi pags pa'i smad g.yogs mnga' ba/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas pus mo la reg pa/ g.yon pa'ang de bzhin du mdzad pa/ ut+pal la dang ut+pal ral gris

mtshan pa'o/ /zhabs rol bas seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /bden par smra ba mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas na rtse gsum ba dan dang bcas pa

bsnams pa/ g.yon na ut+pal bum pas mtshan pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /pha rol las rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la haM las byung ba'i sgrol ma mdog dkar dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa

phyag g.yas ut+pal dang seng ge g.yon lcags kyu bsnams pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /ded dpon chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du maM las skyes pa'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ g.yas pas lcags kyu dang zhags pa/ g.yon

pas lcags sgrog dang dril bu'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya chen po ut+pal la gnas pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /snying rje gnas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu/ zhal gcig phyag

gnyis pa g.yas ut+pal la rta mchog gis mtshan pa'o/ /g.yon pa na nor bu'i za ma tog bsnams pa/ skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /chud mi za bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du paM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar dmar zhal

gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na ut+pa la mar mes mtshan pa bsnams pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /lam rab tu ston par byed pa'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bruM las byung ba'i lha mo

mdog ser mo zhal gsum phyag bzhi g.yas sngo ba g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas rin po che dang bcas pa'i mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon bum pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ tha ma gnyis na mda' gzhu'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /mchog ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub

thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas pa na bum pa/ g.yon pa na lde mig bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dngos grub ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs

so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas bum pa la snying pos mtshan pa/ g.yon rin po ches mtshan pa'i khang pa bsnams pa zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dngos grub ston par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol

ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la trAM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma mdog dmar ser phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon mya ngan med pa'i shing lo bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan dang na bza' bcas pa zhabs skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ lang tsho dang ldan pa'o/ /bud med gzugs can so so 'brang

ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du baM las byung ba'i lha mo dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas mya ngan med pa'i shing la phyag gis 'khyud par brten pa'o/ /g.yon ut+pal dmar po kha bye ba'i nang du glang po che 'dzin pa/ rgyan dang na bza' dang bcas pa/ zhabs

shing rta'i steng du bzhugs pa'o/ /dpag med gnon par byed pa'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma mdog ser mo/ g.yas dgra sta dang g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad dang shing lo'i na bza'

gyon pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /ri khrod ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas pa gri gug /g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa na bza' dang bcas pa zhabs

rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na zhags pa/ g.yon na lcags kyu dang bum pa'o/ /rgyan dang na bza' ser mo bsnams shing rol pas bzhugs

pa'o/ /grub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas ral gri dang g.yon sdig mdzub/ zhags pa dang bcas pa'o/ /rgyan dang na bza' dang bcas pa/ zhabs phyed krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /

gtum mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas dpag bsam gyi shing dang / g.yon bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa/ rgyan dang na bza' dang bcas

pa'o/ /bdud rtsi mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du muM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'i gzhal yas khang bsnams pa/ g.yon na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/ rgyan dang na bza' dang ldan pa zhabs

rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /skal ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la oM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas na rin po che/ g.yon na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/ rgyan dang na bza' dang bcas pa zhabs rol pa dang bcas pas bzhugs

pa'o/ /skal bzang ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma la swa las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas na ri dwags ru ru'i ri mo can bsnams pa/ g.yon na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ rgyan dang na bza' dang bcas pa zhabs rol pa dang

bcas pas rma bya dang / cang shes [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /mdzes par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas mchog sbyin/ g.yon na ut+pal bsnams pa/ rgyan dang na bza' dang bcas

pa/ zhabs phyed krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /'dod pa grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas rin po che'i mdzod nas/ g.yon lcags kyus 'dren par mdzad ma/ zhal rnam par rgyas pa/

rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo dud ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag g.yas na bya khwa ta bsnams shing / g.yon na dbyug

tho bsnams pa/ rgyan rnams kun rdzogs pa/ zhabs kyis ri ma d+ha ra brdzi zhing zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /mthar byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo nag mo/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas g.yon gnyis be con dang sdigs mdzub

'dzin par mdzad ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing zhabs rol pas glang po che la bzhugs pa'o/ /drag cing khro ba'i dbang du gyur pas zhal gdangs pa 'jigs su rung bar blta'o/ /skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu

zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma g.yas gnyis na mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng / g.yon gnyis na glegs bam dang / ut+pal bsnams pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems dpa'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /rab tu sdud par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du hUM las byung

ba'i lha mo mdog nag mo/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas gri gug g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa 'jigs par byed pa skra dang smin ma dmar ser mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas shing khro mo'i lus can zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub

thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ g.yas g.yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis nyi ma dang ut+pal dmar po kha bye ba/ tha ma gnyis na mda' gzhu bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dran byed ma

zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na rtse gsum g.yon na ril ba bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing / mya ngan med pa'i shing la brten pa/ rol pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /

brtul zhugs chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la oM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas na nor bu rin po che/ g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa/ byang chub kyi shing la rgyab brten pa/ zhabs rol

pas bzhugs pa'o/ /phan par brtson pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du maM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang pos skyabs sbyin pa/ 'og ma mda'/ g.yon dang po ut+pal/ 'og mas gzhu

bsnams pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na po ti dang / ut+pal dang bcas pa/ g.yon skyabs sbyin dang ut+pal dang bcas pa'o/ /

rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing zhabs skyil krung dang bcas pa'o/ /gus byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la g+haM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas kyis skyabs sbyin zhing / g.yon na ut+pala'i steng na snyan par smra ba'i sgra dang

bcas pa bsnams pa/ kr-iSh+Na sa ra'i pags pa phrag pa la bkal ba'o/ /bde ba mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri /g.yon na

seng ge kha nang du blta ba'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /ngag gi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la taM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas a shwa ka'i sdong po la 'khyud pa/ g.yon na bum pa bsnams

pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo sngo ljang zhal gsum phyag drug ma g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas g.yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis ral gri dang po ti/ bar ma

gnyis ting nge 'dzin du bsnol ba/ tha ma gnyis na mda' gzhu'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /zhi zhing phra ba zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas 'khor lo g.yon ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa'o/ /

rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /rtag pa ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du saM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas rdo rje rgya gram/ g.yon ne'u le'i rkyal bu bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/

zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /kun 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas rin po che g.yon dar 'phan lce gnyis pa bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang

bas bzhugs pa'o/ /rjes 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na gsil byed bsnams pa/ g.yon na pad+ma la gnas pa'i rgya gram bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol

bas bzhugs pa'o/ /don kun grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas bum pa g.yon lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas

bzhugs pa'o/ /bzang po ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo rgyan thams cad dang ldan ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas na mya ngan med pa'i shing / g.yon mchog sbyin no/ /mdog ser mo zhabs skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /gsang byed

ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la swa las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas na rin po che brtsigs pa bsnams pa/ g.yon ut+pal mchog sbyin dang bcas pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs

pa'o/ /gso byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la tsuM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas rin po che dang bcas pa'i mchog sbyin/ g.yon rin po ches gang ba'i nor bu'i rkyal pa bsnams pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /

nor ster ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas dang po skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa zhes bya

ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la baM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na ut+pal sngon po/ g.yon shel gyi phreng ba bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /bsod nams can zhes bya ba'i

sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis kyis spyi bor rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa/ g.yas kyi 'og ma na ral gri /g.yon gyi 'og ma na shing mya

ngan med pa'i yal ga bzung ba'o/ /gai ta ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hri las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas ril ba spyi blugs dang bcas pa'i mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon ut+pal sngon po dang bcas pa'i skyabs sbyin pa/ rgyan

thams cad dang ldan pa'i na bza' bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo/ g.yas na phreng ba dang dpal

be'u/ g.yon pad+ma dang bum pa bsnams pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bum pa'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa sred len ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig

phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na 'bras kyi snye ma/ g.yon na me long phreng ba dang bcas pa bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dka' thub chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu

zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas skyabs sbyin g.yon ut+pal bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa/ rkun po dang chom rkun las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la dzaM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag

gnyis pa/ g.yas na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa/ g.yon skyabs sbyin pa'i phyag gis ut+pal bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /sbrul las skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo

mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon ut+pal dang bcas pa'i skyabs sbyin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du a

las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa phyag g.yas na zla ba bsnams shing skyabs sbyin par mdzad pa/ g.yon ut+pal bsnams shing skyabs sbyin par mdzad pa/ zhabs rol pas me'i sa bon las gzhal bar mdzad pa'o/ /me las skyob par

byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du oM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon ut+pal dang bcas pa'i skyabs sbyin pa/ zhabs rol ba dang bcas pas glang po che

mnan pa'o/ /glang po che las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar ljang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas skyabs sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas srin lag mthe bong gis mnan pa'o/ /g.yon ut+pal dang bcas pa'i skyabs sbyin pa'o/ /

rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing zhabs rol bas stag la bcibs pa'o/ /stag las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la laM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngo ljang / zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas skyabs sbyin zhing / g.yon ut+pal thugs kar skyabs sbyin dang bcas pas

bzung ba'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing zhabs rol bas chu'i steng du bzhugs pa'o/ /chu las skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du hriHlas byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ g.yas

skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon ut+pal la'i steng du lcags kyus mtshan pa bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas mi'i dbang po mnan pa'o/ /rang gi lus kyi 'od zer dmar pos de'i lus bkang la rang gi gnas su bzhag go/ /zhi mdzad ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //de nas thub pa'i lha mo zhes bya

ba'i sgrol ma ni/ sngar bstan pa'i cho ga las bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du sa bon lnga pa'i sde tshan gyi dang po la dang po gnyis pas mnan la zla tshes phyed pa'i thig les brgyan pa'o/ /de las grub pa'i sgrol ma bsgom par bya'o/ /mchog tu rnam par mdzes ma/ zhal gcig pa yid du 'ong ba mo ljang gu phyag

gnyis ma/ g.yas mchog sbyin pa g.yon ut+pal 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bsam mo/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo'i sen mo bkab la srin lag nang du bcug ste mthe bong mnan pa ni ut+pal kha bye ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM tA re

tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ de nas snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas dzaHdang hUM la sogs pas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la gzhug cing dbang du bya'o/ /gnas gsum la ni rdo rje gsum/ /byin gyis brlabs la sku la sogs/ /'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje dang / /oM AHhUM las rtag pa

dang / /'od dpag med dang mi bskyod pa/ /de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /snga ma'i tshul can spyan drangs te/ /dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni/ 'od dpag med kyis spyi bor brgyan/ /de nas sa bon las byung ba'i/ /'od kyi lha yi spro bsdu las/ /skyo na

thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros snod bcud ma lus zhu/ /bdag kyang sa bon de dag las/ /shin tu phra bar bsam mi khyab/ /rnam par mi rtog de dmigs shing / /nam mkha'i dkyil ltar rab dben pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de nas skyo na bzlas pa ni/ /'bum phrag

bzhi'am 'on te drug /'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis/ /'di don nyams su gang len pa/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba'i/ sgrol ma yum mchog nyid gyur nas/ /dngos grub gnyis sogs 'thob 'gyur te/ /yon tan dpag med 'byung bar

gsungs/ /de ltar stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid srid pa gsum skyes zad nges shes dang ni/ /shes bya gnyis su med sku kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs yum/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyud 'dzin legs bkod pa las bsod nams dri ma med/ /bdag gis gang

thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob shog /lha mo sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o/ /slad kyis rgya

gar gyi paN+Di ta dA na shI la dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba blo gros grags pas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ A yuR+War+d+ha ni bid+hiH/ bod skad du/ tshe 'phel ba'i cho ga /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas

sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ skyil mo krung du bzhugs par bsgoms te/ thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sa bon gyi yi ge blta'o/ /de la 'od 'phros pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa sku mdog dkar po mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya can yum dang

bcas pa/ phyag gi steng na rin po che'i bum pa can gyi mdun du mi bskyod pa sngon po g.yas pa sa gnon/ g.yon rin po che'i bum pa can gyis yum la 'khyud pa/ g.yas su rin 'byung gser btso ma'i mdog can phyag g.yas mchog sbyin/ g.yon ni snga ma'i tshul dang mtshungs so/ /rgyab tu rnam snang

dmar po/ g.yas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can/ g.yon du don yod grub pa ljang gu skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya can te rigs lnga dang / yum thams cad ni rang snang gi yum mo/ /de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor bar dmigs te/ skyabs 'gro la sogs pa tshul

bzhin du bya'o/ /tshe 'phel bar gsol ba gdab pa ni/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a mi tA b+hA wa ti ta thA ga ta/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twa s+ya a haM A yuR+War+d+ha ni/ prA Na war+d+ha ni/ dzI ba war+d+ha ni/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ zhes pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa yab rnams kyis so so'i yum la bskul

te tshe'i dngos grub brtan par byas nas/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te 'dug par bsam/ bdag nyid kyang spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga kha phye ste snying ga'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i 'byung ba bzhi'i rtsa kha phye ste/ rtsa thams cad so sor kha phye bar bsam/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis bdag la 'chi med kyi dbang bskur te/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun tshangs pa'i bu ga nas blugs pas rtsa thams cad khengs pa dang / khyad par du chu skyes kyi rtsa lnga gang bas srog 'dzin pa rnal du tshud de 'chi ba med par bsam zhing sngags 'di nyer gcig bzlas so/ /oM tA

re tut+tA re tu re A yuR+War+d+ha ka d+ha b+h+yaHswA hA/ zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snang ba mtha' yas la 'dus te/ de dbu rgyan gyi tshul du bdag gi spyi bor byon pas tshe brtan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan rnams gshegs su gsol/ des skyo nas ldang bar 'dod na mi dmigs pas zin pa'i dge ba bsngo'o/ /

snga ma ltar thun bzhi la sogs pa bsgoms na zla ba drug gis 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ci rigs pas kyang 'phel lo/ /sgrol ma tshe spel ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //ma hA paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta'i zhal

snga nas/ lo tsA ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA tA rA sto tra na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal chen mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba'i grong khyer 'jug la grong sgo'i mi mo bzod

byas 'dra ba dang / /rgyal ba'i lam du 'jug la dbyibs can mdun na gnas pa'i gzhung lam lta bu dang / /shin tu bzlog par dka'i ba'i bdud kyi rgyu las thar mdzad yang na gsang sngags lha/ /kho bo blo gros blun po 'dis ni dpal chen mo bstod bgyi ba ji lta lags/ /gang yang rgyal sras bde bar

gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin sa bcu'i pha rol phyin rnams kyi/ /khyod kyi yon tan rin chen tshogs ni gsal mdzad lha rnams kyis kyang glu len te/ /de lta na yang gus pa 'ba' zhig gis bstod lha mo bdag la bzod mdzod kye/ /mi shes byis pa yis ni rang gi ma la thal gyis 'thor ba min nam ci/ /mtha'

dag mi dbang 'dus pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rnams kyis btud byas 'dam skyes zhabs/ /gdugs dkar thig le gyen du 'bar zhing sa bdag khyed kyi 'dod pa yis ni 'gyur/ /rnam rgyas rdzing bur skyes pa'i 'od 'phrog spyan gyis gang la gzigs gyur de la ni/ /bcom ldan glang chen seng ge'i gdan rta shing rta rkang

thang mchog rnams rjes su 'gro/ /rang gi phyag gi stobs kyis nyer skyes rnam grangs pha rol gnon pas dgra rnams thul/ /'bar ba chen po dkyil 'khor mchog gi phun sum tshogs gyur mi bdag rnams la ni/ /ster bar bsngags shing nges 'byed sngags kyi yul la mi dbang blon po'i blor gyur la/ /

ri skyibs zab mor sa phug zab mo'i gzhi la rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rab tu myos pa pad+ma'i tshal la ma la yar rlung dal bus g.yo zhing bskyod/ /'dab ma rnams la phul byung bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar glu len me tog gi/ /'byung gnas ya mtshan mdzes ma khyod yin lha mo khyod kyi

bsngags pa rnams kyis ni/ /rgyal srid 'bras bu 'grub mdzad 'gram rgyas rtsi logs myos chu'i mtshan la 'gro// khyed zhabs bka' drin gyis ni rang dbang khang pa'i skyed mos tshal la yun ring du/ /rtsed mos spro la spyan mig drag tu g.yo zhing dga' mchog rnams kyis ni/ /zhal gyi pad+ma'i dbugs rlung

gis bskyod bud med rnams dang nye bar longs spyad nas/ /de ni a mra sar pas bran las dri zhim sbrang rtsi rnams la 'thung bar 'gyur/ /rab dga'i nags la me tog khur 'phyang myos pa'i skad snyan khu byug gis khyab cing / /sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bung ba tshogs pa'i dar dir ldan la so ga'i dpal yin

te/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho rlabs phreng g.yo bar bzhad gad ku mu da yi 'byung gnas dang / /shel gyi sa gzhi bla gab med par phul byung zla ba'i cha shas nyid lags/ /bzo bos byas pa'i rtsed mo'i ri rtser bkod pa zla ba nor bu'i chu rgyun ni/ /bsrubs pa 'khrul 'khor chu srin kha nas 'thon cing rnyog

bral lhung lhung sgrogs pa'i chu/ /dpyid dus chang gis myos zhing tshim pa'i khu byug skad snyan sgrogs pa'i nam mkha' la/ /sa skyong gis sprul khang pa dpe med pa la rab tu gnas mdzad khyed nyid lags/ /glang chen mche ba mnyen la bzo bos skar khung dra mig las 'thon bya 'dab la/ /gnas

shing rnam par sgeg bcas myos pa'i phug ron sgra snyan mgrin pa nas grag ste/ /nor bu'i rkang gdub mchog tu 'jam zhing sil khrol bskyod pa btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sa skyong dag gi khyim la ti se'i gangs mtshungs phun sum tshogs pa khyed nyid las/ /nu mar nyer bzhag lag pa

gcig gis smad gos gsher ba g.yo ba'i mtha' bzung ste/ /rkyal zhing rtsed mo'i bde ba yun ring myos nas khang pa'i rdzing bu nas 'thon cing / /skye bo 'dris pas skra rtse zlum shing cung zad zur mig lta ba tsha ba'i dus/ /ri mo bris 'dra'i yan lag mchog ma rnams dang nyams dga' khyed kyi mthu yis su/ /

zla ba'i chos las brdungs shing 'khrul 'khor khang khyim rtsed mo'i ri las bab/ /rab tu myos pa'i nags kyi nye logs pad+ma'i ljon shing khang par sa bdag rnams/ /rgyun chad med par rlung yab dal bus g.yabs pa yis ni dbu skra g.yo zhing bskyod/ /nyi ma tsha ba'i dus la khyed kyi bka' drin las ni

nyin zhag 'da' bar 'gyur/ /chu 'bab sprin tshogs 'brug sgra sgrogs shing rma bya'i dkyil 'khor kun nas skad snyan 'don/ /'dam skyes me thon la ni 'jam rlung rab tu g.yo zhing glu dbyangs chu gter dus/ /snyan dngags mkhas pa'i dri zas bskor zhing 'jam pos bsnun pa'i

gting ring rnga skad kyis/ /khang pa'i nang rnams yongs su gang ba khyed 'dod pas ni rgyun du thos par 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi'i chang gis myos shing rig 'dzin grub pa'i chung ma'i chu skyes zhal la btud byas las/ /lhung ba'i man+d+ha ra yi rdul gyi kun nas mdog ser ma pad mtsho las rgyal/ /lha yi grong

khyer gzhal med khang gi lha mo'i skye bo dam 'khyud spro ba la/ /khyed kyi mchog la sgrub pa po rnams bde nyid nyin rer rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs 'gugs sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs sprul rdo rje'i gur gyis me stag 'bar ba la/ /bgegs kyi gtso bo rnams ni skrag cing 'jigs

pas rgya mtsho dag tu 'bros 'gyur te/ /myur bar bskyod pa gtum po'i hUM yig sgra yis bsnun pas sgra ldan lcags sgrog gtor/ /lha mo khyed kyi gsang sngags zlos pa'i khang par rang nyid 'du zhing 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gar gnas khang sa'i skyor la glu dbyangs 'du sar rab brdungs gting ring rnga

skad kyis/ /'dris shing yid 'ong gling bu'i rjes 'gro'i sgra dbyangs nye bar longs spyod mdzad nas ni/ /de rjes gya tshom bung ba me tog snyim par gar gyi cho ga yid 'phrog la/ /rab tu myos ma rnams kyis khyed nyid gar gyi dpon por nges par gar gyi lha/ /rgyun chad med par lag pa'i rtsol ba'i

bya bas bsnun pa'i yid 'ong rdza rnga'i bzhin/ /g.yer ka'i sgra yis myur bar rnam rol 'degs shing rma bya'i mjug sgro rna bar btsugs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas shing yid 'ong snod ldan skye bos yongs gang khang khyim la/ /khyed la brten pas bde ldan glu dbyangs bde ba nyin rer bde la longs spyod

'gyur/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni gdugs dkar seng ge'i gdan dang gser gyi bum pa rnga yab dang / /zla zer dkar ba'i bsil khang mgyogs 'gro'i phreng ba dri zhim chang ldan glang chen rnams/ /khyed kyi gzugs brnyan rtag tu dran byed bud med de yi rna lung rin chen 'od/ /lha mo cung zad bzhad pa'i

rnam pas rnam par rgyal ba de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /skad snyan ngang pa'i dbyangs ni mchog tu 'gying 'gro nor bu'i rkang gdub sgra yis pham/ /'gram logs dkyil 'khor 'jam rlung gis bdar g.yo zhing 'khyil pa'i sgra yis mdud pa 'byed/ /rked smad mdoms kyi cha ni 'od 'phro'i do

shal nu ma'i khung bu'i ljid kyis dud/ /lha mos gang la gzigs pa de la rnga yab dkar 'dzin bud med 'du bar 'gyur/ /rgyun mi 'chad par lha mo khyod kyi yon tan rjes dran mi skyo gang yin de/ /nor bu'i rang bzhin zhal ba'i gzhi mar zla zer lo 'dab rnams la 'gying ba yis/ /nu mar lag gcig

nyer gzhag bud med skye bo dag gis bzung ba'i ga bur chu/ /kha 'bus ut+pal sngon po dri ldan sbrang rtsi 'thungs 'gyur mi 'jigs sbyin pa kye/ /mo btsun rnams kyi 'gram pa'i logs la rna rgyan mchog tu 'gying zhing rgod/ /spyan mig la yang khro ba so mas bskyed pa'i mchi ma'i chu yis dba'

rlabs g.yo/ /mkhregs shing 'bur ba nu ma so ma'i tshogs la gur gum 'dam gyis kha dog ser/ /rab rib sngon po dbu skra me tog kha 'bus tshogs la'ang mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /sprul byas pad+ma rA ga'i stegs la 'gre ldog 'gyur ba lha mo'i skye bo las/ /sprul te gcal bkram

mu tig do shal gyis khyab rin chen ljon shing khang pa'i nang / /des lhung me tog rdul gyis kun nas yongs bsgos dga' ba'i sa yi dkyil 'khor la/ /bcom ldan 'das ma khyed kyi zhabs zung mchod byed gang de yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /skad cig re rer rnga ring rdza rnga mtha' dag brdungs pa'i

sgra yis rkang pa 'gying / /glang po mdzangs pa'i spyi la lag pa'i rna lcag rab 'god phyed btsugs mig /a mra sar bran dri zhim 'bab cing 'gram pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ldan glang chen rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das ma mi gang yud tsam dran byed de la 'du bar 'gyur/ /spyi bo phug pas steng du 'bur

te rna ba'i rnga yab dang ni lcags kyu g.yo/ /rkang pa srung byed rnams kyi rnam mang ca co'i bde bas chu thigs zer ma 'thor/ /rab tu rgol ba'i glang chen chang gis khong 'khrugs khyed mtshan grags pa las/ /glang po mi rnams g.yul 'gyed pa na dgra bo'i sgrib pa rnams kyis sgrib par 'gyur/ /gser

gyi rang bzhin ri yi skyibs dang lha yi skyed mos tshal gyi khang pa dang / /mjug sgro rnam par rgyas pa'i rma bya rtsed mor gnas pa sa bdag khang pa dang / /nam mkha' chu bo'i rlabs kyis byas pa dri med rin chen ljon shing khang pa dang / /bud med skye bo'i zhal gyi pad+ma'i 'byung gnas la yang gnas

mdzad khyed nyid do/ /pad+ma'i skyo ma sbrang rtsi'i khu ba'i chang gi btung bas sred cing bskor/ /sbrang bu'i tshogs pas dar dir mang ldan me tog tshogs pa'i dri zhim ldan/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po rab dga'i tshogs kyis zos te pad+ma'i gzhon nus mche ba gtsigs/ /pad+ma'i lha mo'i ze 'bru'i rdul gyi

mdog ser rlabs ldan yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rgyal ba dkon mchog cod pan spyi bor ldan pa pad+ma'i rigs/ /khyod nyid kun don mdzad par lha rnams kyis kyang bstod de mang po smra mod kyi/ /de slad lha mo khyod kyis bstod pa 'di yis mchog tu dge ba bdag gis

kyang / /gang thob de yis 'gro ba khyad gsod dbul ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar shog /paN+Di ta chen po tsan+t+ra go mis mdzad pa'i dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal snga nas/ lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis lo tsA ba blo gros rgyal

pos bsgyur ba las cung zad dag par byas so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA sto tra da sha dwI gA thA/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzlog dka'i srid

pa'i mun pa ni/ /'joms byed nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' ba'i/ /sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud/ /shin tu rmongs pa'i sems can gyis/ /glang po che rnams gsod byed ma/ /lha mo seng ge khros pa yang / /khyod 'dud pa las 'jigs shing bros/ /mche

ba'i mdung rtse rtse mo yis/ /brag 'joms shing drung rtsa ba 'don/ /khyod kyi sngags kyis bzlas pa las/ /'jigs shing glang po 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa'i/ /du bas khyab cing bzod par dka'/ /'bar ba yis ni khro tshig pa/ /khyod bstod char pa me zhir

'gyur/ /ma rungs gdengs ka las byung ba'i/ /phuT sgra sgrogs shing dug mig can/ /sbrul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas/ /nam mkha' lding ni bzhin du 'joms/ /ral gris gcod pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ /khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste/ /khyod kyi ming tsam dran pa yis/ /chom

rkun nus pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal po khros pa'i bran rnams kyis/ /skra nas bzung nas zhags pas bcings/ /btson ra spangs nas lha mo kye/ /khyod la bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur/ /dba' rlabs tshogs ni nam mkha' dang / /phyogs bcur yang ni khyab byed pa/ /gru log

na yang rgya mtsho las/ /khyod kyis 'phangs nas pha rol phyin/ /khrag dang glad pa'i 'dam gyis byugs/ /de dag bza' ba la chags pa/ /lha mo khyod kyi sngags bzlas pas/ /sha za de dag 'jigs par 'gyur/ /yan lag chad cing dri ngan pa'i/ /khrag dang zhag ni sna la 'dzag/ /

khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /mdze can 'dod pa'i lha 'drar 'gyur/ /bkres skom gyis gdungs gcer bu dang / /slong ba'i yi dwags 'gro ba la/ /khyod la 'dud pa tsam gyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /'jigs pa chen po 'jigs med pa/ /de ltar dad pas

khyod bstod pas/ /dge ba gang bsags de yis ni/ /'jig rten bde ba can thob shog /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/ tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA sto traM b+hi sa karmA

sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa phrin las sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tAM yig ljang gu ut+pal las byung ba'i/ /sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /phyag gnyis sku la rin chen sna tshogs spras/ /yi dam

sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /don grub la sogs rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing / /bcu drug lo lon 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang ldan/ /gzi brjid bzod dka' sna tshogs lhag par 'dud/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag g.yas mchog sbyin phyag g.yon ut+pal 'dzin/ /sna

tshogs pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gyis rab tu bzhugs/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la rtag tu gzigs/ /sku la 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sgrol ma 'phro/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal

kun las sgrol byed pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dang / /las tshogs thams cad myur du grub mdzad ma/ /phrin las thams cad yongs su grub byed pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom

rkun dang / /lcags sgrog chu dang bgegs dang 'jigs pa brgyad/ /'jigs pa kun las yongs su sgrol byed pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gdon dang rims dang smyo 'bog la sogs dang / /gnod byed la sogs dus min 'chi bas skrag /sdug bsngal thams cad rab

tu zhi byed pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /skye bo sngon bsags las dang nyon mongs kyi/ /mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu sogs sdig /sdig pa'i las rnams bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /de dag thams cad ma lus byang bar shog /bdag ni da ltar skye ba 'di la yang / /

rmi ngan mtshan ngan 'chi ltas dus min skrag /bkra mi shis pa thams cad dag gyur nas/ /tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod rgyas par shog /bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du/ /yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas/ /mchog dang thun mong dngos grub la sogs pa/ /las tshogs

thams cad yid bzhin grub par shog /yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje che ldan pa/ /bdag gis rab tu brtse ba'i gdung sems kyis/ /bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang bsags des/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha dang mi 'bral shog /'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa phrin las thams cad

sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA de bI sto tra puSh+pa mA li nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa me tog phreng ba zhes bya ba/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la gzigs pa'i/ /zhabs kyi pad+mo la ni btud de/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir du/ /lhag pa'i lha la bstod par bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal sgrol ma lha yi lha khyod/ /dngos grub ma lus kun

gyi 'byung gnas/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che ltar/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal ngo mtshar khyad du 'phags pa'i/ /yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i sku la/ /ye shes lnga yi rang mdangs rgyas pas/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro ma/ /phyag 'tshal

chu bzhi'i pha rol legs gnas/ /las dang nyon mongs srid las rnam grol/ /sangs rgyas yon tan phyir mi ldog pa'i/ /sa lam ma lus mtha' ru phyin ma/ /phyag 'tshal srid pa'i dra ba 'joms mdzad/ /thugs kyi snying po yi ge bcu pas/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang

mngon spyod/ /phrin las 'od kyis nam mkha' gang ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'gro ba'i skyabs mchog sgrol ma/ /bud med gzugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug sras mo/ /'phags pa'i spyan chab las ni 'khrungs ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'gran zla med

pa'i sku mchog /zag med bde rgyas zla ba'i gdan la/ /bzhugs pa'i zhabs kyi pad+mo la ni/ /lha dang lha min cod pan gtugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal che ba'i nang na che mchog /'byung po ro langs ma rungs tshogs 'joms/ /gzhan gyis mi thub drag rtsal chen mo/ /stobs chen

pha rol gnon par mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi zhabs la/ /skyabs pa'i mi de mya ngan 'das thob/ /mchog gi don chen 'grub par mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma/ /rigs drug bur 'dzin brtse ba'i thugs kyi/ /

snying rje chen po'i gru gzings kyis ni/ /srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol ma/ /phyag 'tshal phongs pa kun las skyob mdzad/ /'tsho bas mnar te mchu mgul skams nas/ /bkres pas khyod la gsol ba btab pas/ /longs spyod mi zad char rgyun 'bebs ma/ /phyag 'tshal

dpa' mo rdo rje sgrol ma/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can/ /rdo rje la sogs phyag mtshan brgyad kyis/ /phrin las rnams kyi 'gro don mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal skye 'gro rnams la dbang sgyur/ /'jig rten gsum na mthu rtsal ldan pa'i/ /dregs pas myos pa rnams kyi

cod pan/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi mthil gyis brdzis ma/ /phyag 'tshal thub dbang stobs bcu'i rtsal ldan/ /sku lnga'i rang bzhin khyab bdag chen mo/ /bsrung med gsum dang ma 'dres dran gsum/ /yongs su dag pa bzhi pa mnga' ma/ /phyag 'tshal srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol/ /ye shes

sku la rdzu 'phrul thogs med/ /thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i dri ma dag ma/ /phyag 'tshal mthu stobs bdag mo'i snying po/ /yi ge bcu pa spyi bor btags nas/ /dpung tshogs sde bzhi'i nang du phyin pas/ /pha rol dmag gi g.yul ngo bzlog ma/ /

phyag 'tshal mkhyen dang brtse ba'i bdag nyid/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam thar mang pos/ /brgyan pa'i gter mdzad dpal gyi be'ur/ /shes bya'i dkyil mtha' rtag tu chud ma/ /phyag 'tshal nyi ma 'bum gyi mdangs can/ /shes rab chen po'i 'od zer 'bar bas/ /khams gsum sems

can rnams kyi rgyud la/ /ma rig sgo nga'i mun rum sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid/ /dpal ldan dri ma med pa'i sku la/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras ma/ /phyag 'tshal khams gsum dbang du sdud ma/ /tshangs pa khyab

'jug ma hA de ba/ /lha chen rnams kyi dbu yi cod pan/ /khyod kyi zhabs la rab tu btud ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'jigs pa kun las skyob mdzad/ /me dang chu dang rgyal po'i chad pa/ /stag dang seng ge sbrul dang srin po/ /glang po che yi bred dngangs sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal byin rlabs rmad du gyur

ma/ /'byung ba 'khrugs dang gdon gyis bskyed pa'i/ /srog 'phrog nad kyi bye brag ma lus/ /khyod la gsol btab gdung ba sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal btsun mo rin chen cha byad/ /smin ma'i bar nas mdzod spu 'od 'bar/ /spyan dkyus ut+pal 'dab 'dra'i 'dzum mdangs/ /thugs rje chags pas

'gro la gzigs ma/ /phyag 'tshal stong nyid snying rje'i lcags kyus/ /'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'gro ba 'dren mdzad/ /shul nor 'phrang la thugs rjes bzung nas/ /thar pa'i lam la khrid par mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal bdud bzhi 'joms par mdzad ma/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos rje btsun ma khyod/ /

phung po lnga spangs lnga yi bdag nyid/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs nyon mongs spangs ma/ /phyag 'tshal dge legs gzi brjid chen mo/ /zhal bzangs bcu drug zla ba rgyas 'dra'i/ /'od kyis skye 'gro rnams kyi rgyud la/ /shes rab dpal dang blo gros spel ma/ /phyag 'tshal bud med sgyu

'phrul khyod la/ /mA ma kI dang spyan ma gos dkar/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis/ /che ba'i che mchog rnams kyis bstod ma/ /phyag 'tshal hUM gi sbyor ba dang ldan/ /gnas gsum du ni de nyid bkod pas/ /nus pa'i rdzu 'phrul mtha' la rgyas nas/ /phrin las bzhi yi rtsal dang

ldan ma/ /phyag 'tshal dge ba rgyas par mdzad ma/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar bas/ /mun pa rang sar dag pa bzhin du/ /khyod bsgoms sgrib pa spong bar byed ma/ /phyag 'tshal phrin las du ma'i bdag mo/ /khyod sku sna tshogs ngo bo shel bzhin/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan gcig tu

ma nges/ /gang la nye bar tha dad 'char ma/ /phyag 'tshal don dam rgyal ba'i yum las/ /ma g.yos kun rdzob lha mo'i gzugs can/ /sku mdog sngo ljang gar gyi nyams dgus/ /bde gsal mi rtog pa yis 'gying ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'khor ba'i g.yul ngo bzlog ma/ /nga bdag

dngos por zhen pa'i snying la/ /spros bral ye shes ral gri bsnun nas/ /gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i dpa' bo gsod ma/ /phyag 'tshal tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i dbu skra/ /mthon mthing lcang lo 'khyil pa'i dbus na/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med las/ /thugs rje'i

'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro mdzad/ /gang gis me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa/ /klog gam kha don 'don par byed pa/ /de yis bsod nams dpag med 'thob cing / /sdig sgrib stobs chen ma lus dag 'gyur/ /gang zhig skye bo tha mal rnams kyis/ /'di 'don pa de dge sbyong du 'gyur/ /

gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis rlob 'gyur/ /su yis blo la bstod pa 'di 'dzin/ /'dul khrims sdom pa dam tshig rnams kyi/ /nyes byas sbom pa rtsa ltung dri ma/ /ma lus dag nas dngos grub thob 'gyur/ /'di 'don blo yi pad+ma

kha 'byed/ /rgol ba ngan pa'i lung rigs tshar gcod/ /rig pa'i gnas la shes rab chen po/ /zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel 'gyur/ /e ma bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di ni/ /lan cig yid la dran pa tsam gyis/ /zhing mchog dam pa bde ba can der/ /the tshom med par nges par skye 'gyur/ /'gro

ba'i skyabs mchog rje btsun ma la/ /bdag gis me tog phreng bas bstod pa'i/ /dge ba gru gzings lta bu des ni/ /srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol 'gyur/ /me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa 'di ni/ /rje btsun ma la lnga brgya pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i khur che ba'i yon
