tan du ma dang ldan pa/ /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA re de bI sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bzlog dka' srid pa'i mun pa ni/ /'joms byed nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud/ /shin tu rno ba'i sems rnams kyis/ /glang po che rnams gsol byed pa/ /lha mo seng ge khros pa yang / /khyod bstod pa las

'jigs shing 'bros/ /mche ba'i mdung rtse rnon po yis/ /brag 'joms shing gi rtsa ba 'don/ /khyod kyi sngags ni bzlas pa las/ /'jigs shing glang chen 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa/ /du bas khyab cing bzod par dka'/ /'bar ba yis ni khro tshig pa/ /khyod

bstod char pas me zhir 'gyur/ /ma rungs gdengs ka las byung ba'i/ /phuT sgra sgrogs shing dug mang can/ /sbrul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas/ /nam mkha' lding ni bzhin du 'jigs/ /ral gris gcod cing 'dral ba rnams/ /khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste/ /khyod kyi ming tsam dran pa

yis/ /chom rkun nus pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal po khros pas bran rnams kyi/ /skra nas bzung zhing zhags pas bcings/ /btson ra spangs te lha mo kye/ /khyod la bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur/ /dba' rlabs tshogs kyis phyogs bcu dang / /nam mkha' yang dag khyab byed pa/ /gru

log na yang rgya mtsho las/ /khyod kyi 'phangs ni pha rol phyin/ /khrag dang klad pa'i 'dam gyis byugs/ /de dag bza' ba la chags pa/ /khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni/ /sha za de ltar 'jigs par 'gyur/ /yan lag chad cing dri nga ba/ /khrag dang rnag ni sna nas 'dzag /khyod la bstod pa

tsam gyis ni/ /mdze can 'dod pa'i lha 'drar 'gyur/ /bkres skom kyis gdungs gcer bu dang / /slong ba yi dwags dang 'dra ba/ /khyod la bstod pa tsam kyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa/ /de ltar sems nas khyod bstod pas/ /dge ba gang

bsags de yis ni/ /'jig rten bde ba can thob shog /'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom rkun dang / /lcags sgrog chu dang sha za'i 'jigs pa ni/ /'joms mdzad zla 'od phung po ltar 'dzin ma/ /sgrol

ma bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal 'dud//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rASh+Ta b+ha ya tra ta nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i bdag

po lhan cig skyes pa'i chos sku de bzhin du/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku ste pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du yangs pa'i spyan/ /rnal 'byor dag par rnam par thar gyur srid dang srid las bral ba'i sku gsung thugs chags pa/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med lha dang lha min mis mchod de

la phyag 'tshal te/ /skye 'jig rnam par spangs phyir chos nyid mi 'gyur yang dag nyid du dbyer med kyang / /'khrul bcas 'gro ba'i don phyir sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las khyad par gsang sngags lam/ /sgrib pa myur 'joms sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gzugs 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum/ /

'jigs pa brgyad las sgrol ba 'di deng sgrub la dga' phyir dad pas brtsam par bya/ /dad ldan rab brtson dam tshig ldan/ /rje btsun sgrub la dga' ba yis/ /rnam par 'tshe med dben pa'i gnas/ /nyams dga' dngos grub 'byung gnas su/ /rten dang mchod rdzas sna

tshogs pa/ /bshams nas bde ba'i stan nyid la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul gyis/ /phyi nang khrus kyis dag byas te/ /de nas rang gi snying ga ru/ /nga ro dang po las byung ba'i/ /chu shel dbus su yi ge ni/ /sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la/ /lnga pa'i tha ma'i thig les brgyan/ /de yi 'od

kyis rje btsun dang / /'phags pa'i tshogs rnams spyan drangs te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ /gti mug ldongs pa'i sems can gyi/ /ma rig mun pa sel mdzad ma/ /bde gshegs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri zhim me tog thams cad dang / /a ga ru sogs bdug spos

dang / /rab tu mun sel sgron me dang / /ga pur la sogs dri yi mchog /gtsang sbyar bshos dang gzhan yang ni/ /sgra snyan la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs/ /thams cad dbul te sngags dang ni/ /phyag rgya'i rgyas kyang gdab par bya/ /'khor ba thog ma med bar du/ /sdig bgyis

gang lags ma lus pa/ /da lta nyid du bshags bgyis nas/ /slan chad nam yang mi bgyid do/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs 'phags rnams dang / /'gro ba kun gyi dge ba ni/ /zag med zag dang bcas pa la/ /bsam pas rjes su yi rang ngo / /'gro mgon sprin bral nyi ma yi/ /

dkyil 'khor rgyas par gyur rnams la/ /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /rgyal ba zag med dbyings nyid du/ /mya ngan 'das gzigs bzhed rnams la/ /ji srid 'khor ba gnas kyi bar/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol/ /don

dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med/ /rnam par mi rtog chos sku las/ /gzugs sku lta bu'i tshul 'chang ba'i/ /'gro mgon khyed la skyabs su mchi/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed ltar/ /bdag kyang 'gro rnams bsgral ba'i phyir/ /byang chub

mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs bgyis pa las/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des/ /sems can ma lus sangs rgyas kyi/ /sa ni myur du thob par shog /'gro ba bde dang phrad la sogs/ /tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya/ /de nas 'phags rnams

gshegs byas la/ /brtan g.yo'i chos kun stong par bsgom/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas chu skyes steng du ni/ /chu shel de steng sa bon no/ /de yongs gyur las ut+pal/ /sa bon nyid kyis mtshan pa'o/ /de yi 'od kyis skye dgu rnams/ /sbyangs nas yongs gyur

bcom ldan ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dUr ba'i mdog /bcu drug na tshod rgyan rnams rdzogs/ /mchog sbyin pa dang ut+pal/ /g.yas dang g.yon du shes bya ste/ /phyed krung gis bzhugs 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ /mtsho steng rin chen brag phug nang / /ltos 'gros zhabs brten bsgom

par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi dang po ni/ /maM dang praM las lha mo ni/ /'od zer can dang so so 'brang / /gser mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /rgyan mdzes g.yon na shing lo ni/ /mya ngan med dang rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yas pa 'dud pa'i tshul du'o/ /g.yas kyi 'og mar phag gdong

ma/ /pA la sha mdog rgyan gyis mdzes/ /chos 'chad pa yi phyag rgya can/ /g.yon gyi 'og mar khro gnyer ma/ /mig sman mdog can khro mo'i tshul/ /gri gug thod khrag bsnams pa'o/ /de dag rnams kyi phyogs mtshams ni/ /brgyad na 'jigs pa rnam pa brgyad/ /bgegs dang dgra dang

glang chen dang / /me dang sbrul dang mi rgod dang / /lcags sgrog gis bcings chu rnams las/ /skyob byed sgrol ma brgyad 'phro ba/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /snga ma'i tshul can spyan drangs la/ /mchod

nas yi ge bzhi po yis/ /gnyis su med par bstim par bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du/ /byin gyis brlab bya de yi rjes/ /dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni/ /don yod grub pas spyi gtsug brgyan/ /de nas sa bon las byung ba'i/ /'od kyi spro bsdu cung zad bya/ /skyo na gsang

sngags bzlas pa ni/ /yi ge bcu pa bgrang bar bya/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ 'bum phrag gsum mam yang na drug /'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub/ /gal te 'byung po rnams la ni/ /gtor ma sbyin na snod gtsang du/ /zan blugs cho gas

byin brlabs te/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las/ /mdzub gnyis gung mo gnyis po la/ /legs bcang ba ni ut+pal/ /kha 'byed pa'i ni phyag rgya ste/ /gnas gsum dag tu gtugs byas nas/ /'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NAM Ad+ya

nut+pan+na twAta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ las kyi yan lag thams cad ni/ /rgyas par rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir/ /'di ru ma bkod de ru blta/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis/ /'di don nyams su len byed na/ /dngos dang dngos med zad gtso bo/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /skye dang zag

pa rnam spangs pa/ /dpal ldan yum nyid thob 'gyur te/ /bum pa bzang sogs dngos grub dang / /gzhan yang gsad dang bskrad dang dbye/ /dgug dang zhi dang rgyas pa yi/ /las 'grub 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /de ltar stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid srid pa gsum skyes zad

dngos shes dang ni/ /shes bya gnyis su med sku kun du bzang po spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs yum/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyud bzhin legs bkod pa las bsod nams dri ma med/ /bdag gis gang thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob shog /'phags pa

'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba las/ slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' dA na shI la dang /

bod kyi lo tsA ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sI ta tA rA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du zla ba drug gi bar/ /sgrol ma'i

'khor lo bsgom pa'o/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob 'gyur zhing / /'chi ba'i skyon gyis mi gos pa'i/ /ngag gi dbang phyug gnang byas pa/ /'chi bdag slu ba bsdus pa las/ /phyung nas sgrol ma dkar mo ni/ /bsgoms na 'jigs pa nyams byed pa/ /bzhi pa'i sde tshan dang po a/ /bcas las

nam mkhar 'od zer 'phro/ /pad dkar zla ba'i gdan bltas la/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro yang brjod la/ /rang bzhin sgro btags gzhom phyir du/ /skad cig stong pa nyid du blta/ /de nas sngon gyi smon lam dbang / /byang chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom/ /pad+ma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /

zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du ni/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas ma /mchog sbyin pa dang ut+pal bsnams/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od gnas can/ /zla ba la ni rgyab brten cing / /rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs/ /bcu drug lo lon lus can ma/ /sangs rgyas kun dang de sras kyi/ /yum ni

'dod pa'i gzugs can ma/ /sgrol ma de yi thugs kar bsgom/ /'khor lo dkar po 'od zer can/ /re'u mig brgyad la yi ge brgyad/ /yongs su bskor bar bya ba'o/ /oM hA gsal byed dbus gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni lte bar bya/ /zla drug rtse gcig pa yi yid/ /nges par

brtan pa rtag tu bya/ /yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /mi skyo'i yid kyis bzlas bya ste/ /oM gyi yi ge dang por sbyin/ /phyis ni tA re rab tu sbyar/ /tut+tA re la tu re phyis/ /swA hA mtha' ru las kun byed/ /tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang / /drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang / /ba spu'i

rtse mo'ang gcod mi nus/ /'chi bdag las rgyal sgrol ma bzhin/ /skra dkar gnyer ma skal ngan nad/ /dbul pa la sogs mdor bsdu na/ /seng sogs 'jigs pa chen po brgyad/ /sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms byed cing / /bskul ba med par gos btung ba/ /khang bzangs rin chen tshogs kyang

'du/ /ral gri dang ni mig sman dang / /rkang pa bum pa bzang sogs 'grub/ /tshigs bcad mkhan dang ngag snyan dang / /blo rno shes rab dri med 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ci 'dod dngos grub ni/ /'khor lo de las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /nad dang 'jigs pa rnams nyams

pa/ /gang zhig phyung nas dge bsags pa/ /des ni skye 'gro sgrol mar shog /sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i slob ma thu bos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris

bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus bzhugs// @##/ /bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdor bsdus pa la dga' rnams phyir/ /sdom tshig le'ur byas pa yin/ /phyogs rnams gtsang mnyen bde ba dang / /kun du

dri ngad ldang gyur pa/ /bde ba can gyi zhing khams ltar/ /sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ /phyi nang ma bsgribs gsal ba dang / /rin chen rnams las grub pa yi/ /thub pa'i dbang po sras bcas kyi/ /gzhal yas khang du byin brlab bo/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang / /phyogs

bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sras/ /bka' sdod phyogs skyong ma lus pa/ /de ring spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol/ /gtsang zhing dri zhim bsil ba yi/ /dri chab bdud rtsi'i rgyun lta bus/ /rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus la/ /chu gsum gyis ni mnyes par bgyi'o/ /dus gsum

bzhugs pa'i bla ma lha/ /rin chen gsum ni nam mkha' la/ /til gyi gang bu ltar dmigs nas/ /sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog la sogs nyer spyod dang / /rgyal srid bdun dang grub pa'i rdzas/ /mchod sprin nam mkha' gang dmigs te/ /'gro ba bsgral

phyir dbul bar bgyi'o/ /bdag dang sems can mkha' mnyam gyis/ /thog med dus nas da lta'i bar/ /ma lus sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ /shin tu 'gyod pas bshags par bgyi'o/ /mngon mtho nges legs rgyur gyur ba'i/ /skye bo'i dge ba gang bgyis dang / /'phags pa'i

tshogs kyis gang bgyis la/ /lhag par spro bas yi rang ngo / /sgo gsum nyams len mi dge bcom/ /ched du bya ba gzhan don brtson/ /lam bde tshegs chung 'jug pa zab/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyi'o/ /btang bar dka' ba'i lus 'di ni/ /mgon dang bde

gshegs sras bcas la/ /bran g.yog nyid du dbul lags kyis/ /deng nas khyed kyi 'bangs su mchi'o/ /rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang / /'bru dang rta glang bran du bcas/ /sa gzhi gser sogs rin po che/ /gus pas thub mchog rnams la mchod/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims sgom pa

dang / /thos bsam tshogs gnyis ci bsags pa/ /dus gsum bsdus pa'i dge ba gang / /thub pa chos kyi spyan la dbul/ /sgeg 'dzum ldem zhing brjid pa dang / /rngam zhing khros pa khro bo'i gzugs/ /sras bcas sku yi dkyil 'khor la/ /dad pas mig mi 'dzums

pas blta'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ma lus pa'i/ /tshe dang yon tan mthu stobs dang / /sku gsum mdzad pa ma lus la/ /rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang / /yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs te/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu

gus pas skyabs su mchi'o/ /rgyal ba byang chub mchog brnyes nas/ /cung zad snyoms par bzhugs pa la/ /tshangs pa lta bur gus pa yis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /byang chub mdzad pa mthar phyin nas/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed la/ /ji srid

'khor ba mtha' yod par/ /sems can don du bzhugs su gsol/ /ji ltar sngon gyi skyob pa yis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang sems can phyir/ /byang chub chen por sems bskyed do/ /rgyal sras 'jig rten skyong rnams la/ /sku gsum grub

dang rig pa 'dzin/ /las tshogs phrin las rnam dbye sogs/ /las bcol de ni grub par mdzod/ /'dir ni nyes pa gang bgyis pa/ /gang yang lus can skyabs gyur la/ /ma 'tshal ba rnams bshags par bgyi/ /gtso bos cis kyang bka' gnang 'tshal/ /'bras bu mchog dang thun mong ste/ /ma

nor tshig don shes rab dang / /spobs pa mthu rtsal phun tshogs pa'i/ /dngos grub de dag gnang bar rigs/ /dus gsum bsags pa'i dge ba ni/ /tshogs gnyis bdud rtsi lta bu 'dis/ /sku gsum 'bras bu grub gyur nas/ /gzhan don 'bad med 'byung bar shog /dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i

cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA maN+Dal a ba tA ra kritA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/ mgon po thugs rje chen

po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/ /gos pa med pa'i ye shes ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu ltar/ /ma lus mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad dang / /sna tshogs

'gro ba'i ma khyod la/ /gus pa'i blo yis sgrol ma yi/ /cho ga'i rim pa brjod par bya/ /de la 'dir lha mo sgrol ma la lhag par gus pa'i gang zag gang yang rung bas/ gnas khang brgyan cing byi dor legs par byas pa la sku gsung thugs kyi rten dgram/ khyad par du sgrol ma'am/ thugs

rje chen po'i rten bzhugs su gsol/ tshul ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas/ der tshogs pa rnams sha chang sgog btsong spangs nas khrus legs par byas la lus la dri bzang pos byugs te/ gos gtsang ma gyon la/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams dang / ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba yang sta

gon bya/ gzhan yang nye bar mkho ba rnams kyang tshogs pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /de nas thams cad kyis rang rang gi mdun du sa la ba'i lci bas byugs la maN+Dal gyi cho ga las byung ba ltar me tog sil ma'i tshom bu bcu dgu ba'i dbus kyi ri rab kyi steng du po ta la nas spyan drangs pa'i sgrol ma 'khor

dang bcas pa bzhugs par bsams pa la thog mar phyag bya/ nye bar spyod pa lngas mchod la mtshan gyi dngos gzhi bstod pa lan gsum brjod/ snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la tsog tsog por 'dug pas gso sbyong blang bar bya'o/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad dang mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma bdag la dgongs su gsol/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / sa chen po la

rab tu bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye

shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gso sbyong nges par byas te yang dag par blangs pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas bzung nas sang gdugs rtse shar gyi bar du sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang /

tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gso sbyong nges par byas te/ yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o/ /deng nas srog gcod

mi bya zhing / /gzhan gyi nor yang blang mi bya/ /'khrig pa'i chos kyang mi spyad cing / /rdzun gyi tshig kyang mi smra'o/ /skyon ni mang po mnyam bsten pa'i/ /chang ni yongs su spang bar bya/ /khri stan mthon po mi bya zhing / /de bzhin dus ma yin pa'i zas/ /dri dang phreng ba dang ni rgyan/ /gar

dang glu sogs spang bar bya/ /ji ltar dgra bcom rtag tu ni/ /srog gcod la sogs mi byed pa/ /de ltar srog gcod la sogs spang / /bla med byang chub thob par shog /sdug bsngal mang dkrugs sems can kun/ /srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog /ces pa lan gsum du bya'o/ /de

ltar gso sbyong blangs nas dus kyi khyad par la nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam thun gcig la sogs pa yang bya'o/ /de la smyung bar gnas pa'am dkar gsum la brten pa yang rung bas 'phags ma sgrol ma la lhag par gus pa'i blo rtse gcig par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis

der gnas pa thams cad kyi bsam pa bcos la byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdung bdag gis gzung snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bdag gis spyad snyam pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad bdag gis

bsgral snyam pa'i bsam pa rgyun mi chad par cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /de nas sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa phyogs 'di rnams thams cad gser gyi sa gzhi brdal ba la rin po che

sna bdun dang be+e DUr+yas mig mangs ris su bris pa'am shel bzhin bstar ba la rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'phra bkod pa'i tshul khyad par 'phags pa/ kun nas rab tu dang ba dang ldan pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang tshad rab tu mnyam par grub pa ste/ reg na bde zhing 'jam

la mnyen pa phyogs mtshams rnams kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byas pa'i sa gzhi bstar ba kho na la rab tu mdzes pa du mas brgyan pa/ nam mkha' 'am lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ yangs shing bde ba 'byor pa dang ldan pa mnan na nem zhing bteg na 'phar ba/ ngam grog dang g.yang sa

dang gcong rong dang bya skyibs dang bral ba/ gseg ma dang gyo dum dang tsher ma la sogs pa dang bral ba ste/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan cing mdzes par spras pa'i sa gzhi la nye bar 'tshe ba med pa'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa sgra snyan pa 'bab pa/ mtsho dang

rdzing bu dang lteng ka la sogs pa la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pas khebs pa/ mya ngan med pa dang u dum+WA ra dang n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu g.yur za ba dang ldan pa du mas brgyan pa/ rma bya dang khrung khrung dang bzhad dang sa ra sa la sogs pa

g.yor zhing ldem pa dang bcas pa'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs pas bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dang ldan pa/ seng ge dang glang po che rol pa dang / kri Na dza Ti dang lto 'phye la sogs pa'i ri dwags rnams kyang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems kyis dga' zhing rtse bar spyod pas byams pa la gnas pa dang / pad+ma

dang ku mu da dang puN+Da rI ka dang ut+pal dang pad+ma ge sar la sogs pa kha dog dang dri la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas nye bar mdzes par byed pa'i sa gzhi dam pa dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang ga bur dang gla rtsi dang a ga ru dang tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po la sogs pas sa'i phyogs kun

dri bsung chen pos yongs su khyab pas sems can thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang mi'am ci la sogs pa'i tshogs rab tu yang dag par rgyu zhing lha'i bu dang bu mo dang dri za'i bu mo la sogs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang dam pa'i chos kyi sgra dang ldan pa'i yid du 'ong

ba'i glu dbyangs du ma sgrogs pa/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su dang ba chen po bskyed pa thob par 'gyur ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma dang ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin las grub pas nye bar 'tshe ba'i gnod

pa dang bral ba'i sa phyogs dam pa ste/ mdor na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rnam par bkod pa dang mtshungs par 'byor zhing dar ba/ bde zhing skyid pa nyams dga' ba byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i sa phyogs dam par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de yang chos

kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya tA thA ga ta ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/

tad+ya thA/ oM su k+Sh+me suk+Sh+me/ sa me sa ma ye shAn+te dAn+te a sa ma ro be/ a na lam+b+he ta ram+b+he/ ya sho ba ti ma hA te dzo ni ra ku le ni ra ba Ne sarba bud+d+ha ad+hiSh+ThA na ad+hiSh+Thi te swA hA zhes sngags dang bcas pa 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas sa phyogs dam pa rgya yongs su ma chad pa de dag gi dbus su sngon gyi de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu khyad par can las grub pa'i zhing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing sna tshogs pa'i rin po che las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang dam pa la khor yug chen po'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes par spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i 'od zer gyis phyi dang nang kun du gang bas dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhal yas khang chen por yongs su grub pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir sgo bzhi dang ldan

pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir gru bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir bsil khang bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pas khrus khang gi rdzing bu bzhis spras pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan

pa nyid kyi phyir ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po che'i stegs gru bzhi la gnas shing bum pa las byung ba'i rin po che'i ka ba las nor bu du mas mdzes par bcings pa/ rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa bcu gnyis dang ldan zhing gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag pas bang rim bcu

gnyis dang ldan pa'i rta babs kyis mdzes pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyud tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la brtse ba chen po dang ldan pas gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha dang / mu tig la sogs pas spras pa'i ri dwags pho mo gnyis kyis brgyan pa dang / rta babs kyi logs de

dag la yang lha'i na bza' rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bla re dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang gser dang nor bu sna tshogs pas brgyan cing mdzes par gyur pa dang / gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du dag pas rin po che'i kha dog

sna tshogs pa las rin po che gzhan gyi kha dog gis legs par spras pa'i 'dod yon gyi snam bu shel bzhin du bstar ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang ldan pas rin po che'i snam bu la kha dog lnga'i rin po che'i phreng ba brgyus pas mig mangs ris su bris pas mdzes pa'i logs rnams dang /

me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i rnam par dag pas dngul dang / gser dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / bai DUr+ya las grub pa'i rtsig pa lnga yang rgya dang dpangs su 'tsham pa las/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par sprul pa dang / chos yang dag par grub pa'i phyir

dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa 'phyang ba dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i do shal kyang bar bar du spras pa la dra ba'i nang du pad+ma dang zla ba dang / rdo rje dang / nyi ma dang / nor bu la sogs pa du mas brgyan pa'i steng du sku gsung thugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pas na rin po che sna bdun

las grub pa'i zar tshags dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan du ma dang ldan pas dngul las grub pa'i rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi mda' yab la rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams kyis spras pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i so sor nges pa'i phyir rin po

che'i dbyug pa rtse gsum pa dang rnam par rol pa'i mi'am ci'i rgyal mtshan la gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha nges par bcings pa la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i ras kyis dkris pa rlung gis bskyod pa'i 'khyog pa dang bcas pa dpyangs pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / bden pa dang / byin gyis

brlabs pa'i rang bzhin gyis gdugs bzhi dang / rnga yab dang / dung dang me tog gi chun 'phyang gis brgyan pa'o/ /phyi nang gi dngos po yang ma bsgribs par gsal zhing rig pa dang ldan pas rang bzhin las grub pa'i ka ba dang gdung ma la sogs pa yang so sor mnga' thang dang 'tsham par

grub pa dang / pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru la sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su chos nyid mi 'khrugs pa'i de kho na nyid la nges par gnas pa'i phyir brtan par byas pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams su khor yug la bum pa bzang po las 'thon pas dgongs pa nges par bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub kyi shing rnams la 'khor lo la sogs

pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang tshal dang lpags pa la sogs pa'i nye ba'i rin po che rnams dang / gzhan yang bdag med pa'i sgra dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong bas sems yongs su tshim par byed pa'i dbyangs du ma dang ldan pa'i ri dwags kyi rgyal po rnams dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang rma bya dang shin tu mdzes pa'i

mi'am ci pho mo dang sprin dang khrus kyi rdzing bu las lus phyed 'thon pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / mdor na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis so sor bsod nams dang ye shes las grub pa gang yang ma tshang ba med pa gzhal yas khang dam par byin gyis brlab par

bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings las grub pa'i byin rlabs dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthus de bzhin du gyur cig /na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/

ta d+ya thA/ oM bi ma la sarba saM skA ra sid+d+hI s+tha na sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa s+ya ku Ta ga raM a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hi Sh+Th-i te swA hA zhes lan gsum du brjod pa dang bsam par bya'o/ /de nas de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzhal yas khang de dag gi dbus su seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po zla ba rab tu rgyas pa'i gdan

la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa dang / de dag gi phrin las ma lus pa grub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'phags ma sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams kyang so so'i zhing khams dang / gnas nas rang gi gdan 'dzom pa la de ring mgon skyabs dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/

che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i go 'phang la dgod pa'i phyir/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las bzhengs te/ deng gnas 'dir byon par ci gnang / /zhes lan gsum du bya'o/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rin chen sgrol ma

dang / pad+ma'i sgrol ma dang / las kyi sgrol ma dang / bdug spos sgrol ma dang / me tog sgrol ma dang / mar me sgrol ma dang / dri mchog sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams kyang / che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i go 'phang la dgod pa'i phyir/ de ring

mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas so so'i zhing khams dang gnas nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las bzhengs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par gdan 'dzom pa la byon

par gnang bar mdzod cig ces lan gsum mo/ /deng sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chos kyi sprin gser du snang ba'i sgrol ma dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu mi g.yo ba'i sgrol ma dang / chos kyi don yang dag par mngon du gyur

pa'i sgrol ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi blo gros sgrol ma dang / kun nas 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i sgrol ma dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad ring du gyur pa'i sgrol ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yon tan gyi 'od byed pa'i sgrol ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyis rab tu sbyangs par gyur pa'i sgrol ma dang / dri ma med par rab tu snang ba'i sgrol ma dang / yon tan gyi tshogs ma lus pa la rab tu dga' ba'i sgrol ma dang / rnam par grol bar gyur pa shes rab kyi sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye

shes kyi sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs mnyam par bzhag pa'i sgrol ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i stobs kyi sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las la brtson pa'i sgrol ma dang / smon lam gyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrol

ma dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu gyur pa'i rab tu bzod pa'i sgrol ma dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan ma lus par 'gyed pa'i sgrol ma dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrol ma dang / chos thams cad kyi srog

rnam par 'dzin pa'i sgrol ma dang / sems dang las rab tu mkhyen pa'i sgrol ma dang / yo byad kyi dbang phyug za ma tog gi sgrol ma dang / las dang skye ba yang dag par mkhyen cing grub pa'i sgrol ma dang / thabs nges par rnam par rol ba'i sgrol ma dang / chos yang dag par grub pa rgya mtsho'i

sgrol ma dang / smon lam gyi mchog legs pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrol ma dang / mos pa'i rtsa ba rab tu brtan pa chos kyi sgrol ma dang / rdzu 'phrul kun nas nges par 'gro ba'i sgrol ma dang / mkhyen pas rnam par mdzes pa'i dpal gyi sgrol ma dang / rin po che'i blo

yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrol ma dang / gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma dang / kun nas 'od zer rnam par 'gyed pa'i sgrol ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang 'dzin ri khrod lo ma'i sgrol ma dang / shes rab kyi sgo yang dag par 'phel ba'i sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi mi zad pa'i ye shes za ma tog gi sgrol ma dang / las thams cad yang dag par sbyor zhing 'dren pa'i sgrol ma dang / spobs pa ma lus par bskyed cing dug sel ba'i sgrol ma dang / rnam par bkod pa kun nas mdzes pa tsun+da'i sgrol ma dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal

rnam par mtha' yas pa'i sgrol ma la sogs pa yang / che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god pa'i phyir de ring dpung gnyen dang mgon skyabs su spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad

par can las bzhengs te/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par mchod pa'i tshogs 'byor ba'i dbus su gdan 'dzom pa chen po la byon par mdzod cig ces lan gsum du'o/ /deng 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' che po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying

po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song kun sbyong dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan kun sel dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa rnams kyang / che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i go 'phang la dgod par bya

ba'i phyir de ring mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las bzhengs te/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par mchod pa'i tshogs

'byor ba'i dbus su gdan 'dzom pa chen por byon par mdzod cig ces lan gsum du'o/ /deng dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nges pa'i tshig yang dag par rig pa lcags kyu sgrol ma dang / chos yang dag par rig pa zhags pa sgrol ma dang / spobs pa yang dag

par rig pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma dang / don yang dag par rig pa dril bu sgrol ma la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo skyong ba rnams kyang / che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir/ de ring mgon skyabs dang dpung

gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las bzhengs nas/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs te/ yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par mchod pa'i tshogs 'byor ba'i

dbus su gdan 'dzom pa chen po la byon par mdzod cig dang / chos kyi dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i stobs kyis de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te

saMmyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tA re tUt+tA re tut+tA re tu re tu re ku ma ri ku ma ri pad+ma pad+ma gar+b+he sid+d+he b+ha ga bAn/ a k+Sho b+h+yaHrat+na saM b+ha ba bai ro tsa na a mo g+ha sid+d+hi badzra tA ra rat+na tA ra pad+ma tA ra karma tA ra d+hU pa tA ra puSh+pa tA ra dI pa tA

ra gan+d+ha tA ra sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa da sha dika bya ba lo kas+thi ta A gats+tsha A gats+tsha swA hA/ zhes lan gsum du bya'o/ /deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar dbang po dang / me lha dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / chu bdag dang / rlung bdag dang / nor 'dzin dang / dbang ldan dang /

tshangs pa dang / thag bzangs ris dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug chen po dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar la sogs pa dam pa chos skyong ba'i srung ma/ mthu dang gzi brjid phun sum

tshogs pa ma lus pa rnams kyang so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas/ che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa'i tshe dang bsod nams la sogs pa spel ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa'i slad du di ring mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing

mchis na/ sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las bzhengs te/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par gdan 'dzom pa chen po la byon par ci gnang zhes lan gsum du'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i

byin gyi rlabs dang / che ge mo la sogs pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa ma lus par mngon sum du byon par gyur pa rnams la/ sman gyi rgyal po rnams dang mchog tu gyur pa'i dri phun sum tshogs pa legs par sbyar ba rnams kyi chu shel gyi bum pa

la rin po che du ma'i phra bkod pa'i tshul la nges par 'thon pa'i rgyun gyis rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i zhabs la bkru bar bya'o/ /de yang phyogs mtshams rnams su dri zhim po'i ngad dang ldan pa'i tsan+dan dang a ka ru dang du ru ka la sogs pa mi las khyad par du 'phags pa'i dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar bar byed

pa'i lha rdzas mchog tu gyur pas bla ma dang de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du nges par grub pa rnams kyi sku la byug par bya'o/ /de yang dri ma med cing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi'i 'o ma'i rgyun lta bu dkar zhing bsil ba legs 'dzin gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa phyi dang

nang rnams kyang rnam par dag par sbyar ba'i chus bla ma dam pa rnams dang rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi zhal bsil zhing mnyes par bya'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoHbo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHsa ta tsa ra naM pra wa ra sat+kA ra ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha any+dza ma ye swA hA/ de ltar chu gsum gyis mnyes par byas pa las dkon mchog

gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang dang / rig sngags kyi mthus de bzhin du gyur cig /de ltar de'i byin gyis rlabs kyis sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i zhabs 'bring du gyur cig /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul

phra rab thams cad dang mnyam pa'i grangs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mnyes par byed par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa dag par sbyong ba dang / rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i phrin las ma lus pa la 'jug par gyur cig /gnas skabs thams cad du lha'i drang srong sum cu

rtsa gnyis la sogs pas bsrung bar gyur cig /klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i 'ching la sogs pa rnams kyis bsrung ba dang / dus dang ldan par char 'bebs par gyur cig /rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pas kyang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sbed par gyur cig /mtha' yas

pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyang mi khom pa brgyad las thar ba dang dal ba dang 'byor pa'i lus su gyur cig /sems can thams cad byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa bskyed pa dang / bskyed pa rnams 'phel ba dang rgyas par gyur cig /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod

cing dgongs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rab tu rangs par yang gyur cig /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes chen po la gnas par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas shing 'phel nas

sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa zhi bar gyur cig/ /de nas sngar spyan drangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing zhabs la gtugs pa'i phyag gsum bya'o/ /gdan 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i tshogs

rnams la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi'i me tog gi bye brag rang rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yid las byung ba dang / chu dang thang dang spang ri dang ljon shing las 'khrungs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa dri bsung chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyang phreng ba dang

me tog sil ma spel legs kyi me tog gi char gyi rgyun lta bur sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbu la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM oM AHpuSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi

bdug pa'i bye brag rang bzhin dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / rab tu sbyar ba la sogs pa'i phyogs thams cad du dri ngad chen po dang ldan pa sprin gyi phung po 'khrigs par gyur pa lta bu yang gdan 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa

rnams kyi shangs la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bod+hi satwA nAM oM AHd+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba'am/ rin po che las skyes pa'am 'bru mar la sogs pa la sbyar ba dang / /

nyi ma dang zla ba dang rab tu snang bar gyur pas phyogs mtshams go 'byed pa legs par 'khrungs shing 'bar bas lus can rnams kyi mig gi dbang po gsal bar byed pa'i mar me'i phreng ba la sogs pa yang gdan 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi spyan la

dbul bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM oM AHA lo ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi dri dang byug pa'i khyad par khams las skyes pa dang / 'bru dang sman las byung ba dang / me tog dang 'bras bu

las sbyar ba'i dri mchog dkar zhing bsil ba dang / reg na bde ba'i rkyen rtsir gyur pa dri chab bdud rtsi rgyun lta bus gdan 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs kar dbul bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM oM AHgan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye

hUM/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi bye brag rnam par dag pa'i kha dog dang dri phun sum tshogs pa dga' ba'i stobs 'phel zhing don yod pa'i ro brgya dang ldan pa la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / ldag pa dang / myang ba dang / 'jib pa

dang / khyad par 'phags pa'i btung ba'i rnam pa rnams kyang gdan 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i zhal dang phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM oM AHne bi d+ye pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams

cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i bye brag mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / rnga dang / rnga chen dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / 'khar rnga dang / dung dang / dung dkar dang / pheg rdob la sogs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar snyan cing yid 'phrog pa'i rol mo'i rnam pa yang gdan

'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi snyan gyi dbang po la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM oM AHshab+da pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na rab tu mkho ba'i rkyen du gyur pa la dbu rgyan

dang rked rgyan la sogs pa rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan du gyur pa dang / seng ge dang / glang po dang / nyi zla dang / gser dngul dang / mu tig la sogs pas spras pa'i gzi brjid 'bar ba dang mtho zhing mdzes pa'i khri la sogs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /

ba dan dang / bla re dang / rnga yab dang / lda ldi dang / phreng rgyud dang / nor bu la sogs pa dgos pa'i yo byad dang / glo rten dang / sku yol dang / na bza' dang / mtho ba'i stan dang / mal cha dang / ngo mtshar ba'i rab tu bde ba'i rkyen rtsi la sogs pa yang gdan 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs

pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi sku la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM AHu pa ka ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang mi rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i rkyen du gyur pa la khrus kyi rdzing bu dang / bdud

rtsi'i sman dang / ma rmos pa'i lo tog dang / dpag bsam gyi shing chen po dang / bum pa bzang po dang / gter chen po dang / ral gri dang mig rtsi dang 'dod 'jo'i ba dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / rkang dbyug la sogs pa grub pa'i rdzas dang / skyes bu chen po'i sngon du 'gro

ba'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo dang / dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che dang / yid 'phrog pa'i btsun mo dang / mdzod khengs pa'i blon po dang / shugs 'gro'i rta dang / dpa' brtan glang po dang / rtul phod dmag mi la sogs pa'i rin po che rnam pa bdun dang /

gdugs bzangs gser yu can dang / dung dkar dang / chu skyes dang / gser nya dang / bum mchog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / rab tu 'bar ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa skyes bu mchog rnams la bkra shis pa'i rdzas su gyur pa rnams kyang gdan 'dzom pa chen po la

bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa la nyer spyod du dbul bar bgyi'o/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM sid+d+h+ya sab+ta rat+na aSh+Ta maM ga la pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi khyad par

'phags pa'i bye brag la mchod pa'i rdzas rim par bshams pa'am bdag pos bzung ba'am/ bdag pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i khyad par dang blos sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa dang kun du bzang po'i mchod sprin gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dus dang dus min du byung ba dang / mdor na

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i so so'i mnga' thang las grub pa ma lus pa rnams kyang dad pa'i blo yis zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de yang dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthu dang

rig pa'i rgyal po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM sarba ta thA ga te s+pha ra ni hi maM ga ga na khaM sa man+ta te swA hA/ 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po gtibs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan yid la

byas nas mchod pa phul bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams ma lus pa rnams su mchod sprin gyi phung po rgyun mi 'chad par gyur cig /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las ma lus pa rnams lhun gyis grub par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa rlabs po che thams

cad mthar phyin par gyur cig /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo du ma rnams la gzungs dang rig pa'i sgo nas 'jug par gyur cig /de ltar mchod cing gus pas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can ma lus pa rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang chos gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sangs rgyas la thos pa'i chos de dag ma lus pa yang thob par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis

chos la bkur sti byed pa ltar che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa yang chos rnams la bkur sti byed par gyur cig /ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa la chos ston pa ltar bdag cag la sogs pa yang 'gro ba ma lus pa la chos ston par gyur

cig /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mkhas shing rdzogs pa ltar bdag cag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig /de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /

bde ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur cig /bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad nyams pa dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad mi 'byung ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'gum pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /

sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma zhugs pa dang / zhugs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sgrub pa la bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad zhi nas mi 'byung bar gyur cig /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis kyang che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba

ma lus pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su gyur pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug zhi ba la sogs pa byed par gyur cig /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi

sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du gyur nas de dag gi mthus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur cig /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dad pa dang ldan zhing gus pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams blta bar 'dod pa dang de dag la chos nyan par 'dod

pas kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /gzhan yang legs par sbyar shing bshams nas phul ba'i mchod pa 'dis che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams deng nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar gyur cig /deng nas ngal ba dang dub pa med par nor

dang 'bru dang dbyig la sogs pa rnams tshegs med par rnyed par gyur cig /dgra bo thams cad las rab tu rgyal bar gyur cig /rgyal po thams cad zhi ba dang / gsong por smra ba dang yul khams thams cad la phan par gyur cig /lus la dug gis mi tshugs pa dang /

dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang / rims kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa dang / chus mi tshugs pa dang / mes mi tshugs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gnod pas mi tshugs par gyur cig /nam 'chi ba'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar gyur cig /shi

'phos nas bde ba can gyi zhing khams su pad+ma'i sdong po la rdzus nas skye bar gyur cig /mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa brgyad pa thams cad kyi 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba thob par gyur

cig /sems can gang dag 'ching bas bcings pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / nad dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs pas gtser ba rnams kyi ni gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du yang gyur cig /gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa ma

rungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / bag yod pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig /byang chub pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig /sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

chub la ma bkod par che ge mo la sogs pa'i bdag cag rnams le lo dang snyom las dang bya ba ma yin par dus 'das par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag du ma'i phrin las ma lus pa sgrub par gyur cig /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yid

bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /ngan song rnam pa gsum yang rgyun chad pa dang / mi khom pa gzhan yang spang bar gyur cig /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin cing mchod pa de'i sgrib pa thams cad dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par

spyod pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur cig /gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba byed pa de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur cig /de dag gi lag tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po gnas par gyur cig /snying rje chen

po dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo'i thabs 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dgod par gyur cig /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /de ltar sangs rgyas

dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtshan yid la dran nas phyag byas mchod pa phul nas/ sngar byas pa'i nyes pa las dug 'thungs pa lta bu'i bsam pa dang / phyis lus dang srog la bab kyang mi byed pas sdig pa thams cad mthol lo bshags so/ /che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba

ma lus pa rnams kyis sngon 'khor ba thog mtha' med pa nas da lta la thug pa'i bar du yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun nas bslangs nas lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa dang / byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba

dang / ma dang pha la ma gus pa dang / grogs tshangs par mtshungs pa la ma gus pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la ma gus pa dang / rgyud sdom pa gsum dang 'gal ba dang / dam pa'i chos spangs pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa ci mchis pa de dag thams cad shin tu

gnong zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol lo bshags so/ /mi 'chab bo/ /mi sbed do/ /slan chad kyang legs par bsdom mo zhes lan gsum du bya'o/ /deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar bdag cag gis ma

'tshal ba'i nyes pa'i tshogs ci mchis pa rnams stobs bzhi'i sgo nas yang dag par bshags pas/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa ma lus pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig /lus ngag yid gsum gyi nyes pa ma lus pa dag par gyur cig /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / bag

chags kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa'i tshogs ma lus pa rnam par dag pa dang byang bar gyur cig /mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyi nyes skyon du gyur pa thams cad dag nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sa la phyin par

gyur cig /'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid yod pa de srid du pha dang ma la sogs pa dag pa dang ma dag pa'i sems can thams cad la rang dang gzhan gyi smon lam gyi mthu chen po dang / bsod nams kyi las kyi stobs ma lus pa rjes su 'dzin par gyur cig /tsha ba dang grang ba'i sems can dmyal

ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal ma lus pa skems par gyur cig /phyi dang nang gi sgrib pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yi dwags kyi tshogs ma lus pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal 'dren par gyur cig /byings dang kha 'thor la gnas pa'i dud 'gro glen zhing gti mug pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sdug bsngal dang bral nas

lha la sogs pa'i lus su gyur cig /ltung ba la sogs pas lus dang sems gzir ba'i lha'i sdug bsngal dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal ma lus pa yang byang nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod par gyur cig /skye rga na

'chi la sogs pa sdug bsngal bcu gcig gis rab tu mnar ba'i 'gro ba mi rnams kyang rtag tu bde legs la spyod par gyur cig /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams la phyag byas nas

mchod de che ge mo la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa'i sems can ma lus pa rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa 'phags pa rnams kyi dge ba dang / skye bo la sogs pa

gzhan dag gis mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' dag la dga' zhing spro ba chen po dang ldan pas snying gi dkyil nas yi rang ngo / /gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig /sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi phrin las mthar phyin par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs zhi ba las bzhengs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bslab pa la slob par gyur cig /skye bo

rnams kyang mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i lam mngon du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bya ba byed par gyur cig /nam 'chi ba'i dus na yang sems la gdung ba med par dga' ba dang bcas pas mi lus don yod par rang dgar 'gro bar

gyur cig /de ltar chos sgo kun la yi rang bas tshe rabs rnams su thub pa'i gsung rab rab 'byams la ma rmongs pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /stong pa dang snying rje gnyis su med par rnyed pa dang / grags pa la ma ltos par lus can ma lus pa rnams kyi

'khor ba'i bar du don byed par gyur cig /ji srid sems can thams cad bla na med kyi go 'phang la ma bkod pa de srid du lus ngag yid kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyun ma chad par mnyam pa med pa'i phun sum tshogs pa du mas brgyan par gyur cig /dkon mchog gsum

gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi spyan sngar che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa yang nges par 'byung ba dri ma med pa'i tshul khrims rgya chen po zhi ba gya nom pa lus la sogs pa legs par bsdams pa'i spyod pa

sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i khang bzangs dam par gyur pa spong ba'i sems la 'dun pa dang bcas pa so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas par bgyi'o/ /phan pa rgya chen po la rab tu 'jug pa'i rang bas gzhan mchog tu gces par mdzad pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i ngo mtshar ba'i

spyod pa la che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pas kyang bslab par bya'o/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i dus su bde bas brgyan cing dri ma med pas rnam par dag pa'i theg pa lam myur zhing thabs mang ba dang dka' ba med pas 'jug pa rab tu bde ba bla na med pa'i

mchog 'byung ba'i 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa'i dam tshig la che ge mo la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa yang dag par gnas par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa rnams la rab tu gces pa'i lus sdom pa gsum gyis brgyan cing mdzes pa 'di

dang / mkho zhing nye bar longs spyod pa'i nor rdzas dang / dus gsum du bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su dbul bas dus thams cad du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyed rnams kyis bzhes su gsol lo/ /de ltar mchod pa bzhes pa'i rgyal ba sras dang

bcas pa ye shes kyi sku can gyi mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa'i zhi ba chen po rnams dang / thugs zhi ba chen po las ma g.yos kyang sku rab tu khros pas rngam zhing 'jigs pa'i tshul gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i khro bo chen po'i tshogs

rnams la rab tu dang ba'i dad pa rtse gcig dang ldan pa mig mi 'dzums pas blta bar bgyi'o zhes lan gsum du'o/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan yid la dran nas phyag byas mchod pa phul bas che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i

'gro ba ma lus pa mnga' ris kyi 'bangs su mchis pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gyi phung po dang / ye shes kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du yang brjod kyis mi lang ba bsams pa tsam gyis thob par gyur cig /

de ltar mchod cing gus pa'i mthus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa'i tshul khrims bsrung zhing de'i dri bsung gis phyogs bcur yongs su dag par gyur cig /sems can thams cad la shin tu brtan pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'gyod pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / thams

cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su spong ba'i tshul khrims dang / thams cad du yang dag par med pa'i tshul khrims dang / sngon ma byung ba'i tshul khrims dang / mkhan po med pa'i tshul khrims dang / bya ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang / gdung ba med pa'i

tshul khrims dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / mthar phyin pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig /yongs su mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas spos kyi 'de gus lus la byugs pa dang mtshon gyis 'jigs shing 'debs pa las mnyam par chags sdang med par gyur

cig /sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i tshul khrims thob pa dang / theg pa chung ngu'i tshul khrims ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ /sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan te

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig /sems can thams cad sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la goms par gyur cig /sems can thams cad kyang

'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi pad+mo dang ldan zhing / pad+ma de'i dri bsung gis phyogs bcur yongs su khyab par gyur cig /sems can thams cad kyang theg pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi zas kyis 'tsho zhing / bla na med pa'i zas kyi dad pas phyogs bcur khyab cing ji ltar bung ba dag nags kyi me

tog la mi gnod pa ltar sems can thams cad la gcig la gcig mi gnod pas 'tsho bar gyur cig /sems can thams cad yon tan tshad med pa las grub pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig /sems can thams cad rtag tu byams pa'i sems kyis yid la dmigs pa med par sbyin pa

la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la zhugs nas de dag gi dge ba yang sems can thams cad thun mong du gyur cig /sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rang dbang can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la zhugs nas dbang du gyur ba'i sa la gnas par

gyur cig /ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus gang dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa de dang der yid bde bzhin du skye bar gyur cig /rigs kyi bu de byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jog par gyur nas/ dmyal bar rang dbang can du skyes nas/

dmyal ba'i sems can 'gro ba rnams thar pa la 'god par gyur cig /dmyal ba'i sems can rnams la chos rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams bshad nas dmyal ba rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig /yi dwags rnams su rang dbang du skyes nas bkres pa dang skom pa rnams rgyun chad

par gyur cig /bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / nor gyi char chen pos yi dwags rnams bde ba la bkod nas sems can de rnams kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig /dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams su rang dbang du skyes nas gcig la gcig za ba

rnams rgyud chad de phan tshun byams pa la 'god par gyur cig /sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / don sems pa dang / smras pa ltar spyod par gyur cig /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /de

nas rgyal ba'i yum 'phags ma sgrol ma la sogs pa la mdog dang / yon tan dang stobs dang gzi brjid mdzad pa phrin las kyi sgo nas sna tshogs pa'i bstod pa bya'o/ /gzungs sngags mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'di yang brjod par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma

Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ma ma kr-i te sarba duSh+TAM pra duSh+TAM dzam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya mo hA ya/ ban+d+ha ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT sarba duSh+TaM stam+b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ de ltar bstod pa rnams dang / rig sngags 'di bzlas pa las/

'di 'dra ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la longs spyod par gyur cig /sems can thams cad la chos kyi don yang dag par 'byor zhing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rang gi yid la 'dod pa tsam gyi mod la gzhan la rag ma lus par thob par gyur cig /sems can thams cad mi dge

ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi mtha' thams cad dang bral nas/ dus thams cad du dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig /sems can thams cad kyang rang rang gi lus la mtshan dang / dpe byad kyis yongs su brgyan pa dang / rtag tu phan tshun gcig

la gcig 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhe 'gras pa med pa dang / dga' ba'i yid dang / byams pa'i mig gis mngon par blta zhing zab mo'i chos la mngon par bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig /sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dang /

'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang dag par gzhol bar gyur cig /nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ring du spangs nas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / snyoms

par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rig pa rnams kyang phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang yang dag par ldan par gyur

cig /so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes bzhi thob nas bzo dang / bstan bcos dang / sgyu rtsal dang / spobs pa dang / mthu dang / gsang ba'i cho ga shes pa dang / de kho na nyid mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus par spangs pa'i ye shes chen po

thob par gyur cig /che ge mo la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams su bsgrod pa dang / de dag gi phrin las ma lus pa la 'jug par gyur cig /skyob pa shAkya seng ge'i bstan

pa la rab tu gsal ba dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad bcom pa dang bde legs thams cad kyi gzhir gyur par yang shog cig /snyigs ma'i dus su nyon mongs pa la bab pa na/ bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas 'jig rten du 'dul ba'i mthu thob ste/ 'gro ba ma

lus pa bde ba la 'god par gyur cig /gdul bya'i dbang gis gang nas gang du skye bar byed na yang snying gi pad+mo la rje btsun ma sgrol ma bzhugs nas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa lhur byas te/ gzhan gyi don rgya chen po la 'jug par gyur cig /bde ba dang legs pa thams

cad kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i bdag gi lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi bya ba ma lus pa kun yang chos bzhin du dge ba dang / zhi ba dang nges par gyur cig /nam du yang chags sdang dang 'khrul pa dang yid mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing dkar

po'i yon tan thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig /rtag tu yang dag pa'i ye shes la gnas te/ rtsom pa dang / bshad pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mthu rtsal dang / spobs pa dang / rig pa dang / yon tan dang / longs spyod dang / don dang / tshig dang / shes rab la sogs pa

gzhan don la 'jug cing zhugs pa'i phrin las rgya chen po thob par gyur cig /deng nas brtsams te dus thams cad du nor bdun gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i mi'i lus su stobs chen pos 'gro ba ma lus pa dge ba la dgod par byas nas/ sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la

'god par gyur cig /mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho zab cing rgya che ba dang / tshad med pa'i phrin las ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / sku gsum gyi rnam par 'phrul pa la sems dga' zhing spro bas nyin mtshan du lus kyi ba spu

langs te dbugs phyung nas bstod par gyur cig /mchog gi rigs skyes nas byams pa dang ldan pa dang / lus bzang ba dang / shes rab rno ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la goms shing de la 'bras bu mi

'dod pa dang / gsong por byed cing sangs rgyas la gus pas snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod par shog cig /rig sngags 'di lan brgyad bzlas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis ma lus pa la bstod par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi la satwA nAM sarba tra ku su mi tA b+hi dz+nyA ra shi ni na mo

stu de swA hA/ de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstod cing gus pas dbang du gsol nas dpung gnyen thob par bya ba'i phyir skyabs gsum skyob pa dang bcas pa la rab tu gus pas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de yang rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zung du 'jug pa'i

ting nge 'dzin sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya mtshon pa'i lha tshogs grags pa 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/ /smra bsam brjod du med pa gsung gi rang bzhin dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad skyed par byed pa'i yum

mtshan nyid so so'i ye shes ma lus par ston pa dam chos mdo sde rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mig zum nas stong pa'i 'gro ba'i skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen mdzad cing phrin las bzhi yis thugs rtse

gcig par don mdzad pa'i gtso bo theg pa chen po'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum du'o/ /de ltar skyabs gsum bla ma dang bcas pa la dpang por gzhag /rten du gzung skyabs su gsol nas stongs dang grogs zhus pa/ de bzhin du gzigs

te che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs drag pos rang dbang med par g.yengs te/ mgon med par bying ba rnams la deng nas bzung nas byang chub la thug gi bar du bla na med pa gsum la skyabs su mchi bas sems can gling med pa

rnams kyi gling du gyur cig /gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur cig /skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su gyur cig /skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyob par gyur cig /mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur cig /dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du gyur cig /ji

srid sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar de srid du bdag kyang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing sems can thams cad la lam bde ba dang / 'jug pa rab tu bde ba'i sgo nas phan pa dang bde ba rgya chen po nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa tsam gyis gang zhing

yongs su rgyas par gyur cig /skyabs su 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la brten nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang la dgod par gyur cig /gzhan yang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang la ma bkod kyi bar du yang lha dang mi'i rten phun sum tshogs pa la brten nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen de nyid kun du spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ngo mtshar bas yang dag par mnyes par byed par gyur cig /byang

chub tu sems bskyed pa dang yang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /theg pa chen po'i chos mtha' dag la dga' bde kha na ma tho ba med pas longs spyod par gyur cig /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sgrub pa la yang dag par gnas par

gyur cig /de ltar gus shing skyabs su mchi bas bdag nyid bslab pa gsum gyis lus yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med pa rnams la longs spyod cing spyan dang / mngon par shes pa la sogs pa yon tan

thams cad la dbang thob cing rang rgyud phyug cing rgyas par gyur cig /bdud kyi gnod pa dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi bar gyur cig /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus yongs su rdzogs shing smin nas byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob cing thabs mkhas

pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyong ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par gyur cig /mthar mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob nas sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su sgrol bar gyur cig /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du

gyur cig /deng de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod phyag 'tshal skyabs su gsol nas/ che ge mo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mun pa bsal nas lam mchog tu gyur pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas gdungs

pa'i skye bo mtha' dag bsgral bar bya ba'i don du gsol ba ni/ mgon po gang zhig gis gang zag pa med pa'i bdud rtsi'i mchog brnyes kyang sems can gyi las dang skal ba'i dbang gis thugs cung zad snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba

gsung bar gsol chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul lo zhes lan gsum mo/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma dam pa de dag ring du mi gnas par zhi bar gshegs par bzhed pa de dag la yang ji srid sems can gyi khams yod pa de srid du nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams la

rab tu gsal bar bzhugs su gsol ba ste/ bdud bzhi bcom pa'i sman pa'i mchog chen po khyod la gus pas rab tu bzhugs su gsol bar gsol ba 'debs so lan gsum du'o/ /'jig rten ma rig pa la sogs pas rab tu ldongs pa rnams la dri ma med cing 'od

gsal ba'i rang bzhin yongs su gsal bar gyur cig /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams la mchod cing gus pas chos kyi sgron me sbar ba zhus pa las che ge mo la sogs pa mnga' ris kyi 'bangs su mchis pa rnams dang / gzhan yang 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyis theg pa gsum gyi chos ma lus

pa la rang dbang thob par gyur cig /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo dri ma med pas gzhan yongs su smin par byed par gyur cig /khams gsum gyi 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams la rang rang dang 'tsham pa'i theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pas

bsam pa dang mthun pa'i chos ston par gyur cig /sems can thams cad kyang thos pa dang bsam pa lhur byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams la snyoms par 'jug par gyur cig /sems can thams cad la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rab tu ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs

kyi chos kyi dge ba ji snyed pa tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa'am/ shes rab kyi phung po dang ldan pa'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba'i

don du ston par gyur cig /gang yang dag par bsgrub pa la chos gang du bri ba'am/ blang ba'am/ dor ba dang / gzung ba dang / spang ba med par gzhan la 'chad par gyur cig /yang dag par sgrub pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par

yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sems can thams cad la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par ston par gyur cig /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la bskul zhing gsol bas che ge mo la sogs pa bka'i 'bangs 'khor bcas thams

cad kyi bsam pa yongs su shes pas 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad kyi lus sems tshim par byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa bskyed pa dang / snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang / de kho na nyid mnyam pa nyid

du rtogs pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / mi 'khrugs pa nyid dang / 'byung ba med pa nyid dang / 'jigs pa med pa nyid dang / rtsod pa med pa nyid du ston par gyur cig /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i chos kyi gsung dri ma med pa de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing /

chos kyi dbyings kyi ngos mnyam pa des 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa rnams la thogs pa med cing khyab par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / snying rje chen pos zin pa'i

sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par ston par gyur cig /nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas mu med pa bzhin du rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i mkhyen pa dang / brtse ba mu med pas che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mtha' yas mu med pa la brtse bas bu lta bur dgongs nas

'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab dri ma med pa thos nas/ mngon par yid ches nas/ rab tu rtogs pa dri ma med pa the tshom mi za ba dang / rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don la ngo mtshar ba dang / rmad du

byung ba'i 'du shes skye bar gyur cig /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad snying rjes mi gtong zhing thams cad kyang ngo mtshar ba'i 'jug pa la gnas par gyur cig /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du grub

par gyur cig /deng phyogs bcu dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi spyan sngar mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa'i ched du dus 'di nas bzung nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la mchis kyi bar du 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba'i mtha' yas pa'i

'gro ba ma lus pa gdon par bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslabs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgrib pa med par rang

bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ye shes kyi chos nyid rjes su gzigs nas byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa ltar/ che ge mo la sogs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen por sems bskyed par bgyis te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sems can ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral

ba dang / ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams chos kyi dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi'o/ /sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba chos sdud kyi tshul

khrims dang / sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims la yang dag par bslab par bgyi'o zhes lan gsum du'o/ /de ltar rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar sems bskyed pa ma lus pa'i 'gro ba rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'god par gyur cig /nyon mongs

pa'i rgya mtsho las sems can ma sgrol ba rnams bdag gis yongs su sgrol bar gyur cig /sems can thams cad las kyi lu gu rgyud las ma sgrol ba rnams bdag gis sgrol bar byed par gyur cig /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dba' klong rab tu 'khrugs pa las sems can thams cad dbugs

dbyung ba'i go skabs med pa la bdag gis yongs su dbugs 'byin par gyur cig /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa las yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig /gzhan yang sems can thams cad bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig /byang chub ma thob kyi bar du yang lha dang mi'i rten phun sum tshogs pa thob par gyur cig /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su 'phel ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa

drug sgrub pa la yang dag par gnas par gyur cig /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /de'i gdams pa dang / rjes su gnang ba dang bcas te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i sems bskyed nyi shu rtsa gnyis lam rnam pa lnga'i bdag

nyid rim gyis bgrod par gyur cig /de la dang po tshogs kyi lam la gnas te 'dun pa dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa sa lta bu dang / bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gser lta bu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa zla ba tshes pa lta bu la spyod cing gnas par

gyur cig /des zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel bas 'jig rten phal po che las khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig /sems bskyed pa me lta bus nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams cad bsregs nas thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyur

gyur nas/ spos kyi glang po che la dril bu g.yer khas brgyan pa ltar rnal 'byor pa'i sems la brgyan cing phyug par gyur cig /mthong lam du sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la gnas te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gter lta bu la spyod cing gnas par gyur

cig /tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthus de kho na nyid mngon sum du rtogs par byas te yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pas rnal 'byor pa'i sems yongs su phyung bar yang gyur cig /de nas sgom pa'i lam la gnas te/ sa gnyis pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che'i 'byung khungs lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /sa gsum pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho lta bu la spyod cing gnas par gyur cig /sa bzhi pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed

pa rdo rje lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /sa lnga pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /sa drug pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa sman pa lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /sa bdun

pa la thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /sa brgyad pa la smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu la gnas par gyur

cig /sa dgu pa la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /sa bcu pa la ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dbyangs snyan pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /de nas

khyad par gyi las la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa'i mthu thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rgyal po lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa bang mdzod lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /byang

chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems bskyed pa lam po che lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /snying rje dang lhag mthong gi sems bskyed pa bzhon pa brtan po lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa bkod ma'i chu

mig lta bu la gnas par gyur cig /de nas mthar phyin pa'i lam la gnas te/ chos kyi skyed mos tshal dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa sgra dbyangs snyan pa lta bu la spyod cing gnas par gyur cig /bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa chu bo'i rgyun lta bu la spyod cing

gnas par gyur cig /chos kyi sku dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa sprin lta bu la spyod cing gnas par gyur cig /gzhan yang bdag gis sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la brten nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur

cig /yi dwags kyi 'gro ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad kyang rgyun chad par gyur cig /mi khom pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /lha dbul po dang mi dbul po la sogs pa mtho ris kyi gnod pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur

cig /ser sna dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab rgyun chad par gyur cig /'dod pa la 'dun pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa lnga dang bral bar gyur cig /nyon mongs pa dang / las dang / rnam

par smin pa'i sgrib pa gsum dang bral bar gyur cig /nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur cig /sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob nas 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can zhes bya ba'i sgra mi grag par thams cad kyang sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig

gi rang bzhin du gyur cig /'jig rten 'dir yang lo phyugs rtag tu legs pa dang / mi nad dang phyugs nad thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa la sogs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur cig /nad dang / gnod pa dang / dgra dang / bgegs
