par mdzad/ /nu mar mu tig do shal ldan/ /sham thabs za 'og rgyan gyis brgyan/ /smin mas ut+pal mdangs 'phrog pa/ /rin chen gyis spras cod pan ni/ /'dzam bu'i gser gyi steng na bcings/ /ral par 'od dpag med pas brgyan/ /'di nyid

yid 'ong mdzes pa ste/ /mthong dang brjod dang dran pa yis/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /snying gi sdig pa thams cad 'joms/ /gang zhig bcom ldan 'das ma ru/ /skad cig ma yis rnal 'byor gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i nga rgyal

du/ /rgyun du bskyed par bya ba'o/ /mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad la/ /sngags kyi byin gyis brlab par bya/ /las kun byed pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bya ba'o/ /rtag tu'am ni thun gsum du/ /'dir ni gtsang ma'i khrus bya'o/ /tshangs par spyod

pa gzung bar bya/ /gos ni thun gyi dus su spo/ /mi dge bcu po 'joms par bya/ /mi dge'i las ni thams cad la/ /yid ni sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /de bzhin sgrub pa po yis ni/ /bcom ldan 'das mar rang nyid ni/ /mngon sum ma byas bar du bsgom/ /de la

sngon du byed pa yis/ /man ngag dam pa bshad par bya/ /srog 'dzin ma rig ling tog ni/ /'joms par byed pa kho na'o/ /'di ltar A li'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnyis med chu yi dkyil 'khor la/ /sgyu ma'i sa bon 'dzag pa yi/ /rgyun dang bcas pa blta bar

bya/ /dag par mi byed de 'og tu/ /dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i rang bzhin la/ /kho na nyid kyi sa bon ni/ /nyi ma phyed pa'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /sgrol ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /mi shes sreg par mdzad pa ste/ /phyogs bcu po yang sbyong bar mdzad/ /steng gi sa bon

'dzag pa can/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun du yid kyis ni/ /yun ring dus su bsgoms pa'o/ /de las skyo bar gyur pa na/ /lce ni chu skyes 'dab ma la/ /bla ma'i man ngag bsam par bya/ /de nas sngags kyi phreng ba ni/ /rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur bskor/ /nor bu sngags kyi stobs kyis ni/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / /bdud rtsi gzhan yang yon tan stobs/ /rdza ba khron par gzhug par bya/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan du/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa nyid/ /gang zhig de ltar yid kyis ni/ /bya ba 'di ni goms pa na/ /bde ba chen po'i ting nge

'dzin/ /rgyun mi 'chad par skye bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni 'di yi bsam gtan gyis/ /nyi ma bdun du byas pa na/ /shes rab che dang ngag dbang rno/ /rkang drug tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad dang lhug pa dang / /'dres pa dang ni lha yi skad/ /tshegs med

ngag gi dbang phyug ni/ /'bad pa med par 'grub pa ste/ /'di la the tshom ma byed cig /de nas bstod pa brjod pa yang / /me tog phreng ba nyid yin no/ /de dang de ni zhal las shes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni/ /dngos su grub par 'dod pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rig pa

'di/ /ri bong phyed la dus gsum du/ /gong du bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /sngon gyi brtul zhugs spyad nas ni/ /dben pa'i gnas su sems gcig tu/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i bstod pa ni/ /rgyun chad med par brjod par bya/ /de nas klog pa'i man ngag ni/ /brjod ma thag tu

yid la ni/ /rtsa ba nas ni rtse mo'i bar/ /ji ltar rim pas rjes su ni/ /kho na nyid kyi sa bon dang / /nus pa'i sa bon byed par ldan/ /sgyu ma'i sa bon brjod pa nyid/ /rim pas bcom ldan 'das ma yi/ /yon tan brjod pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /g.yeng ba med par bdag

nyid ni/ /yid ni brtan par klog pa nyid/ /de nyid shar kha'i nyi ma ste/ /de yi gdan la bsam par bya/ /sgyu ma phyed pa'i nyi ma ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas/ /nus pa ston ka'i zla ba ste/ /pad+ma'i rtse la bsam pa nyid/ /bzlas pa'i dus su 'khor

ba ste/ /klog pa'i dus su mchod pa nyid/ /rmongs dang 'jigs dang dug med dang / /mi mthun phyogs las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa gzhan yang sgrub byed pa/ /'khor lo 'di la rab tu 'byung / /nor bus dgos 'dod 'byung ba ltar/ /'dir ni 'bad pa bsgrub par bya/ /sgrol ma

me tog phreng 'dzin gyi/ /mngon par rab brtan cho ga bya/ /dge bas mnyam par 'gro ba kun/ /myur du sgrol ma nyid mtshungs shog /me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma'i bstod pa dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa rdzogs so// //ma hA paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta pA da'i zhal snga nas/ zhang lo

tsA ba grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pa'i lteng ka rab tu rgyas pa la/ /'dun pa pad+ma'i

rtsa ba rab tu brtan/ /rtsol ba drag po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba nyon mongs tshad pas gdungs pa la/ /thugs rjes bsil mdzad zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'gro ba nyam thag sgrol ba'i lha mo ste/ /rje btsun sgrol

ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs gnyis shing rta'i 'khor lo lta bu yis/ /sgrib gnyis bcom nas sa bcur rab gnas te/ /lha mo'i tshul du 'khor ba ma stongs bzhugs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs mi g.yo ri ltar brtan pa'i sku/ /

yon tan rab rdzogs sha lus shin tu rgyas/ /byams pas thugs g.yos nu 'bur rgyas pa can/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor bas ma gos sku mdog 'gying bag can/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs rin chen rgyan cha can/ /dbu skra sngo ljang rigs lnga'i

cod pan can/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zag med bde rgyas zhal ras 'dzum bag can/ /rnam snang las byung phrin las thugs rje can/ /bdud 'joms mda' gzhu thabs dang shes rab can/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa skyob

mdzad phyag g.yas skyabs sbyin tshul/ /'gro ba'i yid 'phrog na tshod bcu drug tshul/ /las kyi rigs tshogs ut+pal sngon po'i tshul/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye rgas na 'chi'i chu bo bzhi po las/ /sgrol ba'i gnyen po mkhas pa khyod lags

te/ /byams pa'i gru 'dzin snying rje'i skya ba can/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar tshigs su bcad pa brgyad kyis ni/ /lha mo nyid la dad pas bstod pa las/ /des ni 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyis/ /myur du sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par

shog /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA re sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od dpag

med kyi smon lam ma/ /me tog zla mdzes sems bskyed ma/ /'jig rten mgon gyi chu skyes ma/ /phyag gi mthil na bzhin bzangs ma/ /stod rgyas me tog phreng 'dzin ma/ /bgres mo bgying bag drang po ma/ /gshegs shing bzhugs pa ldem ldem ma/ /phrag rgyas sku

ni yid 'ong ma/ /gsung gi dbang phyug dbyangs snyan ma/ /dran pa tsam gyis byin rlob ma/ /yum ni 'dod pa'i sku mnga' ma/ /bde gshegs dbu yi gtsug tor ma/ /rgyal bas dbang bskur cod pan ma/ /pho nyas dus min 'chi slu ma/ /spyan nas thugs rje'i chu

'dzag ma/ /dge slong sdom brtson dam tshig ma/ /bdag med brtse bas mthar phyin ma/ /sa dgu 'das pa'i pha rol ma/ /ma byon snga dro gzhon nu ma/ /da lta nyin gung dar bab ma/ /'das so bgres mo dgongs ka ma/ /dus gsum 'gyur ba'i mi rtag ma/ /'jigs

chen brgyad las skyob mdzad ma/ /phra mo chen mo sgrub stsol ma/ /mchog 'dod ma la mchod sbyin ma/ /sems can gso ba'i 'o rgyun ma/ /dug sel sman mchog ma gi ma/ /sdig spong dge ba'i bdud rtsi ma/ /sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i rgyal yum ma/ /

bdag la thugs rjes zhal ston ma/ /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa chos kyi rje paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA de bI sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la

bstod pa/ rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo sgrol ma lha yi lha/ /'jig rten gsum na mchog gyur pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i dbang gyur pas/ /khams gsum 'gro ba sgrol la mkhas/ /tshor ba btang snyoms ngo bo

nyid/ /mi mthun tshor ba bde sdug ldan/ /phrag dog 'joms pa'i phrin las can/ /mkha' ltar dngas pa bla na med/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi/ /rnam rtog spangs pa'i bde ba can/ /pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa/ /rang bzhin gyis

dag bla na med/ /rgol ba dag ni tshar gcod pa/ /'gro ba yid 'ong phun tshogs pa/ /sku mdog mtshan dang dpe byad ldan/ /sgrol ma sna tshogs mdog can ni/ /'byung po las byung gdon chen dang / /'du ba las byung nad rnams dang / /bkra mi shis ni sna tshogs dang / /mtshon dang

dug dang rig sngags dang / /phra men las byung sbyor ba yis/ /shin tu mi bzad thabs ldan pa'i/ /stobs ni sna tshogs 'joms pa dang / /seng ge glang po stag dang sprul/ /chom rkun me chu sha za yi/ /'jigs pa chen po de rnams las/ /skyob mdzad de la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /

'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs/ dang po re zhig sngags pas kha la sogs pa dag par byas nas/ sa phyogs dben par 'dug ste/ byang chub mchog

tu sems bskyed la/ rang gi snying gar a las byung ba'i zla ba'i steng du yi ge tAM ljang gu 'od zer dang ldan par bsams nas/ de'i 'od zer gyis ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas khams gsum du spros te/ 'gro ba'i don byas nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sgrol ma spyan drangs

te/ mdun du bltas la/ phyag dang / mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ma gdab pa dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa'i yan lag bdun

pa'i mchod pa byas nas byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes bya ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags brjod cing thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du tA~M yongs su

gyur pa las/ ut+pal sngon po tAM gis mtshan pa bsam de rnams yongs su gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ sku mdog ljang gu lang tsho dang ldan pa/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas

mchog sbyin dang / g.yon gyis ut+pal bsnams pa pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du g.yon bskum pa'i phyed skyil gyis bzhugs par bdag nyid bsgoms la/ de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la dam tshig sems ma ji lta ba'i ye shes sems ma dang / de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la yi ge tAM ting nge 'dzin

sems ma'i tshul du bsam/ de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems ma spyan drangs pa la sogs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bdud rtsi lhag mas don yod grub pas spyi gtsug tu rgyas btab ste/ 'od zer 'phros 'dus 'gro ba'i don mdzad par mi skyo'i bar du bsgom par bya'o/ skyo na sngags

bzlas par bya ste/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'bum phrag bcu bzlas nas stong phrag bcus sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'gyur ba med par pha rol la/ /mi zad dga' bas bdud rtsi'i ros/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad ma/ /sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya

bas bzlas pa'i rjes la bstod nas/ yi ge brgya pa brjod de bsod nams bsngos la/ oM badzra muHzhes pas gshegs su gsol/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+natwota/ oM AHhUM phaT swAhA zhes bya bas gtor ma'i sngags so/ /zla ba drug gi bar du zhag re re zhing thun gsum du 'di dag

bya'o/ /bla ma chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs dzA ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ swa ra swa tI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dbyangs

can ma'i sgrub thabs/ lha mo dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang gi snying ga'i srog gi 'od zer gyis/ /dbyangs can ma yi 'khor lo mdun du dgug /me tog bdug pa mar me byug pas mchod/ /'jug pa'i rlung gis snying gi srog rtsar gzhug /dbus su hrIM gis

rnam brgyan zla bas lte bar rnam par mdzes/ /mchog tu dkar zhing 'od gsal sgron me lta bu'i chas/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis ze'u 'bru'i mtshams nas shin tu rgyas pa yi/ /dri med 'jam zhing dkar ba'i 'dab ma re rer gnyis gnyis gnas/ /'od zer dkar po 'phro bas snying gi mun pa

rnam par sel ba'o/ /sngon du rig pa 'bum phrag gcig /nyi khri lnga stong bsnyen pa byas/ /de nas rtsod pa smra ba na/ /'khor lo lce la rnam par dgod/ /bsgrub bya'i dpral bar 'khor lo mchog /bkod nas dbang du byed par bshad/ /dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs

bram ze phur bus mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ prah+ma bu ti swa ra sa t+yai sto tre Na sid+d+haM wAka pra b+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas grub pa dag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan

ras gzigs dbang zhal gyi mche ba'i rtse las mngon sprul zhing / /thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pha rol rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /tshangs pa'i bu mo mdzes ma khyod sku gsal ba'i rnam 'gyur can/ /biSh+Nu'i gzugs can tam+bu ra la dga' bskyed tshul 'dzin ma/ /

rjes su chags bcas rol pa'i lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i nyams/ /chu gter 'gram ngogs lbu ba'i phreng bas rtse bar dga' ba can/ /dri za'i bu mo mngon bstod nyid kyi rnam thar phul byung rnams/ /gang gis yid la dran byed de la ngag gi dbang phyug stsol/ /kho

bos khyod dran ba spu shas cher g.yo ba'i lag pa gnyis/ /thal sbyar me tog gzhon nu kha 'bus lta bu spyi bo'i steng / /rab bzhag snying nas rab tu gus pa lhur byed khyod kyi yon tan ni/ /mtha' dag rtogs min cung zad rnyed 'di sdeb legs phreng bas mchod/ /khyod sku 'o ma'i

mtsho 'dra kun+da ku mud zla zer mtshungs/ /rab dkar 'od kyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /lha dbang yid 'phrog dga' ba'i nga ros khyod la rtag tu bstod byed na/ /blo gros don gsal don gnyer lha la gus pa smos ci dgos/ /chu skyes dkar po dri med steng

gnas ge sar g.yo ba'i rtser/ /ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdan steng tsog pu'i tshul bzhugs bgying bag can/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dri za'i pi wang bsgrengs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / /rjes mthun gsung gis sa gsum skye dgu'i bsam pa tshim mdzad ma/ /'jam mnyen 'khril zhing ring ba bung ba

lta bur gnag pa'i skra/ /g.yas g.yon rgyab tu 'phyang zhing cung zad li ba'i thor cog la/ /me tog dkar po'i phreng bas thod bcings spyi gtsug zla bas spud/ /gser gyi rna cha 'phyang zhing mkhur tshos mdzes pa 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /ka tsa lin+da'i smad g.yogs tshom bu'i spras pas sgeg

pa'i nyams/ /puN+Da rI ka'i phreng ba chun 'phyang mgul rgyan do shal can/ /phyag zhabs rin chen phreng ba sil sil sgra ldan brgyus pa yis/ /khyed sku lha dang rig 'dzin bu mo'i tshogs kun ngo mtshar gyur/ /lha mo gzhon sgeg lang tshor ldan pa skye dgu'i yid 'phrog ma/ /yid

'ong 'dzum pa'i bzhin can mig dkyus ring po'i zur gyis ni/ /smin ma g.yo ba'i gar can khyod sku rtag tu dran byed la/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i nyams kyis gzigs shing kho bo rjes su bzung / /mdzad spyod bags kyis dal zhing gsong por smra ba'i ngang tshul can/ /mA li sar

pa'i dri ldan nu zho nu bar 'dod pa la/ /reg pas dga' ba'i nu zho stob byed khyed la rtag tu bstod pa'i bu/ /snying nas yus che shas cher du ba'i gdung ba tshim mdzad ma/ /de yi yid la bstod pa'i zol tshig ca cor ma nges pa yi sgra/ /smra ba'i ga zhas 'dir

spel nyid kyi thugs la bas gyur mod/ /'on kyang kho bo'i blo ni 'dir zad bu yi nyes pa rnams/ /ma yis bzod mdzod brtse bas slar yang bu ni rab tu skyongs/ /snying gi chu skyes 'dab brgyad dkar po ze'u 'bru'i phreng ba can/ /dmar ser mdzes pa'i mtshams nas 'od kyi dra ba

rab tu dgye/ /ge sar 'jam pa'i rtse mor bsil zer can ni rab gnas pa'i/ /dbus su chu shel mdog 'dzin hrIM gi phreng bas sgrib gnyis 'joms/ /'dab ma re rer gnyis gnyis bzhugs pa'i a A la sogs dbyangs yig rnams/ /g.yas su bskor ba'i rim pas mar

me'i phreng ba 'bar ba ltar/ /kun nas 'od zer 'phro ba'i rgyan ldan rtse mo'i rang bzhin gyis/ /yid kyi dri ma mun nag rnam bsal blo gros mchog stsol mdzod/ /srog gi 'od zer skra yi khyod tsam phra ba'i cha shas kyis/ /rtsol ba'i sgo nas myur bar lha mo'i thugs la reg gyur pas/ /

'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bas rnam pa bdun pa'i mchod sprin can/ /'jug pa'i rlung zhon rang sems ye shes rgyas mdzad de la 'dud/ /de rjes hrIM gi phreng ba mu tig do shal mgal me yi/ /'khor ba'i tshul du 'khor ba zhal gyi sgo nas 'thon gyur cing / /lte ba'i dkyil

'khor nas zhugs slar yang sa bon tsha zer rtser/ /'bar ba'i mod la dbyangs can ngag ster khyod zhabs spyi bos blang / /lha mo gtsang sbra la dga' brdzun spangs 'byung po'i zas dor zhing / /tshangs spyod brtul zhugs can gyis nyin re dran byas yum bos na/ /slar yang ngag

gi dbang phyug ci bzhed gsungs pa'i gad mo yis/ /dkar gsum zas kyi dga' ston tshul gyis dngos grub stsol la 'dud/ /de ltar khyod bstod lhur len gang yin de ni yon tan gyis/ /dbul gyur sna tshogs rigs pa'i gzhung lugs rnams las nges pa'i don/ /myur

rtogs sa gsum skye bo'i gzhung sgron gti mug mun pa rnams/ /rab bsal rgyal ba'i dbang po 'od dpag med 'dra thob par shog /'dir ni 'phags dang mkhas pa'i skye bo phul byung tshogs rnams ston/ /bdag 'dra khums shing mu cor sgrogs pa dang tshul mi shes mod/ /

khyod kyi rjes zhugs lan cig ma yin tshig don goms bya'i phyir/ /sdeb sbyor gtsor byas brag ca'i sgra mtshungs 'di ni bstod par rigs/ /tshig 'di gang gis mthong ngam thos sam rtag tu dran byed dam/ /klog dang kha don byed dang bsam don chub byed pa/ /yi ger bri'am

gzhan la rgya cher rab tu ston kyang rung / /de yi sems dang ngag la dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can myur 'jug shog /tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas grub pa ngag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba/ /lha mo nyid kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i bram ze phur bus

mdzad pa rdzogs so// //sum pa lo tsA ba dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra swa ra swa tI de wI no pi kaM/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje dbyangs snyan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gangs

ri ltar dkar zla rgyas zhal mnga' dri med bsil zhing gsal ba'i 'od zer phreng ba can/ /sgeg chags 'gying dul 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar lha yi lha mo kun nas mdzes pa'i gzi ldan ma/ /stong phrag drug cu'i yan lag dbyangs snyan rgyud mangs rol mo ut+pal ral gris phyag mtshan

cing / /'jig rten gsum skyabs mkha' dang rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyur blo gros lha mo rgyal gyur cig /pha rol rgol ba tshar gcad dang / /mtha' yas spobs pa kun bskyed dang / /sna tshogs phrin las bde bsgrub phyir/ /dbyangs can lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /'phags ma de rtag

mgon bzung nas/ /'gro skyabs don kun myur brtson pas/ /sman ljongs rab dgar brag rir ni/ /rnam g.yeng spangs te tshogs bsag dang / /dus snyigs bar chad kun bsal phyir/ /sngon du sngags pas rdo rje 'dzin/ /mnyes byas de rjes snying rje'i yid/ /rab sbyangs rdo rje lha

mo bsgom/ /sngags bdag nga rgyal la brtan srog /rtsa ba'i yi ge sgron 'dra yi/ /zer spros nas ni rgya mtsho nas/ /dbyangs can 'khor lo mdun du dgug /oM e h+ye hi badzra de wI ma hA tsakra sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya dzaH/ gzhal med srog gi 'od zer gyis/ /'khor lo sku

dang thugs 'khor lo/ /sna tshogs 'od 'bar dri med mdzes/ /mkha' ltar zla rgyas ltar drangs te/ /rab dang kun dgas khrus sogs dbul/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dri/ /zhal zas rol mo rgyan phreng dag /pi wang lhan cig sngags bcas mchod/ /'bru gsum glu

gar ldan byas bstod/ /phyag mchod la sogs rgyud kun gyis/ /mnyes bya gsol bya bstim par bya/ /gnas la gnas dang lus la sku/ /snying dkyil 'khor lo phyag rgyas gdab/ /shel dang baiDUr rA ga dang / /gser bzang las grub gzhal yas khang / /gru bzhi sgo

bzhi rta babs mdzes/ /sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis spras/ /de dbus rdo rje lha mo ni/ /pad zla rdo rje skyil krung mnan/ /brgyad gnyis na tshod yid 'ong ma/ /'jig rten gsum na mtshungs med pa'o/ /de sku ldem sgeg zhal 'dzum phyag /bzhi ldan ral gri ut+pal dang / /rgyud

mangs pi wang sbreng mdzad brtson/ /nyi shar gangs ri ltar dkar blta/ /thugs kar rab dkar shes rab kyi/ /snying po dkar mdzes hrIM yig gi/ /'od tshogs rab 'jam dkar skye bas/ /bum nang sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin/ /sprin med mkha' dkyil zla skar ltar/ /rnam dag 'khor lo

'od mdzad gzi/ /rim pas dbus nas mthar snang bya/ /nyi zer kha phye pad 'dab tshul/ /rtsa ba'i 'bru 'di snying 'dab kyi/ /dbus bzhugs bzhi gnyis kha phye nas/ /gnyis gnyis nga ro bcu drug rgyas/ /de spros ge sar ze'u 'bru phye/ /'dab bcas yi ge 'od 'bar bas/ /slar yang

bdud rtsi'i zil mngar blang / /dkar 'jam snum mnyen mkhregs dang srab/ /yid 'ong dri mas ma gos pa'o/ /zil mngar snying gi mun sel la/ /snying 'dab snying pos slar yang de'i/ /zil mngar rgyas byed yang tshur 'od/ /rab spros phyi nang kun dag byed/ /ji srid ma yengs mi

skyo bar/ /bdag gzhan mkha' khyab kun bkang la/ /sdig sdug yid kyi mun pa rnams/ /nyi mas mun bsal ji bzhin no/ /rtsa ba'i yi ge mchog gcig la/ /g.yeng med 'bum phrag bco lnga bzlas/ /dngos dang rmi lam brda gzugs kyi/ /ltas gsum phyi rol

mthong bar 'gyur/ /de 'og pad+ma 'khor lo sgyur/ /dbyangs yig ral gri phyed mtshan par/ /skad cig rnam pas bsgyur zhing bskor/ /gsang sngags 'bum phrag bzlas par bya/ /oM badzra de wI pi tsu pi tsu pra dz+nyA baD+D+ha hrIM hUM/ rang snying mun sel brtan pa dang / /gzhan

yid mun sel g.yo ba yis/ /'bum phrag gsum ni rtse gcig bzlas/ /lkugs pa'ang ngag gi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /nang skye zla rgyas pa wa sangs/ /gsung ba sgron ma 'bar ba mthong / /brda gsum gzugs sgra yid shes te/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtags

gzhan yin/ /de la sbyin sreg sngon song bas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad mchod blo gros spel/ /de yis tshar gcad rjes gzung las/ /lnga phrag gnyis 'grub the tshom med/ /rtsod dang dgra 'dul dug gzhil dang / /'chi bdag bzlog pa dang po ste/ /blo gros sngags rig snyan dngags

dang / /klog dang sngags 'grub gnyis pa yin/ /yang na thog ma gnyis rtse mos/ /lhag ma bzhi bzhi lha mo gzhan/ /'khor yin lnga gnyis dkyil 'khor mdzes/ /de bzhin gnyis gtso gzhan brgyad 'khor/ /rdo rje lha mo la gnas lce/ /'khor la dbyangs ldan ral

gri bskor/ /pha rol srog dang lce bskum nas/ /gsal byed mgrin bkang rtsod las rgyal/ /mtshan ngan thod pa dgra bo'i gzugs/ /mA ra ya nan la 'bum bzlas/ /gri mtshon gyis gtubs ro ras dkris/ /'dre gnas sar mnan nges par 'chi/ /lhag pa'i

lhas brgyan lha mo nyid/ /khro mo zhal brgya phrag stong can/ /lcags kyu zhags pa ral gri yis/ /bkug cing bsnun na shin tu 'joms/ /dam tshig lha mos ye shes kyi/ /lha drangs bum par bdud rtsi bsgrub/ /smin mtshams pad+mo'i hrIM thig le/ /rgyun 'dzag

dug gzhil 'byung bar bya/ /snying dkyil srog yig rin chen sgron/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i me 'od gsal/ /a phreng ka phreng spel bskor gzigs/ /gur phub rgyun 'bebs 'chi med 'gyur/ /ji skad sngar bshad lha mo nyid/ /de bzhin lha mo lnga lnga dgu/ /sna gsum

bdag gi snying la bsgom/ /blo gros rab 'phel gdon mi za/ /dpal mo'i mgrin par chu skyes dbus/ /dung dkar g.yas 'khyil sbubs ltar ba/ /nga ro bcu drug gsang bstod sgrogs/ /de myur tshangs dbyangs ngag thob 'gyur/ /gtsang zhing rab gtsang pad snying dbus/ /gzha' ris dpal be'u 'od zer

gsal/ /glog phreng rgyun 'dra rdo rje'i lce/ /rnam bskyod snyan dngags mkhan 'drar 'gyur/ /'dam skyes ri bong rdo rje yis/ /sbyor bas lce rtser tshangs yid bskyed/ /lha mo'i ljags skyes rdo rje ltung / /de blangs ka la ping ga mtshungs/ /rje btsun ljags pad zla steng du/ /dbyangs gsal rdo rje ral gris mtshan/ /bro

gar 'gyu bklags ye shes bkug /de rgyun sus 'thungs 'grub par 'gyur/ /thun mtshams gtsang zhing rab dkar zas/ /mngar bsil sna tshogs btung bar byas/ /'bru gsum rang sngags byin brlabs la/ /bdud rtsi'i sbyor bas gtor ma sbyin/ /oM AHbadzr-i shrI de wI sa pa ri wA ra a mr-i te ba

liM ta khA hi khA hi/ ma ma sarba sid+d+hi hUM phaT swA hA/ 'jam dbyangs lha mo dbyangs snyan ma/ /rab mdzes tshangs dbyangs blo bzangs ma/ /mtshungs med snying dbus mgrin skyong ma/ /'dod dgur bsgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde ldan ngag gi dbang phyug ma/ /mi 'tshe mi slu tshe 'dzin ma/ /bag yod yid 'ong

nor ster ma/ /tshangs spyod tshangs rigs ma khyod 'dud/ /dpal ldan dbyangs can brtag pa'i de nyid rgya mtsho mkha' dang gter ltar zab cing rgya che sbas pa las/ /rdo rje lha mo ri dbang phung po sangs rgyas khang bzangs lnga phrag gnyis sgrub nyes tshogs dri ma kun bsal 'di/ /zla zer bsil bas ku

mud ltar phye de yi lam nas dge 'od rin chen 'bar ba'i sgron mthus gang thob des/ /ma lus lus can rdo rje lha mo'i dbyangs snyan myur thob tshangs chen nga ros sa gsum rnam par rol bar shog /dpal rdo rje dbyangs snyan ma'i sgrub thabs snyan ngag mkhan chen po slob dpon zla ba gzhon nus mdzad pa

rdzogs so// //rnam par bshad pa'i paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ba su d+ha rA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal nor rgyun

ma'i sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /dbul ba kun las sgrol mdzad cing / /chos min sel bar mdzad pa mo/ /phun tshogs yang dag stsol mdzad ma/ /

nor rgyun ma la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /sbyin bya dang sbyin pa po ste gsum po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du dag pa chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa de nyid do/ /stong nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin nga'o/ /de las langs nas rang gi snying khar paM yig

gis pad+ma dang de'i steng du a yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ de'i steng du ts+luM gi yi ges bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun mar bsgom par bya ste/ phyag gnyis ma rin po che'i cod pan can/ sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig ma/ /rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ /

phyag mchog sbyin dang / bum pa bzang po can no/ /oM shrI ba su d+ha ro\u0f85haM/ a yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ A yig gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /oM badzra pad+ma ha s+t+waM haM/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ gsum mo/ /oM badzro pa me Ta Tha ke hUM swA hA/ gsum mo/

oM badzra yak+She hUM/ gsum mo/ /oM badzra puSh+pe hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ badzra dI pe hUM/ badzra gan+d+he hUM/ badzra ne+e bi d+ye hUM/ tiSh+Tha badzra hUM/ badzra b+hU me hUM/ badzra yak+She hUM/ ba su d+ha re swA hA/ de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i ts+luM gi yi ge'i 'od zer steng phyogs yang dag par bkod nas 'og min gyi srid par gnas

pa'i thog ma med pa nas grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma spyan drang bar bya ste/ oM shrI ka ri d+hA n+ya ka ri A gats+tsha A gats+tsha brI swA hA/ gsum mo/ /u ke b+hu ke waR+Sha Ni pra waR+Sha Ni/ niSh+pa da ni ba su d+ha rA b+hAT+TA ra kA ye pA d+yaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ prok+Sha NaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ any+tsa

mA NaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs par bsams nas me tog bkod par bya'o/ /oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM shrI ba su d+ha re swA hA/ oM ba su d+ha re ba su biSh+Ti pA ta ya ba su d+ha re swA hA/

dz+luM ts+luM ba su d+ha re swA hA/ lak+Shi b+hU ta la ni bA sa nI ye swA hA/ badzra d+ha ra sA ga ra Ni g+ho Sha tA ya swA hA/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA/ badzra pA Ni yak+Sha se nA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ i la de wI ye swA hA/ dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya swA hA/ pi tsi kuN+Da lI ne swA hA/ ki li mA lI na swA hA/

mu khan+d+rA+e ya swA hA/ tsa ren+d+ra ya swA hA/ gup+ta de wI ye swA hA/ su gup+ta de wI ye swA hA/ sha ra swas+t+ri de wI ye swA hA/ tsan+d+ra kan+d+ra de wI ye swA hA/ ma Ni b+ha drwa ya swA hA/ pUr+Na b+ha dru ya swA hA/ d+ha na dA ya swA hA/ be+e shra ba NA ya swA hA/ ba ru Na nA ga rA dzA

ye swA hA/ in+d+ra ya swA hA/ ya mA ya swA hA/ ba ru Na ya swA hA/ ku be+e rA ye swa hA/ ag+na ye swA hA/ nai r+r-i t+ye swA hA/ bA ya be+e swA hA/ I sha nA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ e te DAM ma ma sarba satA nAM sarba sA d+ha nAM hi ra N+ya su bar+N+Na ni d+ha nA nAM de hi maM da dA ba ye swA hA/ ba su

d+ha rI ye swA hA/ puSh+pe ba sun+d+ha rI ye swA hA/ d+hU pa ba su d+ha rI ye swA hA/ dI pa ba su ma ti pri yA ye swA hA/ gan+d+ha ba su d+hA ra d+hA ra b+hA ye swA hA/ ne+e bi d+ye badzra puSh+pe swA hA/ badzra bA ye swA hA/ badzra daR+sha na pha lA ya swA hA/ badzra taM bu yai swA hA/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ badzra satA saM

gra ha/ badzra rat+na ma nut+tar/ badzra karma ka rat+b+ha pa/ badzra d+harma gA ya swA hA/ badzra lA s+ye hUM/ badzra mA le trAM/ badzra gI ti hrIHbadzra nr-i t+ye aH badzra puSh+pe hUM/ badzra d+hU pe trAM/ badzra A lo ke hrIH/ badzra gan+d+he AH/ na ma ste hUM/ na maHmi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ rtog

par gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod de/ dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang / /yang na bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang / /de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni/ /spyan sngar da lta so sor bshags par bgyi/ /bde gshegs sras

kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang / /rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don/ /sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan pa la/ /rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo / /byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te byams pa ni bu gcig pa ltar mnyes gshin pa'i rnam pa

can gyi mtshan nyid do/ /snying rje ni sdug bsngal lam sdug bsngal kyi rgyu las yang dag par 'don par 'dod pa nyid do/ /dga' ba ni sna tshogs rnams kyi dge ba dang de rnams kyi longs spyod dang dbang phyug rnams la sems mgu ba nyid do/ /btang snyoms ni rnyed pa

dang ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang smad pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes pa 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad la sogs pa las phyir phyogs pa nyid do/ /oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haHsarba d+harmaHswA b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma

ko\u0f85haM/ de nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi nus pas yaM gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po gzhu dang 'dra ba g.yo ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan par byas pa yaM yig byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de'i steng du raM yig gis me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa 'bar bas mtshan

par byas pa raM yig gis byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /baM yig gis chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan pas baM yig gis byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /laM yig gis sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa kha dog ser po rdo rjes mtshan pa laM

yig gis byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /suM yig gis ri rab gru bzhi pa rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o/ /hUM yig gis sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i hUM yig gis khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par bya ste/ gru bzhi

pa sgo bzhi pa rta babs bzhis mdzes pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa/ nor bu dang rdo rje phyed pa dang zla tshes dang / rdo rje rin po che rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams rnams su spras pa/ bum pa dang ka ba dang rdo rje chen po dang / phyogs can gyi

mda' yab can/ dril bu dang ba dan gyis mdzes pa/ rnga yab la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /de'i nang du paM yig 'dab ma sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang / ze'u 'bru dang ge sar dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i

steng du a yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ de'i dbus su ts+luMgi yi ges bum pa bzang po'o/ /bum pa bzang po yongs su gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig ma/ phyag drug ma/ rin po che'i cod pan

can/ rol stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag dang po gter ston pa/ phyag gnyis pas rin po che'i char 'bebs pa/ phyag gsum pas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la phyag mdzad pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag

dang pos bum pa bzang po/ phyag gnyis pas 'bras kyi snye ma/ phyag gsum pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs ni sku mdog

ser po chos gos kyi grwa 'dzin pa'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni sku mdog dmar po phyag na rnga yab can no/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje sku mdog ljang gu phyag na rnga yab can no/ /lha mo i dra li mdog

ser mo rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'o/ /chu'i dbang po dzaM b+ha la sku mdog sngon po ne+e'u le dang / shing thog pI dza pU ra ka 'dzin pa'o/ /tsi pi kuN+Da li mdog dmar po lag na me tog can no/ /ke li mA li mdog dmar po lag na bdug spos

can no/ /sgo'i dbang po mdog ser po lag na mar me can no/ /spyod pa'i dbang po mdog dmar po lag na dri chab can no/ /sbas ma mdog sngo bsangs lag na rnga yab can no/ /legs sbas ma mdog dmar mo lag na gdugs can no/ /dbyangs

can ma mdog ser mo lag na rgyal mtshan can no/ /zla tshes ma mdog dkar mo lag na ba dan can no/ /nor bu bzang po mdog dkar po ne+e'u le dang shing thog gi bI dza pU ra ka 'dzin pa'o/ /gang ba bzang po mdog sngon po rin po che'i snye ma dang / bI dza

pU ra ka 'dzin pa'o/ /nor sbyin mdog dmar mo bum pa bzang po dang bI dza pU ra ka 'dzin pa'o/ /rnam thos sras mdog ser po rin po che'i myu gu dang bI dza pU ra ka 'dzin pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po chu lha mdog dkar po sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o/ /oM AH

hUM rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i ts+luM gi yi ge'i 'od zer gyis steng yang dag par bkang nas 'og min gyi srid pa na bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya zhing / sa ma ya sa mya sa ma yaM ka ri ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ lan gsum/ zhabs bsil

la sogs pas mchod cing / dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' dag ro gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba ta thA ga ta/ dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas

pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /mchod pa'i 'dren pa'i cod pan te/ /rigs lnga las ni byung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi cod pan che/ /ma hA mu ku Ta pra

tIts+tsha swA hA/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yi/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus bgyi'o/ /oM AHa b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM swA hA/ slar yang zhabs bsil la sogs pas mchod

do/ /slar yang me tog dgod cing sgeg mo brgyad kyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma ye shes kyi sku can la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i yon tan yid kyi shing rta gsang ba mo sngags sgrogs pa dang ldan pa la'o/ /'di'i

yon tan gyi gter dang gser rin po che'i char pa dang skye bo mang po'i nor 'phel ba dang rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i phung po dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /oM dz+luM ts+luMswA hA/ sna la nor bu bzang po'o/ /dpral

ba la gang ba bzang po'o/ /kha la nor sbyin no/ /brla zung dag la rnam thos sras so/ /rkang pa gnyis la tsi pi kuN+Da li'o/ /gsang ba la ke li mA li ni'o/ /snying gar zhal gyi dbang po'o/ /yan lag thams cad la spyod pa'i dbang po'o/ /zhabs

bsil la sogs pas mchod pa dang / me tog dgod pa dang sgeg mo brgyad do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rdzas ni 'phel ched dang / /rin chen du ma gser ni 'phel ched du/ /khang pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs la/ /dpal ldan nor rgyun ma la rtag phyag

'tshal/ /bzlas pa dang gtor ma'o/ /oM ba su d+ha re sarba b+ha ya ha re big+hAn shAn+ti ka re pra kr-i ti pra b+hA swA re i maM ba liM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM Ad+ya nut+pan+na tAta oM AHhUM/ any+tsa ma NaM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ me tog la sogs pa mchod par bya'o/ /

rdzogs so// @/ /nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bzhugs//[ ]@##/ /'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs bzang gzugs mdzes mchog ster ma/ /nor 'dzin byed ma nor rgyun ma/ /nor dpal dpal

mdzad mchog gyur ma/ /'dzin ma 'dzin byed skyong byed ma/ /skyabs gyur gus la mnyes gshin pa/ /lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/ /shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/ /rig 'dzin zhi ba phra mo ste/ /zhi ba kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma/ /sgrol ma sgrol 'jug

lha mo ste/ /rigs sbyin dbang phyug dbang phyug ma/ /rgyan ma 'byung po'i yum gyur ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan byed ma/ /gdul dka' sgrub mdzad 'jigs byed ma/ /drag mo drag po mchog tu gnon/ /lha mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /char 'bebs

bzang po'i gzugs can ma/ /gter dang bkra shis thams cad dang / /grags dang dpal dang snyan mdzad dge/ /sreg ma gsod ma gtum mo ste/ /'tshe byed ma mo thams cad ma/ /gshin rje skrag mdzad drag nyid ma/ /gzhon nu ma dang sna tshogs gzugs/ /

lha mo brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/ /'gro ba dga' mdzad can ma ste/ /dka' thub ma dang drag gzugs ma/ /rdzu 'phrul grub pa mchog ster ma/ /skal bzang bsod nams skal ba che/ /mi thub thub pa pha rol gnon/ /'gro la gcig tu phan brtson

ma/ /g.yul las sgrol byed dge ba mo/ /lha mo bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/ /tshul khrims bsam gtan sgom mdzad ma/ /pad+ma can dang pad+ma 'dzin/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa mo/ /dag pa'i gzugs can gzi brjid che/ /gser gyi mdog

can 'od mdzad ma/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin lha mo/ /shes rab glegs bam 'dzin pa mo/ /gter gyi phung por bzhugs mdzad ma/ /nor dang ldan mdzad nor dga' ma/ /khams gsum dbang phyug chen mo ste/ /lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa mo/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi yum gyur ma/ /rin chen khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ /dngos po stong nyid bsgom lha mo/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam spang mo/ /gdul bar bya ba 'dul mdzad ma/ /sgrol ma nyon mongs spyod pa mo/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo/ /sa 'og

bdun po skyong mdzad ma/ /bram ze ma dang rigs byed yum/ /sbas ma phug tu gnas pa mo/ /dbyangs can ma dang spyan yangs ma/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ldan pa mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen ma/ /rdo rje can ma rdo rje 'chang / /las 'dzin 'jug cing las

'dzin ma/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs 'bar/ /sprin gyi dkyil 'khor ldan pa mo/ /sems can kun gyis rtogs mdzad ma/ /byang chub yang dag thob mdzad ma/ /bsam gtan mos pa phun tshogs ma/ /gnyis med gnyis med sgom mdzad ma/ /don kun

sgrub mdzad bzang mo ste/ /bud med gzugs can dkar mo gnon/ /sangs rgyas las rnams ston mdzad ma/ /ngag gi dbang mo ston ma che/ /srung mdzad 'dzin mdzod nor ster ma/ /bud med gzugs 'dzin grub pa mo/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnal 'byor ma/ /yid

'phrog ma dang gzugs mdzes ma/ /skal bzang dga' ba ston pa mo/ /ded dpon ma dang brtse ldan ma/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid ma/ /nor rgyun lha mo khyod la 'dud/ /sems can kun gyi don ster ma/ /bzang po'i gzugs can khyod la 'dud/ /nor rgyun ma khyod la

phyag 'tshal/ /mtshan ni brgyad lhag brgya pa ni/ /gang zhig dus gsum klog byed pa/ /yid kyi shing rtas 'dod byed pa/ /thams cad nges par thob par 'gyur/ /mtshams med pa dang cha mthun gang / /shin tu mi bzad las rnams ni/ /de rnams thams cad mtshan bzang po/ /rjes su dran

las zad par 'gyur/ /yang na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /skye ba bdun ni dran pa dang / /dga' dang tshig btsun gzugs bzang ldan/ /mthong dga' bram ze rgyal rigs kyi/ /rigs ni phyug por skye bar 'gyur/ /mthar ni sa yi dbang thob nas/ /bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad

bklags pa yis/ /lha mo myur du 'gugs par 'gyur/ /'phags ma nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /nor rgyun ma'i smon lam bzhugs// @##/ /sangs rgyas la gus rang bzhin g.yo sgyu med/ /sems can kun la byams shing stong par goms/ /rnam grol

'bras bur ldan la kun nas chags/ /byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rno ba can/ /shin tu che ba'i rigs skyes gzugs mdzes pa/ /bdag ni skye ba skye bar bde gshegs kyi/ /snyan dngags mkhan po mnyam med rgya chen dang / /tshe ring rigs skye skyes bu blo gros gsal/ /mkhas shing blo gros mi dman

bcom ldan gyi/ /gsung rab la mkhas bde ldan snying rje can/ /rab tu dang 'gyur snyan dngags mkhan po dang / /mar shes pha ma la gus nyid dang ni/ /rtag tu skye ba dran zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /chos kyi bdag nyid nor ldan rab ster dang / /bla med mkhas pa'i grogs dang ldan pa dang / /spro ldan stobs

ldan dga' zhing mang pos bkur/ /nad rnams spangs shing sems can thams cad la/ /rjes su 'dzin zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang / /bsam pa dag cing bzod pa ldan pa de/ /ji srid 'jig rten phan pa 'byung ched du/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan go 'phang bgrod gyur pa/ /de srid rtag tu yon tan

'di rnams ni/ /kun gyis brgyan pa bdag gis thob gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtog par gsungs pa'i cho gas yongs su bklags byas shing / /'dzin na rnam pa sna tshogs rin chen gser gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /khang pa stong phrag thams

cad gang ba nyid du mdzad pa yi/ /'jig rten kun gyi yum gyur de la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo khyod ni yon tan rin chen kun gyi gter chen te/ /sems can don mdzad nor dang 'bru rnams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu/ /do shal cod pan ldan zhing nor bu dpag bsam shing rnams kyis/ /

'jig rten gsum gyi mgon mdzad nor 'dzin nor rgyun ma la 'dud/ /nad dang 'jigs pa'i 'chi ba'i skyon mang sgrol/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rma yi 'tsho byed sman/ /skal bzang gzugs kyi yon tan rigs dang rus/ /thams cad sbyin mdzad khyod kyi zhabs la 'dud/ /gang zhig yang

dag bla ma'i cho gas yongs su klog byed na/ /phun tshogs yangs pa bde 'gro nye bar ster byed pa/ /nor rgyun zhes pa'i ming can gzugs de la ni dus rtag tu/ /mtha' dag sems can phan par sems pas gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig yang dag dran las mi rnams longs

spyod yun ring du/ /rab tu 'phel zhing dbul dang nad dang sdig pa sel mdzad cing / /dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa nor rgyun ming can de la'o/ /'gro la phan pa'i ched du gus pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa dang / smon lam

dang bstod pa rnams rdzogs so// //tshul 'di ni dpang lo tsA ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas zhol phug tu/ rgya dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa dang bskul ba po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin chen mtha' can yin no// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha ga ru Da shAs+t+ra/ bod skad du/ mkha' lding grub pa'i bstan bcos/ dpal rdo rje mkha' lding la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kha sbyar mchu bar sbrul ni bsdams pa yis/ /gdengs ka'i nor bu mkha' lding me long ste/ /rang bzhin 'od

gsal gnyug ma'i gzugs mthong ngo / /khro ba spangs pa de ni rgyal gyur cig /mkha' lding bstan bcos skyed mos tshal nas ni/ /me tog rtsi yi sbrang rtsi de nyid ni/ /sems can don du sbrang rtsi byed pa yi/ /dpal ldan shang ku bdag gis 'dir de bsdu/ /gang zhig brtan pa'i

sems kyis bla ma yi/ /rjes 'jug dag pa'i lam la yang dag gnas/ /mi de phrin las ma lus pa yi ni/ /dngos grub thams cad kyi ni snod du 'gyur/ /bzod dka'i dug las byung ba'i tshor ba yis/ /'khrugs pa'i 'gro ba'i srog ni 'dzin byed cing / /chos

dang nor dang 'dod dang thar pa ni/ /bsod nams byas pa'i 'gro ba de yis 'thob/ /'gro ba'i don phyir mkha' lding bstan bcos ni/ /dam pa'i skye bo de yis bsngags par byed/ /'dod pa can ni nor gyis dga' ba ltar/ /sngags pas sbrul gdug mi bzad pa yis

so/ /de nas gdengs ka can dang tsi ti rnams/ /rA yi dkyil 'khor can dang 'dren gzugs sogs/ /rlung gi yon tan dus dang dus min dang / /a ma rat+ta sbyor rlung bus pa'o/ /mkha' lding gis bshad sman gyi nus pa dang / /ji ltar dug 'joms pa yi rim pa dag /gus pas de

ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon/ /gzhan dag kyang ni thos pa las byung ba'i/ /mtshon pas so/ /tri na in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i lus/ /'dab brgya rgyas 'dra'i mtshan pa lhag ma can/ /nor rgyas lus ni kha dog dkar po la/ /mtshan pa pad+ma rgyas 'dra sngon po yin/ /shar thogs nyi

ma'i 'od zer lta bu la/ /mgo la g.yung drung dung chen 'jog pa'o/ /karko Ta ni mun pa lta bu yi/ /ri mo gsum ni mgrin par yod pa yin/ /pad+ma'i lus ni kha dog ljang gu la/ /skar tshogs lta bu'i thig les gdengs ka mdzes/ /pad chen zla 'od bskus pa lta bu la/ /mdung rtse

gsum pa lta bu gdengs ka yin/ /dung skyong ka ni ya ra'i me tog 'dra/ /mgrin par zla ba'i cha yis mtshan pa yin/ /rigs ldan gyi ni spyi bo'i gdengs ka dag /du ba lta bu'i zla ba phyed pa yin/ /dbyig pa yis ni brdegs pa mchog yin te/ /klu rnams

bzung nas skrod pa de ltar min/ /sdang bas glags ni tshol bar byed pa na/ /sngags pa dag ni gang gis thar bar byed/ /sa 'og gnas na yongs su gnas pa yi/ /dbang chen 'og ni klu rnams shin tu dkon/ /gdengs ka'i nor bus mdzes par byas pa yi/ /khol po yang

ni glog gi zer ma 'dra/ /lce gnyis gdengs can phud ces 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /rin po che ni med par gyur pa ste/ /khol po yi yang khol po'i gnas su ni/ /gus pa med pa'i lto 'phye dag yin no/ /a ku ba saM gnyis gnyis bram ze rgyal/ /me tog dang ni sA la'i dri yin no/ /

de bzhin sta ma ka pa rje'u dang dmangs/ /mar dang nya yi dri ni bro ba yin/ /dung 'chang mche ba'i rtsa na legs gnas pa/ /sbrang rtsi'i me tog phreng ba lta bu yin/ /de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rmongs byed kyi/ /dug ste yongs su 'dzag par gyur pas so/ /gdengs ka can ni rang gi ngo bo'o/ /

gan+da ya na'i yin par gyur na ni/ /mgo mjug lus la ri mo kyog po yod/ /gdengs kas dman no 'jig rten gan+da ya/ /tsi ti zhes ni yongs su grags pa yin/ /de yis bzung na g.yo med skad cig gis/ /de ni 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /de nyid grub pa thob pas

gal te na/ /sad par byed na dran pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /tsi ti'i rang bzhin no/ /thig btab lta bu'i ri mo ring mo can/ /ban+da ya ru rnam par shes par bya/ /shing dang lcug 'khyil rtsas gtugs yod par ni/ /nges par shin tu legs gnas rA yil la/ /kha skom

mig dmar zas dang stan mi 'dod/ /tsha dang 'khru ba yi ni rjes la brgyal/ /dkar dang dmar dang nag dang ljang gu yi/ /ri mo med pa yin no rA yil la/ /btso ma'i gser 'dra'i lus ldan de yis ni/ /'gro ba rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed yin/ /rA yil gyis ni bzung na nges par ni/ /ril gyis

khyab par skrangs pa kho nar 'gyur/ /gser mdog lus de rgyu ba'i tshe na ni/ /'bar ba'i me lce chad pas 'od ma bsreg /'od ma'i rang bzhin yang ni des bsreg na/ /de yis bzung na ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /rA yil la'i rang bzhin no// //chu dang rlung me sa

yi rang bzhin gyi/ /ko Ta rnams kyi gang zhig mtshan pa ni/ /go med sa rnams su ni shes par bya/ /dug chen skrangs 'bur yang dag skyed pa po/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor can ni dug 'dzin gyis/ /zin pa'i mtshan nyid lus ni 'drul ba yin/ /tsha dang 'dar dang skam dang

skrang ba ni/ /rlung gi lus can gyis ni skyed par byed/ /lus kun gyi ni spu yi rtsa ba nas/ /se ba gnag 'dra'i brag gi thigs pa 'byung / /me yis reg pas kun nas skyed pa ni/ /thos dang gzugs dang mthong bas nyams pa yin/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor can gyis smras pa na/ /

skrang dang tsha ba'i reg pas gdungs pa yin/ /gnyid dang stan dag la ni sdang bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu sems la zug gzer dag gis nyen/ /phung po la ni myur du snang gyur pa/ /ring po yi ni ring por skrang pa ste/ /nges pa nyid du mang pos mang po'o/ /thal ba dang ni rus pa bshang ba'am/ /

gzhan yang lus las gang zhig byung ba yis/ /go med sa rnams kyis ni myur nyid du/ /'gro ba rnams kyi lus ni nyams par byed/ /gang zhig stobs can yang ni la la dag /mgo mjug tu yang mes mtshan med pa dang / /yud tsam gyis ni 'chi ba de yis 'dzin/ /des ni 'gro

ba 'chi bar the tshom med/ /'dir ni mang du smras pa ci zhig dgos/ /des na snying po dang du blang bar bgyi/ /sngags dang sman dang sbyor ba gang yin pa/ /ji srid dbugs rgyu'i bar du bya ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor can gyi rang bzhin no// //gang zhig dran pa'i dug gis phye ba na/ /bram ze

yin par gyur na de ni dkar/ /dmar po rgyal rigs ser po rje'u rigs yin/ /dmangs rigs nag po 'di de rnams la'o/ /gang zhig bya rog rkang 'dra'i mdud pa dang / /phye na ri mo 'khyog po snang ba la/ /mi mnyam thig les rnam par spras pa ni/ /nges par nag po

brtsegs pa dag dang mtshungs/ /gzhan du bcud kyis len ni bsgrub pa la/ /bram ze 'am ni de bzhin rgyal rigs kyis/ /rje'u rigs kyi ni mdze nad gzhom pa la/ /gsod pa la ni dmangs rigs rung bar bya/ /'dren pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /smad 'tshong sems kyis dor

thabs kyis sems bzhin/ /bdag rgyun mi 'chad rnal 'byor yang dag 'grub/ /mkhas pas de bzhin rlung gi yon tan gyis/ /dus ni nges par shes pa kho na yin/ /srog chags rnams ni gang gis 'tsho ba dang / /khyad can gang zhig nyams pas srog 'gro'o/ /don dam

zhing brtson de la sems dang ni/ /bdag dang mchog dang de nyid du ni 'dod/ /'jug pa'i rang bzhin srog ni kha ba yi/ /'od la brten pas gsal por skyed par byed/ /bdag dang skyes bu'i rang bzhin de nyid ni/ /nyi ma'i zhing la brten na sdud par byed/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun

par babs pa na/ /dug brgyal dge dang the tshom mi dge yi/ /ston par byed de rlung gi dbye ba dag/ /'jug dang gnas dang 'byung ba nyid na'o/ /gtso bor chos sems pa na snying stobs te/ /yul la chags na de bzhin rdul la srog /rmongs pa la zhen mun pas 'gog pa yis/ /

gsal por cha ni shes par gyur pa yin/ /'byung ba na ni 'byung ba kho na ste/ /'jug pa na ni 'jug pa ston par byed/ /rang gi gnyug ma'i lus la de bzhin du/ /kun du grong khyer gzhan la'ang de bzhin no/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i zhing du rlung / /rgyu ba'i phyogs su pho nya gnas na ni/ /dug

gis brgyal ba de ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin stong pa'i khyim la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i zhing la rlung ni gnas pa na/ /gsal por pho nyas thad kar bltas pa dang / /skyes bu rgyab nas 'dug ste yin na ni/ /nges par zla ba'i khyim la bzang por gzung / /dug zhir 'gro dang bya ba gang la

yang / /zla ba'i srog gi zas 'khrig 'thab mo la/ /nyi ma'i srog ni mdzes so bi su la/ /bab na rdul gyis char ni gzung bar bya/ /grub pa gzhan dag gsungs pa gnyis ka yang / /zhing du srog gi rlung ni legs par gnas/ /dbye ba rnam pa bzhir ni yod pa la/ /de la sems can ngo

mtshar yod pa la/ /khyab dang steng 'og dbus su rlung dang ni/ /yon tan zhi dang lha yi bdag po na/ /don med 'khyam dang 'thab dang 'chi ba ni/ /dri khur de yis de rnams byed pa yin/ /skom dang bkres dang skyo ba dag dang ni/ /'dod pa'i dgos pa nyams pa rtse gsum gyi/ /

'gro ba rnams la rgyal ba'i dge bskyed pa/ /mi 'chi med na de byed yin ma yin/ /gzhan don byed na dka' ba med par ni/ /bder gnas bde skyed yid ni tshim par byed/ /dri med dri zhim la ni mngon 'dod bzhin/ /gzugs bzang lha yi bdag po de yis byed/ /yi dwags mi dang rig 'dzin

sgo dang ni/ /gnod sbyin sgo gang lag pa gnyis kyis sdom/ /don dam thig le gang yin de dag ni/ /zla cha rtse sprod dbus gnas mtshon par byed/ /nag dang li khri dung dang gser sbyangs mdog/ /don gang yin pa de ni thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag brjod pas dri khur rab dbye las/ /mnyan pa

de dag rab tu thob par byed/ /mig dang kha sbyor ji lta bzhin du smra/ /dbugs 'jug 'byung ba kun nas ma nyams na/ /snying stobs la ni bab pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /rnam 'gyur med pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mig gi sbubs ni cung zad phye ba dang / /rma can cung zad so yi phreng ba

rnams/ /rmi lam bzhin du dug gi reg pa yis/ /g.yengs pas 'gags pa de ni rdul la yin/ /rma can gyi ni kha gdangs mig kyang bgrad/ /gsus pa 'jigs su rung ba sbos pa dang / /sen mo so dang mig rnams mdog 'gyur ba/ /gsar po ra ti mi yi mdog gi nyal/ /gang

dag la ni lag pas drangs tsam gyis/ /rtsa nas bud do mgo la skyes pa'i dgra/ /'byung po'i pha ni gang yin de song la/ /de la the tshom yang ni dgos sam ci/ /'thungs pa de yi mod la ldog byed de/ /sman dang chu ni ming dag gang yin la/ /srog de'i mdun du rgyug par byed pa ste/ /

g.yog 'khor gyi ni skyes bu ji bzhin no/ /so rtsa'i bdud rtsi zhim po ma yin dang / /rna ba'i sgra med mig gi glog kyang med/ /skyes bu gang gi spyi bo'i du ba ni/ /mi mthong ba ni de nas bskyod pa yin/ /nyin mtshan mtshams kyi rtags ni go bya ba/ /tshis por byas nas bor ba de yi ni/ /

dkar nag dang ni gser gyi mdog can te/ /rman can gyi ni zla dang nyi mig go/ /zla dang nyi ma'i mig gi snying por ni/ /go bu'i gzugs brnyan snang bar mi 'gyur zhing / /so rtsa'i bdud rtsi dag ni mi 'dzag na/ /phung po'i zhing las rlung de bskyod pa yin/ /sna ni rang gi gnas nas

g.yogs pa dang / /mig ni mchi mas dkrugs dang shes pa g.yengs/ /kha yi rlung ni chu la bab pa dang / /sna skad du ni smra ba gang yin pa'o/ /rlung gi yon tan gyi rab tu dbye ba'o/ /lus kyi cha ni gang la rma mthong ba/ /de 'dra de ru 'pho bar byed pa ste/ /mi bzad dus kyi dbang

du byas pa yin/ /rna ba'i rgyab tu ri mo dma' ba snang / /rmas pa'i sa ru sbal rgyab ltar mtho yis/ /dug gis zin pa de ni mi 'tsho'o/ /khrag ni sna tshogs mdog tu 'dzag byed cing / /de ni bya rog rkang 'dra'i gzugs su snang / /mgrin pa 'phongs tshos gsang ba dang ni

gnad/ /mig dang rna ba lag sor rnams kyi rtse/ /lte ba bshang lam phrag pa rked par ni/ /zin pa bsod nams kyis ni 'tsho ba yin/ /rma'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang gi khyim gyi tha snyad ma he dang / /bong bu dang ni rnga mo zhon pa yi/ /pho nya ltas ngan yin zhes su zhig smra/ /su la'ang de

yis ltas ngan bskyed ma yin/ /ltas ngan bden par brjod pa 'di dag ste/ /yun rings shugs ni 'byin par byed pa dang / /de bzhin du ni rdul dag 'byung ba dang / /pho nya rigs gzhan dag ni yin pa dag /phal cher bsngags pa ma yin kho na ste/ /yan lag nyams dang thod pa can

gyi gzugs/ /gos nag ngur smrig gyon pa nye bar na/ /pho nya'i mgo la mar nag byugs pa'am/ /yin na rdul gyi skabs la babs pa yin/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang pa na 'tsho ba ste/ /phal cher bud med la ni mtshon pa'o/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bas skyes pa dag/ /srog

ni 'gro ba yin par mtshon pa yin/ /rjes kyi dbyangs med de dang sbyar ba'am/ /yi ge phan tshun sbyar dang dang po ka/ /dris tshe nyon mongs tshig ni brjod pa na/ /rma can de ni the tshom med par 'chi/ /nyi mas rang gi gnas zhig bsregs nas ni/ /'od zer rnon pos bsreg bzhin pa yis

gnas/ /de bzhin mdun na mo la dud par 'thul/ /ltag ma rnams ni dge ba'i rnam pa yin/ /dgos pa la ni 'gro ched nyams pa dang / /nyams bzhin pa dang nyams par 'gyur ba yi/ /phyogs gsum ma yin phyogs gzhan rnams su 'grub/ /sbrid pa bya rog kA rA

yi dang ce spyang gnyis/ /zangs dung la sogs sgra yi dus dang 'dzom pa na/ /nyon mongs srog ni 'gro tshe phyogs nas sgrogs/ /dri khur rjes 'brang rtog mkhas pho nya yi/ /gnyis ni bzang ngan dge dang mi dge dag /dug 'joms the tshom nyon mongs 'gro ba yi/ /bden pa 'di ni nges par mkhyen pa

yin/ /pho nya'i mtshan nyid do/ /ma mo'i khyim mam pad+ma can gyi mtsho/ /shing 'dzeg phug pa grog mkhar dag nas sam/ /khang rul dur khrod kyi ni lto 'phye rnams/ /chu'am bzhi mdo yi ni gdug pa can/ /drag po'i gza' la lto 'phye'i dug gis ni/ /'dzin na bzhi'am bcu bzhi

yin na 'jig/ /de bzhin cha ni rab nyams gnam stong dang / /tshes brgyad la ni babs par gyur na'o/ /karti ka dang mar+g+ha a tra dang / /bA ra Ni dang mU la bi sA kha/ /sle sha 'phur gsum gal te tshes dang gza'/ /rgyu skar la zin nges par brlag par 'gyur/ /bad mkhris rlung ni gtso bo mi

dang ni/ /lto 'phye'i khams ni 'dra bar gyur pa na/ /de ltar shes na chos mi mthun pa dang / /chos mthun pa yi dka' ba med la'ang yod/ /gnas dang tshes grangs dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang chos mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'o/ /nyin mtshan thun phyed dag la klu rnams ni/ /gza' yi dbang

gyur dag ni longs spyod de/ /nyin mo gang la de yi dus nyid de/ /mtshan mo sgo ni rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur/ /'byung po phyogs dus me dang ri bo dang / /dus dang thar pa nyin mo'i dus su bsgreng / /ro dus mig dang thub pa dang ni mda'/ /me dang zla ba mtshan mo dag tu shes/ /spen pa'i dus

phyed snga ma bla ma yi/ /dang po 'das par dgos pa'i sa yin te/ /nyin mtshan 'pho ba'i mtshams ni gang yin pa/ /bcu drug po de rigs ldan dus yin no/ /gnyug ma'i lus la lta na nyi zla ste/ /lag pa rna ba la reg sa skyes yin/ /sna la lag pas reg na gza' lag go/ /mgrin pa la reg lha'i

bla ma'o/ /dbugs ni drug tu 'byin pa bsangs/ /dgod pa na yang sben pa ru ni shes/ /sa la stan sgra gcan nyid yin no/ /dus dang dgos pa'i dbye ba dang rags pa dang stong pa ste/ dug zin gyi mtshon byed do/ /nyi zla sa sras gza' lag phur bu dang / /ba ba sangs dang sben pas bskyed pa

na/ /tshogs mig rgya mtsho ro dang bcu drug dang / /sum cu gnyis dang lnga bcu tham pa ste/ /'gro bas rang dbang can gyi lto 'phye'o/ /the tshom med pa de yang shes par bya/ /dgos pa dang ni bcas pa'i dug dag kyang / /stong dang stong pa ma yin dbus su yang / /srog rdul snying gi dbus su dal ba yis/

rnam par gsal ba yis ni legs gnas na/ /gnas na gnas pas de ma thag tu ni/ /yun ring brgyal ba la yang mtshon par bya/ /gnyis pa'i phyogs rtsa bstan pa'o/ /spyi bo dag ni nag po rlung yin te/ /mgrin pa lte bar me yi 'bar bas dkrigs/ /de nas dbang chen sor mo mkha' lding gi/ /

pus mo nas brtsams chu ni dkar po yin/ /brgya byin gyis ni bdud rtsi phrogs nas kyang / /rdo rje'i mtshon chas dgra med dga' ba yis/ /mkha' lding dgra ni reng par 'gyur ba dang / /yid 'phrog thob pa de ni rgyal gyur cig/ /gar gyi dpal brjid gshog pas bskyod pa yi/ /rlung gi rigs kyi ri rnams

bskyod byed pa/ /mkha' lding du ni yongs su bsgom bya ste/ /ma lus dug rnams zhi don gnyer bas so/ /rlung du bstan pas sems ni phur bus 'debs/ /'bar ba yis ni spel bar byed pa yin/ /brgya byin gyis ni gsal por rengs par byed/ /chu zil 'bab pas dug ni brlag par byed/ /

mkha' lding bye brag re re yis kyang ni/ /sel la nges par bsgom pa dang ldan na/ /bi med nga yi sa bzhin gnas su na/ /ma lus dug ni tshar gcod byed pa yin/ /a sti bi ShaM brjod na dug yod de/ /na a sti bi ShaM sa stengs kun na med/ /bsod nams yang dag bsags la mchog gi ni/ /de nyid

'di de skye ba kho nar 'gyur/ /lta byed mig gsum 'bar bas bstan pa yi/ /dug mchog thal ba ru ni brlag nas kyang / /la la dag la gal te 'di skad du/ /mgrin sngon khyed brjod byin par gyur na ni/ /skyes bu de yi lus la ji srid ni/ /'tsho ba'i bar du dug ni mi 'pho ste/ /ri bong mgo

la rwa ni skye ba dag/ /nam du yang ni srid par 'gyur ram ci/ /gal te 'phrog byed kha sna bkag go myur bar ni/ /dga' ba'i mthar zhugs srog lung 'gro bzhin pa/ /re zhig gsal bar 'gul bar gyur na ni/ /rmas pa de ni 'tsho bar shes par bya/ /'byung

ba'i rlung ni nang du rngubs nas su/ /'phrog byed kyi ni kha drung ji bzhin lta/ /skye bo'i dgra ni dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /sbas pa'i yul la yang ni shes par bya/ /the tshom mam ni dge dang mi dge ba/ /'dri mi 'dra lhag dug gis brgyal ba la/ /phyis na pho nya'i gos ni phrogs byed ni/ /

khru yis bcal ba la ni snang bar 'gyur/ /mkha' lding gshog tshogs gar dang ldan pa yis/ /klu gzugs de la rnam par gnon pa na/ /de ltar gang gson skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /gsal por smra ba dang ni bskyod par 'gyur/ /kha dang sna rlung rgyu ba bkag nas ni/ /skad cig tsam gyis de ni khyad par du/ /

gdengs ka can gyis bzung nas brgyal ba ni/ /nges pa nyid du tshor ba dang bcas 'gyur/ /dug 'joms byed pa pad+ma rgyas par yang / /srog gi rlung gis kyang ni byed pa ste/ /yang dag 'gag pa'i 'gro ba'i snying po ni/ /slob dpon gyis ni sgom par byed pa yin/ /dug gi skyon ni med pa kho nar yang / /

gang dag gis ni rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig gis/ /brgyal bar byas la mkhas pas sen mtshams su/ /sen mo yis ni song bar byed pa yin/ /dug zin gyis ni bsod nams sbyor ba yi/ /gang la thig le dkar po byung gyur na/ /de la gang dang gang gis brjod byas pa/ /de dang de

ni sngags su 'gyur ba yin/ /lus kyi yan lag dag ni dkar po la/ /gang gi gnas der me ni 'bar ba dag /drag po yi ni rlung gis bskyod pa na/ /rmas pa de ma thag tu 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /lhag ma nor bu'i gdengs ka'i 'dab ma'i rtsar/ /sred med bu bzhin rma can bde bar nyal/ /

'o ma'i mtsho yi bdud rtsi dkar po yis/ /bsgos pas dug ni 'joms par 'gyur ba yin/ /gang gi lus ni dkar por sgyur byed pa'i/ /thig le dkar po dag ni lta byed na/ /stong pa de yi dug ni stong par ni/ /bsgom pas kyang ni zhi bar shes par bya/ /'phrog byed mig gi me ni 'bar ba dag /rang gis

bskyod pa gang gi snying la ni/ /rab tu 'bar bas rma ni rnying pa la/ /yud tsam gyis ni de la rgyas par bskyed/ /rigs ldan nor gyis 'byor dang yon tan can/ /dka' thub snying stobs can dang rgan po dang / /bud med mngal ni rab tu rgyas pa dang / /bram ze dang ni byis la bskyed mi bya/ /mkha'

lding ser pos dug zin dag la ni/ /thig le yis ni gal te mnan pa dang / /bum pa can gyi nyin zhag mang por yang / /ri rab kyis ni mnan bzhin g.yo ba med/ /dug gis zin pa nor rgyas dkar po yis/ /mjug mas mgul bar bcings te mi lhung ba/ /de yi mgo las

gal te bzung na ni/ /shang shang nam mkha' la ni 'gro na yang / /zla ba'i zhing du son pa'i nus pa ni/ /snying ga'i pad+ma phug nas pad skud 'dra'i/ /'dzag pa gang la zag med bltas nas ni/ /de yi lus la dug ni gang la ste/ /gang phyir ga ma'i lus las nus pa ni/ /

'dzags pa yis ni rgyang ring gnas pa yis/ /ma lus dug kyang phig nas nges par ni/ /zhi bar byed pa kho na yin pa'o/ /sbyor ba'o// //'dab ma dkar po rab rgyas rab 'dzag pa'i/ /kha ba'i 'od 'dra chu shel nor bu'i gzugs/ /mi bzad dug kyang dang po'i dbyangs

kyis ni/ /bsgoms pas yang dang yang du 'joms par byed pa yin/ /lag pa g.yon du dbang phyug spyi bo'i rgyan/ /dbus gnas drug pa la ni thig les brgyan/ /dbyangs ni dug rnams sdud par byed pa ste/ /'phrog byed dkar po'i khu tshur bcangs pas so/ /sa 'og spyi bor zla ba'i dum

bu ni/ /thig le dang bcas skra ris spyi nag stong / /u yig gi ni dbyangs la zhon pa ste/ /'phrog byed dkar po dug mthar byed pa yin/ /spong ba dang ni gos dag 'phrog pa dang / /dug bcings cho lo ston mo sa yi 'og /ji ltar nges par bsgoms pas byed pa na/ /de ltar dgod pa yang ni

shes par gyis/ /'gro ba dug gis brgyal ba dag la yang / /snying gar yang ni mgo med dkar po ste/ /gzhan dag kyang ni brgyal bar byed pa na/ /drag po'i rlung gis bskyod me 'bar bas so/ /sa 'og gos gnas rlung gis drangs pa na/ /skad cig gis ni phyed tsam gyis kyang ni/ /myur du khros na

'phrog pa de la ni/ /gting bzhin 'brangs nas 'ded par byed pa yin/ /nyon mongs snying gar chud pa'i mi shigs pas/ /bkug pa'i dug gi gong bu nag po ni/ /kum pa dkar bcas gos ni bcings pa yis/ /nyin zhag mang por yang ni g.yo ba med/ /tshes bzhi sprin nag

lha yi bla ma dang / /zla nyi pa ba sangs ni chol shing ste/ /rtsis kyi ri mo glog ni 'gyu ba dang / /gang por cho lor skar ma'i tshogs su ste/ /chos skur lag pa dbang phyug bzhin pa'i mig /cho lo mkhan po gnyis skyes mchog gi tshogs/ /dug zin dug las yongs su thar nas ni/ /chol res la ni lag

nas yongs su 'dzin/ /de yis dug gis bzung ba'i skyes bu ni/ /rnam par dag pas skad cig khyad par 'phags/ /bza' ba zos pa'i lhag ma'i dus su ni/ /chu snod bzung nas chu ni ster bar byed/ /gang zhig mthong dang thos dang gang zhig ni/ /nyams su myong ba'ang yul byas spyod

pa ni/ /de kun sems kyis byed do gus par gyis/ /srid pa'i dngos po med pa 'byung ba yis/ /de bzhin du ni na ra yas smras pa/ /nus pa gang gis myur du thar skyed dang / /des ni dug dang 'byung po 'joms byed de/ /zla ba dang ni nyi mar zhugs pa na'o/ /'dus pa'i skye bo

kha yi sbubs nas ni/ /nus pa ba mo lta bu bab pa yis/ /dgod pa'i sgra yis dug dag myur du ni/ /'joms par byed de bsgoms pa byas pas so/ /dug zin smra bas gal te yod pa na/ /rgyang ring na yang dug ni myur du sdud/ /snying gar ngang pa dkar po bsgom pa ni/ /bdud rtsi'i

snying pos yongs su rgyas pa'o/ /brtan pa'i dug ni khur bu stong phrag kyang / /rlung gis bsdus pas dug med par ni byed/ /ngang pa'i bdud rtsi 'bab par gyur pa ni/ /zla ba'i zhing nas byung bas der 'gyur ro/ /lto ba spyi bo spyi gtsug go cha ni/ /mig dang lag pa lag sor sgra

ldan pas/ /re re bor ba'i ring po tsheg drag kyang / /drug po yang ni blang bar bya ba yin/ /nyi ma'i grangs kyi dbyangs ni sbyar bya ste/ /sa mchog srid pa dmigs pa med pas 'god/ /de ni drag po dang mnyam tshig btsan zhing / /dug 'joms mi byed pa ni ma yin no/ /sa mchog ra la bskyon pa gug rings dang /

zla phyed thig le yis ni mdzes par byas/ /mar gyi nying khus mdzes pa bsgoms nas ni/ /go na sa yi dug ni sel bar byed/ /gang zhig 'bum phrag bdun ni bzlas pa yis/ /bi Na ya yi bu bzhin sbrul dug bzod/ /mi bzlog snyan dngags mkhan gyi rgyal por ni/ /dbyangs can gyi ni

nus pa bsgom pa na'o/ /de nyid tsheg drag dang bcas 'char ka yi/ /'od kyis dkrigs pa'i skyes bu gang zhig gis/ /sgom par byed na dug dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /gdengs ka can yang khro zhing 'khrugs par byed/ /snying la bsgoms pa yis ni 'gugs pa ste/ /dpral ba'i mthil

du gnas pa dbang du sdud/ /yan lag mchog la btsud pas chang gi rgyun/ /dzu ba ti la 'bab pa kho nar 'gyur/ /kha yi sbubs su 'bar bas dkrigs pa yi/ /sum sdom rab tu 'bar bas dug brgyal ba/ /'chi ba'am ni 'tsho ba yang ni rung / /bde bar gsal po nyid du de yis smra/ /de nyid d+ha yi

nang du chud gyur cing / /pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa bsgoms na ni/ /bdud rtsi'i zil pa dal 'bab tsheg drag bcas/ /dug 'joms pa yi sa bon nyid yin no/ /de nyid me yi nang du bzhag nas ni/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dras mngon gsal dkrigs/ /nges par dug sel rims dang 'byung po dang / /dug

gi khyad par yang ni sel bar byed/ /ka Sha sbyar ba dkar po thig ler bcas/ /ri dwags mtshan ma'i dbus su chud pa ni/ /snying la chud par byas pas dug rnams ni/ /myur du 'joms par byed pa kho na yin/ /dbyangs yig U ring yang dag ldan pa yi/ /yi ge de nyid mi yi seng ge'i steng / /'jigs dang sgra

dang sdig dang dug dang ni/ /'byung po nad dang dbul po brlag par byed/ /yi ge hUM phaT me yi rang bzhin can/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pas gsal byas pa/ /gang gis mgrin par bris pa yin na ni/ /de yis gsal por don grub byed par 'gyur/ /la yig mchog ni zlum po'i thig ler bcas/ /

gos gnas bdud rtsi dkar po rgyun 'dzag pa/ /dug gis zin la byab tu bcug na ni/ /nges par dug ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /dri khur nag po'i dbus chud tha yig ni/ /sngags 'dis dug zin la ni byin brlabs na/ /bskyod dang smra dang gzer ba'i sgra dang ni/ /langs nas kun du lta bar the tshom

med/ /gsum pa nye bar bstan pa'o// //dz+haM kA ri Ni ku ru kul+le dang / /be ruN+Na dang gser ri sa bon dag /gang du dug gis brgyal la byed pa yi/ /dbye ba der ni legs par mnyan par gyis/ /sad+do bA ma g+ho ra de skyes bu/ /lnga pa de ru yA ni dbang ldan du/ /dkar ser dmar ljang

nam mkha' sor mor gnas/ /rgan lcugs gung mo gsum la dz+haM kA ri/ /yi ge rnam par spras pa dag yin no/ /bzhi pa lha ni Ni yig ces bya ba/ /ming med la ni gnas pa nyid yin no/ /mkhar gnas d+ha dang wa sbyar thig ler bcas/ /dug zin ming yig dang por bar du ste/ /rgan po'i sngags dang sbyar ba

dag gis ni/ /dbang ldan de ni mnyes na ma lus pa'i/ /dug ni de yi mod la zhi bar 'gyur/ /de yi skyes bu dang ni sbyar ba na/ /'byung po'i gnod pa yod na mngon gsal 'gyur/ /'jigs pa'i g+ho ri dang ni sbyar ba na/ /dgra sbrul dman pa yang ni mod la bskyod/ /g.yon pa mnan pas

rengs pa phongs pa dang / /dgra dang ngag dang dug dang dpung dag go/ /lug g.yon zla ba'i dbus gnas tha yig chud/ /dz+haM mnyes dkar po 'dzag par byas nas ni/ /'od dang cha kun rdzogs pa de yis ni/ /dug dang lu ba rims 'bras mkha' 'gro ma/ /gdon dang 'byung po'i gnod dang tsha ba dang /

nges par zhi byed yongs su bzlas pa'i chus/ /sngags pas 'gro ba rnams la de byed do/ /kha la dz+haM yig lkog mar kA yin no/ /lte bar ri yig gsang ni rkang gnyis d+h+waM/ /mda' dang nyungs kar rma bya'i sgro sogs kyis/ /'byung po la sogs gnod pa 'joms byed de/ /dung sogs sgra la'ang

lan bdun bzlas pas so/ /'bum bzlas sbyin sreg khri yis mchod gtang dang / /tsan tis oM khi la la ku yin te/ /ru ni lkog mar ku ni nu brag tu/ /l+le ni gsang bar rkang gnyis swA hA'o/ /stong bzlas skud par btab pa rna bar btags/ /de ni nags su sbrul gyis mi 'jigs so/ /sa gar

sogs bris khyim gzhag de mi 'ong / /bi ri ma hA se na tsan ra dang / /tsan tis 'bum bdun re res dbang kun 'grub/ /oM su war+Na re khe kuk+ku ta bi kri ha rU pi Ni swA hA/ lag mthil pad dkar 'dab brgyad dbus su ni/ /yi ge 'dren pa gzhan la gnyis gnyis brtsegs/ /

ba mo 'bab pas sman ma la bsangs na/ /ras bal 'dab ma rlung gis bskyod bzhin ldang / /o e ho mA ye/ /b+he ruN+De A I U bI dze/ /b+ha ri ya ka raN+De/ tat+ta man+ta A g+ho She/ hUM ka re bi Sha na se thA ba ra dzaM ga ma a ga dza kit+ta ma hA ra ta ra hUM phaT swA hA// //oM pak+ShiM swA hA/

Shi sid+d+ha nA thA di bA ka ri adz+nyA shrI shrIskaN+Tha shrI nI la kaN+Tha/ ShI bi ShaM kha la/ /ri mi dzI mi haM sa/ k+Shi pi k+Shi pi haM sa hUM haM sa/ dzaM haM sa nAt+ti bi Shi/ tri b+ha ba ne/ sa ya le/ 'brum bu gnyis dang dug zin la sogs pa/ /gso dang sngar gsungs bla ma'i man ngag bzhin/ /

sngags chab ji tsam 'gro ba'i lam de na/ /dug sel byed par yid la gdon mi za/ /pad steng bum bca' sngags bdun bzlas klu mchod/ /oM pak+ShiM swA hA/ /zhes bya ba dang rig pa'i rgyal mo drug /sgra ris zla dkyil lag mthil bsam pas kyang / /dug sel bya rgod bshad

pa mthong ba dang / /skye bo'i skyid sdug bde ba'i sgra yis kyang / /tsha gsum po la'i sa bon sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /snar blugs lus skyes sogs kyi nad 'joms byed/ /tsher can shing sha'i rnga la ni/ /kha gnyis pags pas rnga g.yogs byas/ /sbrul dgra'i rkang gis brdungs nas ni/ /

ji srid sgras khyab de dug 'joms/ /pha ni dza dang su daR+Sha na lus btags kyang / /She te pu nar na ba'i khu blud pas/ /ma ning ka ko ti yi tsa/ /ba mar dang 'thungs dug gsum sel/ /kan+ta shir sha'i rtsa shun 'bras bkrus chur/ /sbyar ba a sha ra yi nya dag la/ /'thungs na

lo gcig dug ni thub pa yin/ /shu dag shing kun nim pa'i khu ba dag /snar blugs dug gis skra rtse slebs kyang sel/ /ka rany+dza yi tsher can nim+pa'i 'dab/ /mar sbrang yungs kar go nas yang sel/ /kha gnyis lus che ne'u le yi mig/ /sbrul dgra'i mkhris pa'i cha mnyam pa/ /

khyim du gzhag pas kyang ni sbrul mgo 'gegs/ shrI bA sa/ bi rang+ga/ u shi ra/ sardza ra sa/ lAk+Sha b+ha lA lA ta ka/ kud tha/ tri pha la/ ardzu na/ ku su ma/ 'di dag cha mnyam du ba yis/ /lus skyes tse ri sbrang ma sogs/ /sbrul yang 'bros zhes klu sgrub gsung / /

me tog grong khyer zhes bya ba/ /brgya byin pho brang dang mnyam par/ /zla cha zhes bya'i bram ze me'i/ /lo rgyus kyang ni lnga pa yin/ /dpal mkha' lding grub pa'i bstan bcos bram ze shang kus mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /

gu Na sA ga ra/ 'dir ni bla ma dam pa'i rjes 'brangs te/ /dpal ldan shang ku bdag gis mdor bsdus bris/ /dge ba de yis srid gsum ma lus pa/ /dug med bdud rtsi'i go 'phang bsten par shog/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bram ze a

ba d+hU tI chen po dpe med kyi zhal sngar/ /lo tsA ba ban+de pradz+nyA kIrtis bsgyur ba'o// //dbang phyug chen pos mkha' lding du sprul nas/ mkha' lding rgya mtsho ba 'bum phrag bzhi bshad/ de bram ze sang kus dbang bskur gyi tshe

klu bdud kyi dug yod pa la/ 'jog po'i dug kham phor du mar dang sbrang rtsi byin pa ma yog /bdun po kun gyi bu mo nu mo bkug nas chung mar byas/ 'jog po'i bu mo bkug pas mos phu byas dug gis zin nas shi la thug pas/ yul mi kun gyis khyed

grongs na nged kyi dug sus gso byas pas/ mchod sdong tshugs shig zer nas/ nam mkha' lding gi mchod sdong rdo rings steng du btsugs/ steng nas rdo'i gdugs phub pa cig byas/ khos 'khyud nas sngags bzlas te/ kun dug zhi

bar byed do/ /de lta bu'i shang kus mdzad do// //dus dang dus ma yin pa la lnga ste/ rma'i mtshan nyid dang / pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang / gnas dang / tshes grangs dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / chos mthun pa dang / mi mthun

pa dang / dus dang / dgos pa'i dbye ba dang / rags pa dang / stong pa ste dug zin gyi mtshan nyid dang / dus ma yin par mi 'chi ba bstan pa'o/ /nying dgos la gsum/ phrin las thams cad kyi snod du 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dang / sems
kyi srog 'dzin pa dang / phyogs thams cad du grags pas khyab pa'o// //mchod brjod dang / dgos 'brel dang / gzhung bshad pa gsum mo/ /gzhung la gnyis/ lus rnam gzhag dang / yan lag rgyas bshad

do/ /oM tsa kra ra hi tsa kra b+hi da ni g+ha Na ti kA ri haM/ sa gzhi lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhi byug /dung dang bu tsha bkrus la thub pa dang kha byang du bstan/ rang yang kha byang du bltas la/ dung la gu gul bdug /g.yas g.yon gang du 'khor 'dod pa de ngos

su dung bskor/ lag pa gnyis kyi bar du dung gzung / dung la kha gtad la sngags bzla/ bu tsha'i mgo la me tog gtor/ gtsang pa lo tsA ba'i phyag dpe las bris so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ swA ra swa tI

sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ lha mo dbyangs can gyi bstod pa/ ston zla rab rgyas ku mud dung dang chu shel gangs ri ltar dkar ba/ /rab dkar dkar gsal gzi ldan yid 'phrog lha mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal/ /bdag blo'i mi shes gti mug rmongs pa'i tshogs

ni kun nas 'joms pa dang / /smra ngan sun 'byin thogs med kun gzigs spobs pa'i gter mchog rgyas par mdzod/ /sgrib gnyis sprin bral blo gros 'od zer stong ldan rab tu 'char ka yi/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis gdul bya'i pad+mo rab dul kha 'byed rnam

rgyas pas/ /rab tu dri zhim bsil ngad dang ldan pad+mo'i ze'u 'bru'i ngos dag la/ /bdag blos gus pas 'thungs pas blo gros cher rgyas sbrang rtsis 'gro rnams skyong / /gser gyi ri dang kun mkhyen chu gter lta bur kun nas lhun chags pa/ /rtsod pa'i phye ma

leb dang / bdud sde dus kyi rlung gis bskyod ma yin/ /bcu drug na tshod lta bu'i bu mo rab mdzes sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /lha yi rgyan rnams du mas khyod kyi lus dang yan lag mdzes pa yis/ /chu gter 'gram gnas mgrin sngon dga' bskyed rgya mtsho'i lha mo dbyangs

can ma/ /khyod la phyag 'tshal brtse bas bdag blo'i mi shes mun pa myur du sol/ /rab tu snyan pa'i dbyangs ldan dri za'i bu mo rab mdzes yid 'phrog ma/ /lag gi 'du byed rab tu bsgyur bas tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs rnam 'byung bas/ /sgra

dang tshad ma snyan dngags mngon brjod sdeb sbyor legs bshad chos rnams kun/ /pha rol yid 'phrog 'dzin par nus pa ci phyir bdag la mi stsol lags/ /khyod kyi thugs ni kun du mi g.yo rgya mtsho chen po lta bu ste/ /thugs rje'i rlabs shugs drag tu bskyed pas 'gro

ba'i gdung ba rab tu sol/ /dbang gi rgyal po'i 'byung gnas yid bzhin re skong dbyangs can rgya mtsho yis/ /rmongs pa'i gdung bas gdungs pa'i skye bo rings par skyong ba dang / /gti mug dag gis blo dman skye bo'i re ba myur du skongs/ /bdag blo'i ku mu da ni rab

tu kha zums rnam par gnag pa la/ /bsil zer byed pa rab tu sprin bral dkyil 'khor rnam par rgyas pa yis/ /ku mud kha bye rab rgyas ze'u 'bru yi bsil dngar rnam par spel bar mdzod/ /rab tu dri bral rkyen gyi dri mas ma phog ma 'gags khyod kyi sku/ /kun

du tshangs pa'i dbyangs can ca co'i dri bral khyod kyi gsung / /shes bya kun la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan khyod kyi thugs/ /bstod pa 'di yis bstod la dbyangs can ma yis blo gros mchog rab stsol/ /dbyangs can gyi bstod pa 'di ni/ lho phyogs
kyi rgyud du byung ba'i mkhas pa chen po paN+Di ta nag mo'i khol gyis dbyangs can ma zhal gzigs pa'i dus su dgyes te bstod pa rdzogs so// //gang zhig 'di 'don pa la shes rab stsol bar khas blangs
so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Ti ta dz+nyA na shI la dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
